tika-s0203t0:125_2: paccakkhabhāvena satte visaṃvādenti. Nassanasabhāvāti khaṇabhaṅgattā ittarapaccupaṭṭhānatāya
tika-s0203t0:125_3: dissamānā viyapi hutvā apaññāyanakapakatikā. Tenāha “khettaṃ viyā”tiādi. Dhammasaddo
tika-s0203t0:125_4: cettha “jātidhammāna”ntiādīsu viya pakatipariyāyo, tathā sabhāvasaddo cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:125_5: Mosadhammāti mosanapakatikā, kusalabhaṇḍaharaṇasabhāvāti attho. Māyākatanti māyāya
tika-s0203t0:125_6: kataṃ udakādimaṇiādiākārena māyādinā upaṭṭhāpitaṃ; māyākataṃ viya māyākataṃ aññasabhāvā
tika-s0203t0:125_7: hutvā atathā upaṭṭhahanato. Tenāha “yathā”tiādi. Cakkhupathe eva katavijjāya, na
tika-s0203t0:125_8: tato paranti vuttaṃ – “dassanūpacāre ṭhitasseva tathā paññāyatī”ti. Tayidaṃ sambaravijjāvasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:126_0: Evaṃ tāvakālikabhāvena kāmānaṃ māyākatabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni tato aññenapi pakārena
tika-s0203t0:126_1: dassetuṃ “yathā cā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Aniccādisabhāvānaṃ kāmānaṃ niccādisabhāvadassanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:126_2: vipallāsasahagatatāya veditabbaṃ. Bālānaṃ lāpanatoti apariññātavatthukānaṃ andhabālānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:126_3: puggalānaṃ vipallāsahetuto. Manussaloke ṭhatvā manussānaṃ vā vasena bhagavatā bhāsitattā
tika-s0203t0:126_4: vuttaṃ – “diṭṭhadhammikā kāmāti mānusakā pañca kāmaguṇā”ti. Tato eva ca “samparāyikāti
tika-s0203t0:126_5: te ṭhapetvā avasesā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha diṭṭhadhammā paccakkhasabhāvā ārammaṇabhūtā
tika-s0203t0:126_6: etāsaṃ atthīti diṭṭhadhammikā. Samparāyike kāme ārabbha uppannasaññā samparāyikā.
tika-s0203t0:126_7: Te samecca dhīyati ettha āṇāti dheyyaṃ, āṇāpavattiṭṭhānaṃ. Mārassa dheyyanti māradheyyaṃ
tika-s0203t0:126_8: tassa issariyapavattanattā. Tenāha “yehī”tiādi. Gahitanti visayavisayībhāvena gahitaṃ,
tika-s0203t0:126_9: ārammaṇavasena ārammaṇakaraṇavasena ca gahitanti attho. Tattha ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
tika-s0203t0:126_10: gahaṇaṃ nāma “idaṃ mayha”nti avibhāgena pariggahakaraṇaṃ; ārammaṇavasena pana gahaṇaṃ
tika-s0203t0:126_11: bhāgaso ārammaṇānubhavananti vadanti. Ubhayassapi pana taṇhārāgavasena gahaṇaṃ sandhāya,
tika-s0203t0:126_12: “ubhayametaṃ gahita”nti vuttaṃ. Māroti kilesamāro. Yadaggena kilesamāro, tadaggena
tika-s0203t0:126_13: devaputtamāropi te attano vasaṃ vatteti. Taṃ sandhāyāti dhammamukhena puggalaggahaṇaṃ sandhāya.
tika-s0203t0:127_0: Appahīnavipallāsā hi puggalā kāmādhimuttā mārassa issariyavattanaṭṭhānatāya “māradheyya”nti
tika-s0203t0:127_1: vuttā, tathā mārassa nivāpagocarapariyāyehipi te evaṃ vuttāti dassento, “yathā coḷassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0203t0:127_2: Nivapatīti nivāpo, so eva bījanti nivāpabījaṃ. Teti kāmaguṇā. Yatthāti yasmiṃ padese.
tika-s0203t0:128_0: Manasi bhavāti mānasāti āha “cittasambhūtā”ti. Te pana avijjādayo pāḷiyaṃ āgatā.
tika-s0203t0:128_1: Evañhi lohitasannissayo pubbo viya anurodhūpanissayo virodhoti dassento, “mamāyite
tika-s0203t0:128_2: vatthusmi”ntiādimāha. Tedhāti ettha idhāti nipātamattaṃ “idhāhaṃ, bhikkhave, bhuttāvī
tika-s0203t0:128_3: assa”ntiādīsu viya. Kāmalokanti kāmaguṇasaṅkhātaṃ saṅkhāralokaṃ, yattha vā loke kāmaguṇavantaṃ
tika-s0203t0:128_4: lokaṃ. Cittena adhiṭṭhahitvāti jhānārammaṇaṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ bhāvanācittena uppādetvā.
tika-s0203t0:128_5: Parittaṃ nāma vikkhambhanaasamatthattā kilesehi parito khaṇḍitaṃ viya hoti. Tassa
tika-s0203t0:128_6: paṭikkhepenāti parittabhāvapaṭikkhepena. Pamāṇantipi kāmāvacarameva pāpakānaṃ pamāṇakaraṇadhammānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:128_7: vikkhambhanavasena appajahanato. Tappaṭikkhepavasena appamāṇaṃ nāma mahaggatanti
tika-s0203t0:128_8: āha – “rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacara”nti. Samucchedavasena kilesānaṃ appahānena mahaggatajjhānampi
tika-s0203t0:128_9: subhāvitaṃ nāma na hoti, pageva parittajjhānanti āha – “subhāvitanti…pe… lokuttarassevetaṃ
tika-s0203t0:129_0: Tameva paṭipadanti tameva abhijjhādipahānāvahaṃ jhānapaṭipadaṃ. Arahatte tassa upāyabhūtāya
tika-s0203t0:129_1: vipassanāya vā catutthajjhāne tassa upāyabhūte upacāre vā sati cittaṃ pasannameva
tika-s0203t0:129_2: hotīti āha – “arahattaṃ vā…pe… upacāraṃ vā”ti. Adhimokkhasampasādoti “ajjeva arahattaṃ
tika-s0203t0:129_3: gaṇhissāmī”ti vā vipassanāya vīthipaṭipannattā; “ajjeva catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattessāmī”ti
tika-s0203t0:129_4: vā upacārasamādhinā cittassa samāhitattā adhimuccanabhūto sampasādo. Paṭilābhasampasādoti
tika-s0203t0:129_5: arahattassa catutthajjhānassa vā adhigamasaṅkhāto sampasādo. Paṭilābhopi hi kilesakālusiyābhibhavanato
tika-s0203t0:129_6: cittassa suppasannabhāvāvahattā “sampasādo”ti vutto. Paccayāti nāmarūpapaccayā avijjādayo.
tika-s0203t0:129_7: Sabbathāti samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato ādīnavato nissaraṇatoti sabbappakārena.
tika-s0203t0:129_8: Āsāti adhimuccanavasena āsīsanā. Tenāha – “āsā santiṭṭhati, adhimokkhaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti.
tika-s0203t0:130_0: Pādakanti padaṭṭhānaṃ. Kilesā sannisīdantīti nīvaraṇasahagatā eva kilesā vikkhambhanavasena
tika-s0203t0:130_1: vūpasamanti. Satīti upacārajjhānāvahā sati santiṭṭhati. Saṅkhāragatanti bhāvanāya
tika-s0203t0:130_2: samatāya pavattamānattā, ime dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo ekarasā hutvā pavattantīti,
tika-s0203t0:130_3: bhāvanācittuppādapariyāpannaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ vibhūtaṃ pākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Cittuppādoti
tika-s0203t0:130_4: bhāvanācittuppādo. Lepapiṇḍeti silesapiṇḍe laggamāno viya appito viya hoti. Upacārena
tika-s0203t0:130_5: samādhiyati upacārajjhānena samādhiyati. Ayanti ayaṃ duvidhopi adhimuccanākāro adhimokkhasampasādo
tika-s0203t0:130_6: nāma. Tasmiṃ sampasāde satīti etasmiṃ vipassanālakkhaṇe, upacārajjhāne vā adhimokkhasampasāde
tika-s0203t0:130_7: sati. Yo pana arahattaṃ vā paṭilabhati catutthajjhānaṃ vā, tassa cittaṃ vippasannaṃ
tika-s0203t0:130_8: hotiyeva, ayaṃ nippariyāyato paṭilābhasampasādo, evaṃ santepi idhāmippetameva dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t0:130_9: “idha panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vipassanā hītiādi vuttassa samatthanaṃ. Tattha paññāyāti
tika-s0203t0:130_10: arahattapaññāya. Adhimuccanassāti saddahanaṃ ussukkāpajjanassa. Upacāranti upacārajjhānaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:131_0: Etarahi vāti idānimeva. Āneñjaṃ vāti catutthajjhānaṃ vā. Samāpajjatīti adhigacchati.
tika-s0203t0:131_1: Idaṃ hītiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarati. Arahattasacchikiriyā nāma aggamaggabhāvanāya
tika-s0203t0:131_2: sati atthato āpannā hoti, aggamaggapaññā eva tadatthaṃ adhimuccitabbāti dassento,
tika-s0203t0:131_3: “atha vā”ti vikappantaramāha. Tattha yathā nāma pāsādassa atthāya samānītadabbasambhārāvayave
tika-s0203t0:131_4: appahonte kūṭāgāraṃ kātuṃ na pahontiyeva, evaṃsampadamidanti dassento, “taṃ anabhisambhuṇanto
tika-s0203t0:131_5: āneñjaṃ vā samāpajjatī”ti āha. Catusaccaṃ vā sacchikaroti heṭṭhimamaggādhigamanavasena
tika-s0203t0:132_0: Tatrāti tasmiṃ “paññāya vā adhimuccati, āneñjaṃ vā samāpajjatī”ti yathāvutte visesādhigame
tika-s0203t0:132_1: ayaṃ idāni vuccamāno yojanānayo. Evaṃ hotīti idāni vuccamānākārena cittābhinīhāro
tika-s0203t0:132_2: hoti. Kiccanti pabbajitakiccaṃ. Tatoti arahattādhigamanato. Osakkitamānasoti saṃkucitacitto.
tika-s0203t0:132_3: Antarā na tiṭṭhatīti asamāhitabhūmiyaṃ na tiṭṭhati. Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ upamāya
tika-s0203t0:132_4: vibhāvetuṃ “yathā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – yathā tassa purisassa vanamahiṃsaṃ
tika-s0203t0:132_5: gahetuṃ ussāhavato osakkantassa sasagodhādiggahaṇe vattabbameva natthi, evaṃ imassapi
tika-s0203t0:132_6: bhikkhuno arahattaṃ gahetuṃ ussāhavato tato osakkitvā catutthajjhānasamāpajjane vattabbameva
tika-s0203t0:132_7: natthīti. Eseva nayoti yathāvuttaṃ upamaṃ upamāsaṃsandanañca maggabhāvanāyojanāyaṃ
tika-s0203t0:133_0: Hetuatthajotano yanti nipāto, karaṇe vā etaṃ paccattavacananti āha “yena kāraṇenā”ti.
tika-s0203t0:133_1: Tassa saṃvattanaṃ arahati, taṃ vā payojanaṃ etassāti taṃsaṃvattanikaṃ. Viññāṇanti
tika-s0203t0:133_2: vipākaviññāṇaṃ. Āneñjasabhāvaṃ upagacchatīti āneñjūpagaṃ. Yathā kusalaṃ āneñjasabhāvaṃ,
tika-s0203t0:133_3: evaṃ taṃ vipākaviññāṇampi āneñjasabhāvaṃ upagataṃ assa bhaveyya. Tenāha – “kādisameva
tika-s0203t0:133_4: bhaveyyāti attho”ti. Kecīti abhayagirivāsino. Kusalaviññāṇanti vipākaviññāṇampi taṃ
tika-s0203t0:133_5: kusalaṃ viya vadanti. Tannāmakamevāti kusalaṃ viya āneñjanāmakameva siyā. Ettha ca
tika-s0203t0:133_6: purimavikappe “āneñjūpaga”nti taṃsadisatā vuttā, dutiyavikappe tato eva taṃsamaññatā.
tika-s0203t0:133_7: So panāyamatthoti āneñjasadisatāya vipākakālepi taṃnāmakameva assāti yathāvutto attho.
tika-s0203t0:133_8: Iminā nayenāti iminā vuttanayena. Ettha hi āneñjābhisaṅkhārahetuvipākaviññāṇaṃ “āneñjūpagaṃ
tika-s0203t0:133_9: hoti viññāṇa”nti vuttattā taṃnāmakameva katvā dīpitaṃ. Arahattassāpīti apisaddena
tika-s0203t0:133_10: aggamaggabhāvanāyapi heṭṭhimamaggabhāvanāyapīti attho saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbo. Samādhivasena
tika-s0203t0:133_11: osakkanā kathitāti “vipulena mahaggatena cetasā vihareyya”nti samathanayaṃ dassetvā desanā kathitā.
tika-s0203t0:134_0: 67. Ayañhi bhikkhūti yaṃ uddissa ayaṃ dutiyāneñjasappāyadesanāya bhikkhu vutto. Paññavantataroti
tika-s0203t0:134_1: vatvā taṃ dassetuṃ, “dvinnampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvā sammasatī”ti vuttaṃ. Heṭṭhimassa
tika-s0203t0:134_2: hi “ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmā”tiādinā rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbāneva rūpamukhena
tika-s0203t0:134_3: vipassanābhiniveso kato, imassa pana “yaṃ kiñci rūpa”ntiādinā sakalarūpadhammavasena.
tika-s0203t0:134_4: Bhagavā hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento kammaṭṭhānikassa bhikkhuno kāraṇabalānurūpameva
tika-s0203t0:134_5: paṭhamaṃ bhāvanābhinivesaṃ dasseti; so pacchā ñāṇe vipulaṃ gacchante anavasesato
tika-s0203t0:134_6: dhammaṃ pariggaṇhāti. Rūpapaṭibāhanenāti rūpavirāgabhāvanāya sabbaso samatikkamena.
tika-s0203t0:135_0: Paññavantataroti paññuttaro. Tiṇṇampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvāti kāmaguṇā sabbarūpadhammā
tika-s0203t0:135_1: kāmasaññāti evaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ kammaṭṭhānavasena tidhā vutte sammasanūpagadhamme
tika-s0203t0:135_2: ekato katvā, “sabbametaṃ anicca”nti ekajjhaṃ gahetvā, sammasati yathā – “yaṃ kiñci
tika-s0203t0:135_3: samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti. Tenāha – “ubhayametaṃ anicca”ntiādi.
tika-s0203t0:135_4: Kāmarūpasaññāvasena diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikabhedato aṭṭha ekekakoṭṭhāsāti evaṃ kataṃ
tika-s0203t0:135_5: ubhayanti vuttanti āha – “diṭṭhadhammika…pe… vasena saṅkhipitvā ubhayanti vutta”nti.
tika-s0203t0:135_7: me attā”ti evaṃ abhinandituṃ. Eseva nayoti iminā taṇhādiṭṭhivasena “etaṃ mama, eso
tika-s0203t0:135_8: me attā”ti abhinandituṃ ajjhosāya gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvā ṭhātunti imamatthaṃ atidisati.
tika-s0203t0:135_10: Rūpapaṭibāhanaṃ hissa āsannaṃ, tatopi ākāsānañcāyatanasamatikkamo, taṃsamatikkamena
tika-s0203t0:135_11: saheva sabbe tā vipassanāvasena osakkanā kathitā “ubhayametaṃ anicca”ntiādivacanato.
tika-s0203t0:136_0: 68. Idha attano cāti ākiñcaññāyatanakammaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāyāha. Nirujjhanti tappaṭibaddhachandarāganirodhena,
tika-s0203t0:136_1: samāpajjanakkhaṇe pana anuppādanenapi. Tenāha “ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ patvā”ti. Atappakaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0203t0:136_2: uḷāratarabhāvena jhānasamāpattiyā atittikarabhāvena. Tameva paṭipadanti ākiñcaññāyatanabhāvanamāha.
tika-s0203t0:137_0: Idha attanoti dvikoṭikasuññatāmanasikārasaṅkhātaṃ vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ. Heṭṭhā vuttapaṭipadanti
tika-s0203t0:137_2: idha sātisayattā vuttaṃ. “Dutiyākiñcaññāyatane vipassanāvasena osakkanā kathitā”ti.
tika-s0203t0:138_1: Etthāti etasmiṃ suññatānupassanādhikāre. Kvacīti katthaci ṭhāne, kāle, dhamme vā.
tika-s0203t0:138_2: Atha vā kvacīti ajjhattaṃ, bahiddhā vā. Attano attānanti sakattānaṃ. “Ayaṃ kho, bho
tika-s0203t0:138_3: brahmā…pe… vasī pitā bhūtabhabyāna”ntiādinā paraparikappitaṃ attānañca kassaci kiñcanabhūtaṃ
tika-s0203t0:138_4: na passatīti dassento “kassacī”tiādimāha. Tattha parassāti “parā pajā”ti “paro puriso”ti
tika-s0203t0:138_5: ca evaṃ gahitassa. Na ca mama kvacanīti ettha mama-saddo aṭṭhānapayuttoti āha “mamasaddaṃ
tika-s0203t0:138_6: tāva ṭhapetvā”ti. Parassa cāti attato aññassa, “paro puriso nāma atthi mamatthāya
tika-s0203t0:138_7: sajito, tassa vasena mayhaṃ sabbaṃ ijjhatī”ti evaṃ ekaccadiṭṭhigatikaparikappitavasena
tika-s0203t0:138_8: paraṃ attānaṃ, tañca attano kiñcanabhūtaṃ na passatīti dassento, “na ca kvacanī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0203t0:138_9: Ettha ca nāhaṃ kvacanīti sakaattano abhāvaṃ passati. Na kassaci kiñcanatasminti sakaattano
tika-s0203t0:138_10: eva kassaci anattaniyataṃ passati. Na ca, mamāti etaṃ dvayaṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ sambandhitabbaṃ,
tika-s0203t0:138_11: atthīti paccekaṃ. “Na ca kvacani parassa attā atthī”ti parassa attano abhāvaṃ passati,
tika-s0203t0:138_12: “tassa parassa attano mama kismiñci kiñcanatā na catthī”ti parassa attano anattaniyataṃ
tika-s0203t0:138_13: passati. Evaṃ ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā ca khandhānaṃ attattaniyasuññatā suddhasaṅkhārapuñjatā
tika-s0203t0:138_14: catukoṭikasuññatāpariggaṇhanena diṭṭhā hoti. Heṭṭhā vuttapaṭipadanti idhāpi ākiñcaññāyatanakammaṭṭhānameva
tika-s0203t0:139_0: Idha attanoti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakammaṭṭhānamāha. Sabbasaññāti rūpasaññā paṭighasaññā
tika-s0203t0:139_1: nānattasaññā heṭṭhimā tisso arūpasaññāti evaṃ sabbasaññā anavasesā nirujjhantīti
tika-s0203t0:139_2: vadanti. “Heṭṭhā vuttā”ti pana visesitattā imasmiṃ āgatā catutthajjhānasaññādayo
tika-s0203t0:139_3: api saññāti apare. Tanti sammutimattaṃ kāmasaññāpaṭibāhanavaseneva tesaṃ nānattasaññādinirodhassa
tika-s0203t0:139_4: atthasiddhattā. Samādhivasena osakkanā kathitā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanabhāvanāya samathakammaṭṭhānabhāvato.
tika-s0203t0:140_0: 71. Pubbe pañcavidhaṃ kammavaṭṭanti purimakammabhavasmiṃ moho avijjā āyūhanā saṅkhārā
tika-s0203t0:140_1: nikantitaṇhā upagamanaṃ upādānaṃ cetanā bhavoti evamāgato saparikkhāro kammappabandho.
tika-s0203t0:140_2: Na āyūhitaṃ assāti na cetitaṃ pakappitaṃ bhaveyya. Etarahi evaṃ pañcavidhaṃ vipākavaṭṭanti
tika-s0203t0:140_4: kāraṇassa anipphannattā. Sace āyūhitaṃ na bhavissatīti yadi cetitaṃ pakappitaṃ na
tika-s0203t0:140_5: siyā. Yaṃ atthīti yaṃ paramatthato vijjamānakaṃ. Tenāha “bhūta”nti. Tañhi paccayanibbattatāya
tika-s0203t0:140_6: “bhūta”nti vuccati. Taṃ pajahāmīti tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena tato eva āyatiṃ
tika-s0203t0:141_0: Parinibbāyīti saha parikappanena atītattheti āha “parinibbāyeyyā”ti. Parinibbāyeyya
tika-s0203t0:141_1: nu khoti vā pāṭho, so evattho. Na kiñci kathitanti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā
tika-s0203t0:141_2: saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvena ñāṇuttarasseva visayabhāvato sarūpato na kiñci kathitaṃ,
tika-s0203t0:141_3: nayena panassa visesaṃ ñāpetukāmattā. Bhagavato kira etadahosi – “imissaṃyeva parisati
tika-s0203t0:141_4: nisinno ānando anusandhikusalatāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitassa
tika-s0203t0:141_5: bhikkhuno paṭisandhiṃ arahattañca sandhāya pañhaṃ pucchissati, iminā pucchānusandhinā
tika-s0203t0:141_6: tamatthaṃ desessāmī”ti. Osakkanāya ca idhādhippetattā bhinnarasadesanā hotīti pucchānusandhi
tika-s0203t0:141_7: pucchitā. Tasmiñhi asati anusandhibhedabhinnesā desanā, na ca buddhāciṇṇā bhinnarasadesanāti.
tika-s0203t0:141_8: Vipassanānissitanti tannissitaṃ. Tassa bhikkhuno. Upādiyati etenāti ca upādānaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:141_9: Na parinibbāyati pahātabbassa appajahanato. Tenāha bhagavā – “dhammāpi kho, bhikkhave,
tika-s0203t0:141_10: pahātabbā, pageva adhammā”ti. Upādānaseṭṭhanti idaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanabhavassa
tika-s0203t0:142: 73. Nissāyāti bhavapariyāpannaṃ nāma dhammaṃ nissāya tappariyāpannaṃ nāma nissāya oghanittharaṇā bhagavatā akkhātā; aho acchariyametaṃ, aho abbhutametanti.
tika-s0203t0:143_0: Navasupi ṭhānesu samathayānikasseva vasena desanāya āgatattā, idha ca kassacipi pādakajjhānassa
tika-s0203t0:143_1: anāmaṭṭhattā vuttaṃ – “ariyasāvakoti sukkhavipassako ariyasāvako”ti. Navannampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:143_2: ekato katvā sammasatīti idaṃ jhānadhammepi anussavaladdhe gahetvā sammasanaṃ sambhavatīti
tika-s0203t0:143_3: katvā vuttaṃ; tebhūmakasaṅkhāragataṃ idha vuttanti anavasesato pariggahaṇaṃ sandhāya
tika-s0203t0:144_0: Etaṃ amatanti amataṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattiyā etaṃ arahattaṃ amatarasaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0203t0:144_1: – “etaṃ amataṃ santaṃ, etaṃ paṇīta”nti. “Anupādāya kiñcipi aggahetvā cittaṃ vimuccī”ti
tika-s0203t0:144_2: vuttattāpi anupādā cittassa vimokkho nibbānaṃ aññattha sutte vuccati.
tika-s0203t0:145_0: Tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnanti abhinivesabhedena tividhānaṃ. Pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitassa osakkanāya
tika-s0203t0:145_1: abhāve kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Samodhānetvāti sammadeva odahitvā
tika-s0203t0:145_2: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne asaṅkarato vavatthapetvā. Sukathitaṃ nāma hoti kathetabbassa
tika-s0203t0:148_0: 74. Yathā heṭṭhimasopānaphalakaṃ orohantassa pacchimaṃ nāma hoti, evaṃ ārohantassa
tika-s0203t0:148_1: paṭhamaṃ nāma hotīti vuttaṃ – “yāva pacchimasopānakaḷevarāti yāva paṭhamasopānaphalakā”ti.
tika-s0203t0:148_2: Vatthuṃ sodhetvāti vatthuvijjācariyena vuttavidhinā pāsādavatthuno sodhanavidhiṃ
tika-s0203t0:148_3: katvā. Etthāti pāsādakaraṇe. Sattadhā bhinnassa vālaggassa aṃsukoṭivedhako vālavedhi
tika-s0203t0:148_4: nāma. Ṭhānasampādananti vesākhamaṇḍalādīnaṃ sampādanaṃ. Muṭṭhikaraṇādīhīti usumuṭṭhikaraṇajiyāgāhajiyāvijjhādīhi.
tika-s0203t0:148_5: Evaṃ gaṇāpemāti ekaṃ nāma ekameva, dve dukā cattāri, tīṇi tikāni nava, cattāri catukkāni
tika-s0203t0:149: 75. Kerāṭikā hontīti samayassa anupakkiliṭṭhakaraṇamāyāsāṭheyyena samannāgatā honti. Taṃ damanaṃ jīvitahetupi nātikkamati, ayamassa jātidosābhāvo.
tika-s0203t0:150_1: samannāgamatthāya. Nanu ca khīṇāsavā sativepullappattā paññāvepullappattā ca, kathaṃ
tika-s0203t0:150_2: tassa satisampajaññaṃ payogasādhanīyaṃ pavattanti āha “dve hī”tiādi. Satatavihārīti
tika-s0203t0:150_3: satataṃ samāpattivihāribahulā, tasmā te icchiticchitakkhaṇe phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjanti.
tika-s0203t0:150_4: Vuttavipariyāyena nosatatavihārino daṭṭhabbā. Tenāha “tatthā”tiādi. Appetuṃ na sakkoti anāciṇṇabhāvato.
tika-s0203t0:151_0: Taṃ vitakkentoti “sāmaṇerassa senāsanaṃ natthi, araññañca sīhādīhi saparissayaṃ,
tika-s0203t0:151_1: kiṃ nu kho tassa bhavissatī”ti taṃ vitakkento. Evarūpoti ediso yathāvuttasāmaṇerasadiso
tika-s0203t0:151_2: khīṇāsavo. Ime dhammeti imasmiṃ sutte āgate sīlādidhamme. Āvajjitvāvāti attano parisuddhasīlatādiāvajjanahetu
tika-s0203t0:152: 78. “Yeme, bho gotamā”ti vacanassa sambandhaṃ dassetuṃ, “tathāgate kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Evanti “yeme, bho gotamā”tiādiākārehi vattumāraddho.
tika-s0203t0:153_0: Ajjadhammesūti apurātanadhammesu. Takkanamattāni hi tehi kappetvā sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:153_1: viracitāni. Purātanatāya paripuṇṇatāya ekantaniyyānikatāya ca paramo uttamo. Tenāha
tika-s0203t0:156_0: 79. Kammaṃyeva kammanto, so ettha atthīti kammakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ “kammanto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:156_1: Tenāha “kammantaṭṭhāna”nti. Tehi dhammehīti buddhaguṇehi. Te pana sabbaññutaññāṇappamukhāti
tika-s0203t0:156_2: katvā āha “sabbaññutaññāṇadhammehī”ti. Sabbena sabbanti sabbappakārena anavasesaṃ,
tika-s0203t0:156_3: ettako guṇānaṃ pakārabhedo, tesu kiñcipi pakāraṃ anavasesetvā. Sabbakoṭṭhāsehi sabbanti
tika-s0203t0:156_4: yattakā guṇabhāgā, tehi sabbehi anavasesaṃ nissesameva katvā. Yopi ahosīti yopi kosambivāsīnaṃ
tika-s0203t0:156_5: bhikkhūnaṃ vasena kosambiyaṃ kalaho ahosi. Sopi tattheva uppannaṭṭhāneyeva uppannamatto
tika-s0203t0:156_6: vūpasamito. Parinibbutakāle panassāti assa sammāsambuddhassa parinibbutakāle pana.
tika-s0203t0:156_7: Bhiyyosomattāya bhikkhū samaggā jātā, kathañca saṃvego jātoti dassetuṃ “aṭṭhasaṭṭhī”tiādi
tika-s0203t0:156_8: vuttaṃ. Sātisayaṃ abhiṇhañca upasamappattiyā ativiya upasantupasantā. Anusaṃyāyamānoti
tika-s0203t0:156_9: anu anu sammadeva jānanto vicārento vosāsamāno. “Anusaññāyamāno”ti vā pāṭho. Tattha
tika-s0203t0:157_0: 80. Heṭṭhimapucchamevāti gopakamoggallānena pucchitapucchameva. So hi “tehi dhammehī”tiādinā,
tika-s0203t0:157_1: “atthi koci tumhākaṃ sāsanassa sārabhūto bhikkhū”ti pucchi. Ayañca tameva “paṭisaraṇo”ti
tika-s0203t0:157_2: pariyāyena pucchi. Appaṭisaraṇeti yaṃ tumhe bhikkhuṃ paṭibodheyyātha, tādisassa abhāvena
tika-s0203t0:157_3: appaṭisaraṇe. Tathāgatena pavedito dhammo paṭisaraṇaṃ etesanti dhammapaṭisaraṇā.
tika-s0203t0:158_1: ajjhācāre āpattisamaññāti āha – “āpatti…pe… āṇātikkamanamevā”ti. Yathādhammanti dhammānurūpaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:158_2: Yathāsiṭṭhanti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ. Dhammo noti ettha no-saddo avadhāraṇe “na no samaṃ
tika-s0203t0:159_0: 83. “Yathā taṃ tumhādisehi rakkhakehi gopakehī”ti evaṃ pasannavesena attānaṃ ukkaṃsāpetukāmo.
tika-s0203t0:159_1: Ariyūpavādapāpaṃ khamāpane sati antarāyāya na hotīti āha – “iccetaṃ kusala”nti. Gonaṅgalamakkaṭoti gonaṅguṭṭhamakkaṭo.
tika-s0203t0:160_0: 84. Ayaṃ ukkaṃsāpetuṃ icchitaṃ yathāraddhamatthaṃ visaṃvādeti avaṇṇitampi vaṇṇitaṃ
tika-s0203t0:160_1: katvā kathento; imassa vacanassa paṭikkhepena iminā dātabbapiṇḍapātassa antarāyo
tika-s0203t0:160_2: mā hotūti evaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ rakkhituṃ na kho pana sakkāti yojanā. Idanti “na kho, brāhmaṇa,
tika-s0203t0:160_3: so bhagavā”tiādidesanaṃ. Abbhantaraṃ karitvāti nibbānantogadhaṃ katvā, antaraṃ vā
tika-s0203t0:160_4: tassa nijjhānassa kāraṇaṃ katvā. Kāmarāgavasena hi taṃ nijjhānaṃ hotīti. Idhāti imasmiṃ
tika-s0203t0:160_5: suttapadese. Sabbasaṅgāhikajjhānanti lokiyalokuttarassa antarāyo mā hotūti evaṃ katvāpi
tika-s0203t0:160_6: rūpāvacarassa maggajhānassa phalajhānassāti sabbassapi saṅgaṇhanavasena desitattā
tika-s0203t0:161_0: Yaṃ no mayanti ettha noti nipātamattaṃ. Taṃ noti ettha pana noti amhākanti attho.
tika-s0203t0:161_2: paripuṇṇaṃ katvā vuttampi atthaṃ anupadhārento āha – “ekadesameva kathesī”ti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0203t0:164_0: 85. Tasmiṃ ahūti tasmiṃ ahanīti āha “tasmiṃ divase”ti. Anasanenāti sabbaso āhārassa
tika-s0203t0:164_1: abhuñjanena sāsanikasīlena bāhirakaanasanena upetā hutvāti yojanā. Vā-saddena khīrapānamadhusāyanādividhiṃ
tika-s0203t0:164_2: saṅgaṇhāti. Upecca vasitabbato uposatho, pātimokkhuddeso. Upetena samannāgatena hutvā
tika-s0203t0:164_3: vasitabbato santāne vāsetabbato uposatho, sīlaṃ. Anasanādidhammādiṃ vā upecca vasanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:164_4: upavāso uposatho. Tathārūpe hatthijātivisese uposathoti samaññāmattanti āha – “uposatho
tika-s0203t0:164_5: nāma nāgarājātiādīsu paññattī”ti. Vuttanayena upavasanti etthāti uposatho, divaso.
tika-s0203t0:164_6: So panesa uposatho. Māsapuṇṇatāyāti māsassa pūritabhāvena. Sampuṇṇāti sabbaso puṇṇā.
tika-s0203t0:164_7: Tāya hi rattiyā vasena māso anavasesato puṇṇo hoti. Māsaddhamāsādibhedaṃ kālaṃ māti
tika-s0203t0:164_8: minanto viya hotīti ca “mā”iti cando vuccati. Etthāti etissā rattiyā. Puṇṇo paripuṇṇakalo
tika-s0203t0:164_9: jātoti puṇṇamā. Tañhi candapāripūriyā māsapāripūriyā evamāha. Etena tassa uposathabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0203t0:165_0: Dissati phalaṃ sandissatīti deso, hetūti āha “desanti kāraṇa”nti. Sabbaṃ kathenti
tika-s0203t0:165_1: sabbaṃ attanā pariggahitappakāraṃ kathenti. Kathetuṃ na sakkonti avisayattā. Pāsādapariveṇeti
tika-s0203t0:165_2: pāsādassa purato vivaṭaṅgaṇe. Heṭṭhā vuttanayenāti sekhasutte vuttanayena vitthāretabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:166_0: 86. Ime nu khoti ettha nūti saṃsayajotanoti āha – “vimatipucchā viya kathitā”ti.
tika-s0203t0:166_1: Jānantenātiādi pucchāvattadassanaparaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na pucchakassa satthu attano ajānanabhāvadīpanaparaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:166_2: Jānāti hi bhagavā. Ajānantena viya hutvā pucchite. Yathābhūtasabhāvaṃ jānanto viya
tika-s0203t0:166_3: pucchati kohaññe ṭhatvā. Tenāha – “thero evarūpaṃ vacanaṃ kiṃ karissatī”ti kāraṇassa
tika-s0203t0:167_0: Chandamūlakāti taṇhāchandamūlakā. Taṇhā hi dukkhasamudayo. Kusalasañño vā thiravisadanipuṇasañño
tika-s0203t0:167_1: vā, kusalasaṅkhāro vā tikhiṇathiravisadasaṅkhāro vā; suvisuddhavipulodāraviññāṇo
tika-s0203t0:167_2: vāti imamatthaṃ “saññādīsupi eseva nayo”ti iminā atidisati. Kasmā panettha anāgatakālavaseneva
tika-s0203t0:168_1: atthānaṃ “khandho”ti ayaṃ samaññā. Kittakenāti kiṃparimāṇena atthena, rāsatthabhāgatthādīsu
tika-s0203t0:169_0: Hetuhetūti hetupaccayabhūto hetu. Yo hi lobhādīnaṃ sahajātadhammesu mūlaṭṭhenupakārakabhāvo
tika-s0203t0:169_1: nippariyāyena hetuttho; so pathavīādīsupi paccayabhāvamattena hetupariyāyadassanato
tika-s0203t0:169_2: dutiyena hetu-saddena visesetvā vutto “hetuhetū”ti. Avijjā puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ
tika-s0203t0:169_4: hetuso vipāka”nti ettha vijjamānesupi aññesu paccayesu iṭṭhāniṭṭhavipākaniyāmakattā
tika-s0203t0:169_5: kammaṃ tassa padhānakāraṇanti āha – “kusalākusalaṃ attano attano vipākadāne uttamahetū”ti.
tika-s0203t0:169_6: “Mahābhūtā hetū”ti ayamevattho “mahābhūtā paccayo”ti imināpi vuttoti hetusaddapaccayasaddānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:169_7: samānatthattā paccayo eva hetu paccayahetu, yo ca rūpakkhandhassa hetu, so eva tassa
tika-s0203t0:169_8: paññāpanāya paccayoti vuttoti āha – “idha paccayahetu adhippeto”ti. Yadaggena paccayadhammo
tika-s0203t0:169_9: attano paccayuppannassa uppādāya ṭhitiyā ca paccayo, tadaggena tassa bhāvato samaññāto
tika-s0203t0:169_10: paññāpanāyapi so paccayoti vattabbataṃ arahatīti. Pāḷiyaṃ avibhāgena vuttamatthaṃ
tika-s0203t0:169_11: vibhāgena dassetuṃ, “tattha pathavīdhātū”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha paññāpanāyāti sahetuahetukantiādiākārehi
tika-s0203t0:169_12: bodhanāya. Taṃ pana sabbodhanaṃ ñāṇena dassanaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ “dassanatthāyā”ti.
tika-s0203t0:170_0: Phassoti phassasamaṅgībhāvo. So cettha sakiccanipphādanasamatthassa phassassa nibbatti.
tika-s0203t0:170_1: Nibbatto hi phasso tathārūpāya vedanāya paccayo hotīti. Etadatthamevettha bhagavatā
tika-s0203t0:170_2: puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā katā, tasmā paccuppannātītakālavasena dvikāliko phassasaddo
tika-s0203t0:170_3: veditabbo. Phasse sati vedeti phassapaccayā vedanāicceva vuttaṃ hoti. Sesapadadvayepi
tika-s0203t0:170_4: eseva nayo. Yatheva hi vedanāya evaṃ saññāya saṅkhārānampi phasso visesapaccayo tasmiṃ
tika-s0203t0:170_5: asati abhāvato. Cetanāggahaṇena āyūhanānurūpatāya tappadhānattā saṅkhārakkhandhadhammā
tika-s0203t0:170_6: gahitā. Tathā hi suttantabhājanīye saṅkhārakkhandhabhājanīye ca “cakkhusamphassajā
tika-s0203t0:170_7: cetanā”tiādinā cetanāva niddiṭṭhā. Viññāṇakkhandhassāti ettha ekasmiṃ bhave ādibhūtaviññāṇassa
tika-s0203t0:170_8: nāmarūpapaccayataṃ dassetuṃ, “paṭisandhiviññāṇena tāvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha gabbhaseyyakassa
tika-s0203t0:170_9: sabhāvakassa rūpapavattiṃ sandhāya “uparimaparicchedenā”ti vuttaṃ samatiṃsato upari
tika-s0203t0:170_10: paṭisandhikkhaṇe tassa rūpānaṃ asambhavato. Idāni pavattiviññāṇassa nāmarūpapaccayaṃ
tika-s0203t0:170_11: dvāravasena dassetuṃ, “cakkhudvāre”tiādi vuttaṃ. Nanu ca viññāṇassapi phasso paccayo,
tika-s0203t0:170_12: kasmā tayo eva khandhā phassapaccayā vuttāti? Saccametaṃ, yathā pana viññāṇasahito
tika-s0203t0:170_13: phasso vedanādīnaṃ paccayo, na evaṃ viññāṇassa. Tenāha bhagavā – “tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati
tika-s0203t0:170_14: phasso”ti phasso viya nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇassa visesapaccayo yathā nāmarūpapaccayāpi
tika-s0203t0:170_15: viññāṇanti. Tasmā imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ nāmarūpasseva viññāṇapaccayatā vuttā, na phassassa.
tika-s0203t0:171_0: 87. Yāva sakkāyadiṭṭhi samuppajjati, tāva vaṭṭassa pariyanto natthevāti appahīnasakkāyadiṭṭhiko
tika-s0203t0:171_1: vaṭṭe paribbhamatīti āha – “kathaṃ pana, bhanteti vaṭṭaṃ pucchanto”ti. Yathā ca sakkāyadiṭṭhijotanā
tika-s0203t0:171_2: vaṭṭapucchā, evaṃ tabbhedanajotanā vivaṭṭapucchāti āha – “sakkāyadiṭṭhi na hotīti
tika-s0203t0:172_0: 88. Ayaṃ rūpe assādoti yāthāvato dassanaṃ pariññābhisamayo, dukkhasaccapariyāpannañca
tika-s0203t0:172_1: rūpanti āha – “iminā pariññāpaṭivedho ceva dukkhasaccañca kathita”nti. “Yaṃ rūpaṃ
tika-s0203t0:172_2: anicca”ntiādivacanato aniccādibhāvo tattha ādīnavo, so cassa paccayādhīnavuttitāya
tika-s0203t0:172_6: ceva nirodhasaccañcā”ti. Imesu tīsu ṭhānesūti yathāvuttesu dukkhādīsu tīsu abhisamayaṭṭhānesu.
tika-s0203t0:172_7: Ye sammādiṭṭhiādayo dhammāti ye ariyamaggasaññitā sammādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha, satta vā
tika-s0203t0:172_8: dhammā. Bhāvanāpaṭivedho maggasaccanti bhāvanābhisamayavasena pavattaṃ maggasaccaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:173_0: 89. Imasminti āsannapaccakkhatāya sakaattabhāvo gahito, tadeva ajjhattā khandhāti
tika-s0203t0:173_1: tappaṭiyogitāya, “bahiddhāti parassa saviññāṇake kāye”ti vuttaṃ. Sabbanimittesūti
tika-s0203t0:173_2: sabbesu rūpanimittādīsupi. Tāni pana indriyabaddhānipi anindriyabaddhānipi taṃsabhāvānīti
tika-s0203t0:173_4: avinābhāvatoti, “saviññāṇake kāye”ti vuttaṃ. “Kāyo”ti vā khandhasamūhoti attho.
tika-s0203t0:174_0: 90. Anattani ṭhatvāti attarahite anattasabhāve khandhakoṭṭhāse ṭhatvā taṃ ādhāraṃ
tika-s0203t0:174_1: katvā katāni kammāni. Katarasmiṃ attani ṭhatvāti kīdise attani nissayavipākaṃ dassanti
tika-s0203t0:174_2: vipaccissanti. Etena kārakavedakarahitattā attapakkhakammakāni na yujjantīti dasseti,
tika-s0203t0:174_3: khandhānaṃ khaṇikattā ca katanāsaakatabbhāgamadoso ca āpajjatīti.
tika-s0203t0:175_1: khaṇe khaṇe hi nirujjhanasabhāvesu saṅkhāresu ko hanti, ko vā haññati, yadi cittacetasikasantāno,
tika-s0203t0:175_2: so arūpattā na chedanabhedanādivasena vikopanasamattho, napi vikopanīyo. Atha rūpasantāno,
tika-s0203t0:175_3: so acetanattā kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamoti na tattha chedanādinā pāṇātipātāpuññaṃ pasavati
tika-s0203t0:175_4: yathā matasarīre. Payogopi pāṇātipātassa paharaṇappahārādiko atītesu vā saṅkhāresu
tika-s0203t0:175_5: bhaveyya, anāgatesu, paccuppannesu vā, tattha na tāva atītānāgatesu sambhavati tesaṃ
tika-s0203t0:175_6: abhāvato, paccuppannesu ca saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikattā saraseneva nirujjhanasabhāvatāya
tika-s0203t0:175_7: vināsābhimukhesu nippayojano payogo siyā, vināsassa ca kāraṇarahitattā na paharaṇappahārādippayogahetukaṃ
tika-s0203t0:175_8: maraṇaṃ, nirīhakatāya ca saṅkhārānaṃ kassa so payogo? Khaṇikattā vadhādhippāyasamakālabhijjanakassa
tika-s0203t0:176_0: Vuccateyathāvuttavadhakacetanāsahito saṅkhārapuñjo sattasaṅkhāto hanti. Tena pavattitavadhappayoganimittaṃ
tika-s0203t0:176_2: uppajjanāraho rūpārūpadhammasamūho haññati, kevalo vā cittacetasikasantāno. Vadhappayogāvisayabhāvepi
tika-s0203t0:176_4: tannibbattitavibandhakavisadirūpuppattiyā vigate vicchedo hotīti na pāṇātipātassa
tika-s0203t0:176_5: asambhavo; nāpi ahetuko pāṇātipāto, na ca payogo nippayojano paccuppannesu saṅkhāresu
tika-s0203t0:176_6: katappayogavasena tadanantaraṃ uppajjanārahassa saṅkhārakalāpassa tathā anuppattito.
tika-s0203t0:176_7: Khaṇikānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikamaraṇassa idha maraṇabhāvena anadhippetattā santatimaraṇassa
tika-s0203t0:176_8: ca yathāvuttanayena sahetukabhāvato na ahetukaṃ maraṇaṃ; na ca katturahito pāṇātipātappayogo
tika-s0203t0:176_9: nirīhakesupi saṅkhāresu sannihitatāmattena upakārakesu attano attano anurūpaphaluppādane
tika-s0203t0:176_10: niyatesu kāraṇesu kattuvohārasiddhito yathā – “padīpo pakāseti, nisākaro candimā”ti.
tika-s0203t0:176_11: Na ca kevalassa vacādhippāyasahabhuno cittacetasikakalāpassa pāṇātipāto icchito santānavasena
tika-s0203t0:176_12: avaṭṭhitasseva paṭijānanato; santānavasena pavattamānānañca padīpādīnaṃ atthakiriyasiddhi
tika-s0203t0:176_13: dissatīti attheva pāṇātipātena kammunā baddho; tato eva yasmiṃ santāne pāṇātipātacetanā
tika-s0203t0:176_14: pavattā; tattheva santāne paccayantarasamavāyena bhavantare nirayādīsu tassā phalappavattīti
tika-s0203t0:176_15: nattheva katavināso akatabbhāgamo ca. Iminā nayena adinnādānādīnañca vasena yathārahaṃ
tika-s0203t0:177_0: Sabbo diṭṭhiggāho taṇhāvasagatasseva hotīti āha “taṇhādhipateyyenā”ti. Tesu tesu
tika-s0203t0:177_1: dhammesūti mayā desiyamānadassanadhammesu. Pakatikammaṭṭhānanti tassa therassa santike
tika-s0203t0:177_2: gahetvā parihariyamānakammaṭṭhānaṃ. Aññaṃ navakammaṭṭhānanti bhagavato desanānusārena
tika-s0203t0:177_3: gahitaṃ aññaṃ navaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0203t0:180_0: 91. Tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūtanti āmeḍitavacanaṃ byāpanicchāvasena vuttanti āha – “yaṃ
tika-s0203t0:180_1: yaṃ disa”ntiādi. Anuviloketvāti ettha anusaddopi byāpanicchāyamevāti anu anu viloketvāti
tika-s0203t0:180_2: attho. Tenevāha – “tato tato viloketvā”ti. Asanto nīco purisoti asappurisoti āha
tika-s0203t0:180_3: – “pāpapuriso lāmakapuriso”ti. Soti asappuriso. Tanti asappurisaṃ jānituṃ na sakkoti
tika-s0203t0:180_5: Asappurise bhatti etassāti asappurisabhatti. Tenāha – “asappurisasevano”ti. Asappurisadhammo
tika-s0203t0:180_6: asappuriso uttarapadalopena, tesaṃ cintanasīloti asappurisacintī. Tenāha “asappurisacintāya
tika-s0203t0:180_7: cintako”ti, duccintitacintīti attho. Asappurisamantananti asādhujanavicāraṃ asappurisavīmaṃsaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:180_8: Asappurisavācanti catubbidhaṃ dubbhāsitaṃ. Asappurisakammaṃ nāma tividhampi kāyaduccaritaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:180_9: Asappurisadiṭṭhi nāma visesato dasavatthukā micchādiṭṭhi, tāya samannāgato asappurisadiṭṭhiyā
tika-s0203t0:180_10: samannāgato, asappurisadānaṃ nāma asakkaccadānādi. Sabbopāyamattho pāḷito eva viññāyati.
tika-s0203t0:181_0: “Pāṇaṃ hanissāmī”tiādikā cetanā kāmaṃ parabyābādhāyapi hotiyeva, yathā pana sā attano
tika-s0203t0:181_1: balavataradukkhatthāya hoti, tathā na parassāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ, “attano dukkhatthāya
tika-s0203t0:181_2: cinteti”icceva vutto. Yathā asuko asukantiādīhi pāpako pāpavipākekadesaṃ balavaṃ
tika-s0203t0:181_3: garutaraṃ vā paccanubhontopi yathā paro paccanubhoti, na tathā sayanti dasseti. Tenāha
tika-s0203t0:182_0: Asakkaccanti anādaraṃ katvā. Deyyadhammassa asakkaraṇaṃ appasannākāro, puggalassa
tika-s0203t0:182_1: asakkaraṇaṃ agarukaraṇanti imamatthaṃ dassento, “deyyadhammaṃ na sakkaroti nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0203t0:182_2: Acittīkatvāti na citte katvā, na pūjetvāti attho. Pūjento hi pūjetabbavatthuṃ citte
tika-s0203t0:182_3: ṭhapeti, tato na bahi karoti. Cittaṃ vā acchariyaṃ katvā paṭipatti cittīkaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0203t0:182_6: Rogaṃ pakkhipanto viyāti rogikasarīraṃ odanādīhi pamajjitvā vammike rogaṃ pakkhipanto
tika-s0203t0:182_7: viya. Addhā imassa dānassa phalaṃ mameva āgacchatīti evaṃ yassa tathā diṭṭhi atthi,
tika-s0203t0:182_8: so āgamanadiṭṭhiko, ayaṃ pana na tādisoti āha “anāgamanadiṭṭhiko”ti. Tenāha – “no
tika-s0203t0:183_0: Kāmañcāyaṃ yathāvuttapuggalo asaddhammādīhi pāpadhammehi samannāgato, tehi pana sabbehipi
tika-s0203t0:183_1: micchādassanaṃ mahāsāvajjanti dassetuṃ, “tāya micchādiṭṭhiyā niraye upapajjatī”ti
tika-s0203t0:183_2: vuttaṃ. Vuttapaṭipakkhanayenāti kaṇhapakkhe vuttassa atthassa vipariyāyena sukkapakkhe
tika-s0203t0:183_3: attho veditabbo. “Sadevakaṃ loka”ntiādīsu devasaddo chakāmāvacaradevesu, evamidhāti
tika-s0203t0:183_4: āha “chakāmāvacaradevā”ti. Tattha brahmānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā kāmāvacaradevaggahaṇanti
tika-s0203t0:183_5: ce? Idha dānaphalassa adhippetattā kāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ, tatthāpi chakāmāvacaraggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0203t0:183_6: daṭṭhabbaṃ devamahattatādivacanato. Tiṇṇaṃ kulānaṃ sampattīti khattiyamahattādīnaṃ
tika-s0203t0:183_7: tiṇṇaṃ kulānaṃ sampatti, na kevalaṃ kulasampadā eva adhippetā, atha kho tattha āyuvaṇṇayasabhogaissariyādisampadāpi
tika-s0203t0:183_8: adhippetāti daṭṭhabbaṃ uḷārassa dānamayapuññassa vasena tesampi samijjhanato. Suddhavaṭṭavaseneva
tika-s0203t0:183_9: kathitaṃ sukkapakkhepi sabbaso vivaṭṭassa anāmaṭṭhattā. Saddhādayo hi lokiyakusalasambhārā
tika-s0203t0:187_0: 93. Iddhimāti guṇo pākaṭo paratoghosena vinā pāsādakampanadevacārikādīhi sayameva
tika-s0203t0:187_1: pakāsabhāvato; dhutavādādiguṇānampi tathābhāve eteneva nayena tesaṃ guṇānaṃ pākaṭayogato
tika-s0203t0:187_2: ca paresaṃ nicchitabhāvato ca. Paññavato guṇāti paññāpabhedapabhāvite guṇavisese
tika-s0203t0:187_3: sandhāya vadati. Te hi yebhuyyena paresaṃ avisayā. Tenāha – “na sakkā akathitā jānitu”nti.
tika-s0203t0:187_4: Visabhāgā sabhāgā nāma ayonisomanasikārabahulesu puthujjanesu, te pana appahīnarāgadosatāya
tika-s0203t0:187_5: parassa vijjamānampi guṇaṃ makkhetvā avijjamānaṃ avaṇṇameva ghosentīti āha – “visabhāga…pe… kathentī”ti.
tika-s0203t0:188_0: Yā aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato ādīnavato yathābhūtaṃ
tika-s0203t0:188_1: pajānanā, ayaṃ dhātukusalatā. Āyatanakusalatāyapi eseva nayo. Avijjādīsu dvādasasu
tika-s0203t0:188_2: paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu kosallaṃ paṭiccasamuppādakusalatā. Idaṃ imassa phalassa ṭhānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:188_3: kāraṇaṃ, idaṃ aṭṭhānaṃ akāraṇanti evaṃ ṭhānañca ṭhānato, aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ
tika-s0203t0:188_4: pajānanā, ayaṃ ṭhānāṭṭhānakusalatā. Yo pana imesu dhātuādīsu pariññābhisamayādivasena
tika-s0203t0:188_5: nissaṅgagatiyā paṇḍāti laddhanāmena ñāṇena ito gato pavatto, ayaṃ paṇḍito nāmāti
tika-s0203t0:188_6: āha – “imehi catūhi kāraṇehi paṇḍito”ti. Mahantānaṃ atthānaṃ pariggaṇhanato mahatī
tika-s0203t0:188_7: paññā etassāti mahāpañño. Sesapadesupi eseva nayoti āha – “mahāpaññādīhi samannāgatoti attho”ti.
tika-s0203t0:189_0: Nānattanti yāhi mahāpaññādīhi samannāgatattā thero “mahāpañño”tiādinā kittīyati,
tika-s0203t0:189_1: tāsaṃ mahāpaññādīnaṃ idaṃ nānattaṃ ayaṃ vemattatā. Yassa kassaci visesato arūpadhammassa
tika-s0203t0:189_2: mahattaṃ nāma kiccasiddhiyā veditabbanti tadassa kiccasiddhiyā dassento, “mahante
tika-s0203t0:189_3: sīlakkhandhe pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā”tiādimāha. Tattha hetumahantatāya paccayamahantatāya
tika-s0203t0:189_5: ca sīlakkhandhassa mahantabhāvo veditabbo. Tattha hetū alobhādayo, paccayā hirottappasaddhāsativīriyādayo.
tika-s0203t0:189_7: Pabhedo cārittādivibhāgo. Kiccaṃ tadaṅgādivasena paṭipakkhassa vidhamanaṃ. Phalaṃ
tika-s0203t0:189_8: saggasampadā nibbānasampadā ca. Ānisaṃso piyamanāpatādi. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro
tika-s0203t0:189_9: pana visuddhimagge ākaṅkheyyasuttādīsu ca āgatanayena veditabbo. Iminā nayena samādhikkhandhādīnampi
tika-s0203t0:189_10: mahantatā yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā veditabbā, ṭhānāṭṭhānādīnaṃ pana mahantabhāvo mahāvisayatāya
tika-s0203t0:189_11: veditabbo. Tattha ṭhānāṭṭhānānaṃ mahāvisayatā bahudhātukasutte sayameva āgamissati.
tika-s0203t0:189_12: Vihārasamāpattīnaṃ samādhikkhandhe niddhāritanayena veditabbā, ariyasaccānaṃ sakalasāsanasaṅgahaṇato
tika-s0203t0:189_13: saccavibhaṅge taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāsu āgatanayena. Satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ vibhaṅgādīsu taṃsaṃvaṇṇanādīsu
tika-s0203t0:189_14: ca āgatanayena. Sāmaññaphalānaṃ mahato hitassa mahato sukhassa mahato atthassa mahato
tika-s0203t0:189_16: ca. Abhiññānaṃ mahāsambhārato mahāvisayato mahākiccato mahānubhāvato mahānipphattito
tika-s0203t0:190_0: Puthupaññāti etthāpi vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – nānākhandhesu
tika-s0203t0:190_1: ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti, “ayaṃ rūpakkhandho nāma…pe… ayaṃ viññāṇakkhandho nāmā”ti, evaṃ
tika-s0203t0:190_2: pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati. Tesupi “ekavidhena rūpakkhandho,
tika-s0203t0:190_3: ekādasavidhena rūpakkhandho, ekavidhena vedanākkhandho, bahuvidhena vedanākkhandho,
tika-s0203t0:190_4: ekavidhena saññākkhandho…pe… ekavidhena viññāṇakkhandho, bahuvidhena viññāṇakkhandho”ti
tika-s0203t0:190_5: evaṃ ekekassa khandhassa ekavidhādivasena atītādibhedavasenapi nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca
tika-s0203t0:190_6: ñāṇaṃ pavattati. Tathā “idaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ nāma…pe… idaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ nāma. Tattha
tika-s0203t0:190_7: dasāyatanā kāmāvacarā, dve catubhūmakā”ti evaṃ āyatananānattaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0203t0:191_0: Nānādhātūsūti “ayaṃ cakkhudhātu nāma…pe… ayaṃ manoviññāṇadhātu nāma. Tattha soḷasa
tika-s0203t0:191_1: dhātuyo kāmāvacarā, dve catubhūmakā”ti evaṃ nānādhātūsu paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0203t0:191_2: Tayidaṃ upādiṇṇakadhātuvasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Paccekabuddhānañhi dvinnañca aggasāvakānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:191_3: upādiṇṇakadhātūsuyeva nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati. Tañca kho ekadesatova,
tika-s0203t0:191_4: no nippadesato, anupādiṇṇakadhātūnaṃ pana nānākaraṇaṃ na jānantiyeva. Sabbaññubuddhānaṃyeva
tika-s0203t0:191_5: pana, “imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā imassa rukkhassa khandho seto hoti, imassa kaṇho,
tika-s0203t0:191_6: imassa bahalattaco, imassa tanuttaco, imassa pattaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena evarūpaṃ,
tika-s0203t0:191_7: imassa pupphaṃ nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitaṃ odātaṃ sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ, phalaṃ khuddakaṃ
tika-s0203t0:191_8: mahantaṃ dīghaṃ vaṭṭaṃ susaṇṭhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ pharusaṃ sugandhaṃ madhuraṃ tittakaṃ ambilaṃ
tika-s0203t0:191_9: kaṭukaṃ kasāvaṃ, kaṇṭako tikhiṇo atikhiṇo ujuko kuṭilo lohito odāto hotī”ti dhātunānattaṃ
tika-s0203t0:192_0: Atthesūti rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu. Nānāpaṭiccasamuppādesūti ajjhattabahiddhābhedato santānabhedato
tika-s0203t0:192_1: ca nānappabhedesu paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu. Avijjādiaṅgānañhi paccekaṃ paṭiccasamuppādasaññitāti.
tika-s0203t0:192_2: Tenāha – saṅkhārapiṭake “dvādasa paccayā dvādasa paṭiccasamuppādā”ti. Nānāsuññatamanupalabbhesūti
tika-s0203t0:192_3: nānāsabhāvesu niccasārādivirahato suññasabhāvesu, tato eva itthipurisaattaattaniyādivasena
tika-s0203t0:192_4: anupalabbhesu sabhāvesu. Ma-kāro hettha padasandhikaro. Nānāatthesūti atthapaṭisambhidāvisayesu
tika-s0203t0:192_6: Niruttīsūti tesaṃyeva atthadhammānaṃ niddhāraṇavacanasaṅkhātāsu nānāniruttīsu. Paṭibhānesūti
tika-s0203t0:192_7: ettha atthapaṭisambhidādīsu visayabhūtesu, “imāni idamatthajotakānī”ti tathā tathā
tika-s0203t0:192_8: paṭibhānato paṭibhānānīti laddhanāmesu ñāṇesu. Puthu nānāsīlakkhandhesūtiādīsu sīlassa
tika-s0203t0:192_9: puthuttaṃ nānattañca vuttameva. Itaresaṃ pana vuttanayānusārena suviññeyyattā pākaṭameva.
tika-s0203t0:192_10: Yaṃ pana abhinnaṃ ekameva nibbānaṃ, tattha upacāravasena puthuttaṃ gahetabbanti āha
tika-s0203t0:193_0: Evaṃ visayavasena paññāya mahattaṃ puthuttañca dassetvā idāni sampayuttadhammavasena
tika-s0203t0:193_1: hāsabhāvaṃ, pavattiākāravasena javanabhāvaṃ, kiccavasena tikkhādibhāvañca dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t0:193_2: “katamā hāsapaññā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha hāsabahuloti pītibahulo. Sesapadāni tasseva
tika-s0203t0:193_3: vevacanāni. Sīlaṃ paripūretīti haṭṭhapahaṭṭho udaggudaggo hutvā pītisahagatāya paññāya.
tika-s0203t0:193_4: Pītisomanassasahagatā hi paññā abhirativasena ārammaṇe phullā vikasitā viya pavattati;
tika-s0203t0:193_5: na upekkhāsahagatāti pātimokkhasīlaṃ ṭhapetvā hāsanīyaṃ paraṃ tividhampi sīlaṃ paripūretīti
tika-s0203t0:193_6: attho. Visuṃ vuttattā puna sīlakkhandhamāha. Samādhikkhandhantiādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0203t0:194_0: Rūpaṃ aniccato khippaṃ javatīti rūpakkhandhaṃ aniccanti sīghaṃ vegena pavattiyā paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena
tika-s0203t0:194_1: pubbābhisaṅkhārassa sātisayattā indena vissaṭṭhavajiraṃ viya lakkhaṇaṃ paṭivijjhantī
tika-s0203t0:194_2: adandhāyantī rūpakkhandhe aniccalakkhaṇaṃ vegasā paṭivijjhati, tasmā sā javanapaññā
tika-s0203t0:194_3: nāmāti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāvasena javanapaññaṃ
tika-s0203t0:194_4: dassetvā balavavipassanāvasena dassetuṃ, “rūpa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha khayaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0203t0:194_5: yattha yattha uppajjati, tattha tattheva bhijjanato khayasabhāvattā. Bhayaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0203t0:194_6: bhayānakabhāvato. Asārakaṭṭhenāti attasāravirahato niccasārādivirahato ca. Tulayitvāti
tika-s0203t0:194_7: tulābhūtāya vipassanāpaññāya tuletvā. Tīrayitvāti tāya eva tīraṇabhūtāya tīretvā.
tika-s0203t0:194_8: Vibhāvayitvāti yāthāvato pakāsetvā pañcakkhandhaṃ vibhūtaṃ katvā. Rūpanirodheti rūpakkhandhassa
tika-s0203t0:194_9: nirodhabhūte nibbāne ninnapoṇapabbhāravasena. Idāni sikhāppattavipassanāvasena javanapaññaṃ
tika-s0203t0:195_0: Ñāṇassa tikkhabhāvo nāma savisesaṃ paṭipakkhasamucchindanena veditabboti, “khippaṃ
tika-s0203t0:195_1: kilese chindatīti tikkhapaññā”ti vatvā te pana kilese vibhāgena dassento, “uppannaṃ
tika-s0203t0:195_2: kāmavitakka”ntiādimāha. Tikkhapañño hi khippābhiñño hoti, paṭipadā cassa na calatīti
tika-s0203t0:195_3: āha – “ekasmiṃ āsane cattāro ariyamaggā adhigatā hontī”tiādi.
tika-s0203t0:196_0: “Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā
tika-s0203t0:196_1: vayadhammā nirodhadhammā”ti yāthāvato dassanena saccasampaṭivedho ijjhati, na aññathāti
tika-s0203t0:196_3: vuttaṃ. Tattha ubbegabahuloti vuttanayena sabbasaṅkhāresu abhiṇhaṃ pavattasaṃvego.
tika-s0203t0:196_4: Uttāsabahuloti ñāṇutrāsavasena sabbasaṅkhāresu bahuso utrastamānaso. Tena ādīnavānupassanamāha.
tika-s0203t0:196_5: Ukkaṇṭhanabahuloti pana iminā nibbidānupassanaṃ āha – aratibahulotiādinā tassā eva
tika-s0203t0:196_6: aparāparuppattiṃ. Bahimukhoti sabbasaṅkhārato bahibhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ uddissa pavattañāṇamukho,
tika-s0203t0:196_7: tathā vā pavattitavimokkhamukho. Nibbijjhanaṃ nibbedho, so etissā atthi, nibbijjhatīti
tika-s0203t0:196_8: vā nibbedhā, sāva paññā nibbedhikā. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0203t0:197_0: Pajjati etena vipassanādikoti padaṃ, samāpatti, tasmā anupadanti anusamāpattiyoti
tika-s0203t0:197_1: attho. Padaṃ vā sammasanupagā dhammā vipassanāya pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato. Tenāha “samāpattivasena
tika-s0203t0:197_2: vā”ti. Jhānaṅgavasena vāti jhānaṅgavasenāti ca attho. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana kamattho
tika-s0203t0:197_3: idha padasaddo, tasmā anupadaṃ anukkamenāti ayamettha atthoti āha “anupaṭipāṭiyā”ti.
tika-s0203t0:197_5: Vipassatīti samāpattiyo jhānamukhena te te dhamme yāthāvato pariggahetvā, “itipi
tika-s0203t0:197_6: dukkhā”tiādinā sammasati. Addhamāsena arahattaṃ patto ukkaṃsagatassa sāvakānaṃ sammasanacārassa
tika-s0203t0:197_7: nippadesena pavattiyamānattā, sāvakapāramīñāṇassa ca tathā paṭipādetabbattā. Evaṃ
tika-s0203t0:197_8: santepīti yadipi mahāmoggallānatthero na cirasseva arahattaṃ patto; dhammasenāpati
tika-s0203t0:197_9: pana tato cirena, evaṃ santepi yasmā moggallānattheropi mahāpaññova, tasmā sāriputtattherova
tika-s0203t0:197_10: mahāpaññataroti. Idāni tamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ, “mahāmoggallānatthero hī”tiādi
tika-s0203t0:197_11: vuttaṃ. Sammasanaṃ carati etthāti sammasanacāro, vipassanābhūmi, taṃ sammasanacāraṃ.
tika-s0203t0:197_12: Ekadesamevāti sakaattabhāve saṅkhāre anavasesato pariggahetuñca sammasituñca asakkontaṃ
tika-s0203t0:197_13: attano abhinīhārasamudāgatañāṇabalānurūpaṃ ekadesameva pariggahetvā sammasanto. Nanu
tika-s0203t0:197_14: ca “sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā”ti
tika-s0203t0:197_15: vacanato vaṭṭadukkhato muccitukāmena sabbaṃ pariññeyyaṃ parijānitabbameva? Saccametaṃ,
tika-s0203t0:197_16: tañca kho sammasanupagadhammavasena vuttaṃ. Tasmā sasantānagate sabbadhamme, parasantānagate
tika-s0203t0:197_17: ca tesaṃ santānavibhāgaṃ akatvā bahiddhābhāvasāmaññato sammasanaṃ, ayaṃ sāvakānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:197_18: sammasanacāro. Thero pana bahiddhādhammepi santānavibhāgena keci keci uddharitvā
tika-s0203t0:197_19: sammasi, tañca kho ñāṇena phuṭṭhamattaṃ katvā. Tena vuttaṃ – “yaṭṭhikoṭiyā uppīḷento
tika-s0203t0:197_20: viya ekadesameva sammasanto”ti. Tattha ñāṇena nāma yāvatā neyyaṃ pavattitabbaṃ, tathā
tika-s0203t0:198_1: ca saṅkhārāti vadanti, koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesūti apare. Tathā hi addhattayavasena
tika-s0203t0:198_4: anindriyabaddhā ca sammasanacāroti vadanti, jambudīpavāsisattasantānagatāti keci.
tika-s0203t0:198_5: Dhammasenāpatinopi yathāvuttasāvakānaṃ vipassanābhūmiyeva sammasanacāro. Tattha pana
tika-s0203t0:198_6: thero sātisayaṃ niravasesaṃ anupadadhammaṃ vipassi. Tena vuttaṃ – “sāvakānaṃ sammasanacāraṃ
tika-s0203t0:199_0: Tattha “sāvakānaṃ vipassanābhūmī”ti ettha sukkhavipassakā lokiyābhiññappattā pakatisāvakā
tika-s0203t0:199_1: aggasāvakā paccekabuddhā sammāsambuddhāti chasu janesu sukkhavipassakānaṃ jhānābhiññāhi
tika-s0203t0:199_2: anadhigatapaññānepuññattā andhānaṃ viya icchitapadesokkamanaṃ vipassanākāle icchikicchitadhammavipassanā
tika-s0203t0:199_3: natthi. Te yathāpariggahitadhammamatteyeva ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhenti. Lokiyābhiññappattā
tika-s0203t0:199_4: pana pakatisāvakā yena mukhena vipassanaṃ ārabhanti; tato aññena vipassanaṃ vitthārikaṃ
tika-s0203t0:199_5: kātuṃ sakkonti vipulañāṇattā. Mahāsāvakā abhinīhārasampannattā tato sātisayaṃ vipassanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:199_6: vitthārikaṃ kātuṃ sakkonti. Aggasāvakesu dutiyo abhinīhārasampattiyā samādhānassa
tika-s0203t0:199_7: sātisayattā vipassanaṃ tatopi vitthārikaṃ karoti. Paṭhamo pana tato mahāpaññatāya
tika-s0203t0:199_8: sāvakehi asādhāraṇaṃ vitthārikaṃ karoti. Paccekabuddho tehipi mahābhinīhāratāya attano
tika-s0203t0:199_9: abhinīhārānurūpaṃ tatopi vitthārikavipassanaṃ karonti. Buddhānaṃ, sammadeva, paripūritapaññāpāramipabhāvita-sabbaññutaññāṇādhigamanassa
tika-s0203t0:199_10: anurūpāyāti. Yathā nāma katavālavedhaparicayena sarabhaṅgasadisena dhanuggahena khitto
tika-s0203t0:199_11: saro antarā rukkhalatādīsu asajjamāno lakkhaṇeyeva patati; na sajjati na virajjhati,
tika-s0203t0:199_12: evaṃ antarā asajjamānā avirajjhamānā vipassanā sammasanīyadhammesu yāthāvato nānānayehi
tika-s0203t0:199_13: pavattati. Yaṃ mahāñāṇanti vuccati, tassa pavattiākārabhedo gaṇato vuttoyeva.
tika-s0203t0:200_0: Etesu ca sukkhavipassakānaṃ vipassanācāro khajjotapabhāsadiso, abhiññappattapakatisāvakānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:200_3: upaṭṭhāsi. Tathā sukkhavipassakānaṃ vipassanācāro andhānaṃ yaṭṭhikoṭiyā gamanasadiso,
tika-s0203t0:201_0: Arahattañca kira patvāti ettha kira-saddo anussavaladdhoyamatthoti dīpetuṃ vutto.
tika-s0203t0:201_1: Patvā aññāsi attano vipassanācārassa mahāvisayattā tikkhavisadasūrabhāvassa ca sallakkhaṇena.
tika-s0203t0:201_2: Kathaṃ panāyaṃ mahāthero dandhaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇanto sīghaṃ arahattaṃ pattato paññāya
tika-s0203t0:201_3: attānaṃ sātisayaṃ katvā aññāsīti āha – “yathā hī”tiādi. Mahājaṭanti mahājālasākhaṃ
tika-s0203t0:201_4: ativiya sibbitajālaṃ. Yaṭṭhiṃ pana sāraṃ vā ujuṃ vā na labhati veṇuggahaṇe anuccinitvā
tika-s0203t0:201_5: veṇussa gahitattā. Evaṃsampadanti yathā tesu purisesu eko veḷuggahaṇe anuccinitvā
tika-s0203t0:201_6: veḷuyaṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, eko uccinitvā, evaṃ nipphattikaṃ. Padhānanti bhāvanānuyuñjanaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:202_0: Sattasaṭṭhi ñāṇānīti paṭisambhidāmagge āgatesu tesattatiyā ñāṇesu ṭhapetvā cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni
tika-s0203t0:202_1: sutamayañāṇādīni paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāñāṇapariyosānāni sattasaṭṭhi ñāṇāni. Tāni hi
tika-s0203t0:202_2: sāvakehi pavicitabbāni, na itarāni. Soḷasavidhaṃ paññanti mahāpaññādikā, navānupubbavihārasamāpattipaññāti
tika-s0203t0:203: Tatrāti tassa. Idaṃ hotīti idaṃ dāni vuccamānaṃ anupubbasammasanaṃ hoti. Vipassanākoṭṭhāsanti vitakkādisammasitabbadhammavibhāgena vibhattavipassanābhāgaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:204_0: 94. Paṭhame jhāneti upasilese bhummaṃ, tasmā ye paṭhame jhāne dhammāti ye paṭhamajjhānasaṃsaṭṭhā
tika-s0203t0:204_1: dhammāti attho. Antosamāpattiyanti ca samāpattisahagate cittuppāde samāpattisamaññaṃ
tika-s0203t0:204_2: āropetvā vuttaṃ. Vavatthitāti katavavatthanā nicchitā. Paricchinnāti ñāṇena paricchinnā
tika-s0203t0:204_3: salakkhaṇato paricchijja ñātā. Olokentoti ñāṇacakkhunā paccakkhato passanto. Abhiniropanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:204_4: ārammaṇe cittassa āropanaṃ. Anumajjanaṃ ārammaṇe cittassa anuvicāraṇaṃ. Pharaṇaṃ
tika-s0203t0:204_5: paṇītarūpehi kāyassa byāpanaṃ, vipphārikabhāvo vā. Sātanti sātamadhuratā. Adhikkhepo
tika-s0203t0:204_6: vikkhepassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ samādhānaṃ. Phusanaṃ indriyavisayaviññāṇassa tato uppajjitvā
tika-s0203t0:204_7: ārammaṇe phusanākārena viya pavatti. Vedayitaṃ ārammaṇānubhavanaṃ. Sañjānanaṃ nīlādivasena
tika-s0203t0:204_8: ārammaṇassa sallakkhaṇaṃ. Cetayitaṃ cetaso byāpāro. Vijānanaṃ ārammaṇūpaladdhi. Kattukamyatā
tika-s0203t0:204_9: cittassa ārammaṇena atthikatā. Tasmiṃ ārammaṇe adhimuccanaṃ, sanniṭṭhānaṃ vā adhimokkho.
tika-s0203t0:204_10: Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā cittassa paggaṇhanaṃ paggāho, adhiggahoti attho. Ārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0203t0:204_11: upagantvā ṭhānaṃ, anissajjanaṃ vā upaṭṭhānaṃ. Samappavattesu assesu sārathi viya
tika-s0203t0:204_12: sakiccapasutesu sampayuttesu ajjhupekkhanaṃ majjhattatā. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ ārammaṇe
tika-s0203t0:204_13: anunayanaṃ saṃcaraṇaṃ anunayo. Sabhāvatoti yathābhūtasabhāvato. Soḷasannaṃ eva cettha
tika-s0203t0:204_14: dhammānaṃ gahaṇaṃ tesaṃyeva therena vavatthāpitabhāvato, te evassa tadā upaṭṭhahiṃsu,
tika-s0203t0:204_15: na itareti vadanti. Vīriyasatiggahaṇena cettha indriyabhāvasāmaññato saddhāpaññā;
tika-s0203t0:204_16: satiggahaṇeneva ekantānavajjabhāvasāmaññato passaddhiādayo cha yugaḷā; alobhādosā
tika-s0203t0:204_17: ca saṅgahitā jhānacittuppādapariyāpannattā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ. Therena ca dhammā vavatthānasāmaññato
tika-s0203t0:204_18: āraddhā. Te na upaṭṭhahiṃsūti na sakkā vattunti apare.
tika-s0203t0:205_0: Viditā uppajjantīti uppādepi nesaṃ vedanānaṃ pajānanaṃ hotiyevāti attho. Sesapadadvayepi
tika-s0203t0:205_1: eseva nayo. Taṃ jānātīti taṃñāṇo, tassa bhāvo taṃñāṇatā, ñāṇassa attasaṃvedananti
tika-s0203t0:205_2: attho. Taṃsamānayogakkhamāhi sampayuttadhammā. Ñāṇabahutāti ñāṇassa bahubhāvo, ekacittuppāde
tika-s0203t0:205_3: anekañāṇatāti attho. Idāni tamevatthaṃ vivarituṃ, “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Na sakkā
tika-s0203t0:205_4: jānituṃ ārammaṇakaraṇassa abhāvato. Asammohāvabodho ca īdisassa ñāṇassa natthi. Ekekameva
tika-s0203t0:205_5: ñāṇaṃ uppajjati tasmiṃ khaṇe ekasseva āvajjanassa uppajjanato, na ca āvajjanena vinā
tika-s0203t0:207: Na tveva tepi jīvanti, dvīhi cittehi saṃyutā”ti. ca,
tika-s0203t0:209_0: Vatthārammaṇānaṃ pariggahitatāyāti yasmiñca ārammaṇe ye jhānadhammā pavattanti, tesaṃ
tika-s0203t0:209_1: vatthārammaṇānaṃ pageva ñāṇena paricchijja gahitattā. Yathā nāma migasūkarādīnaṃ
tika-s0203t0:209_2: āsayepariggahite tatra ṭhitā migā vā sūkarā vā tato uṭṭhānatopi āgamanatopi nesādassa
tika-s0203t0:209_3: sukhaggahaṇā honti, evaṃsampadamidaṃ. Tenāha “therena hī”tiādi. Tenāti vatthārammaṇānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:209_4: pariggahitabhāvena. Assāti therassa. Tesaṃ dhammānanti jhānacittuppādapariyāpannānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:209_5: dhammānaṃ. Uppādaṃ āvajjantassātiādinā uppādādīsu yaṃ yadeva ārabbha ñāṇaṃ uppajjati;
tika-s0203t0:209_6: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe tassa tasseva cassa pākaṭabhāvo dīpito. Na hi āvajjanena vinā
tika-s0203t0:209_7: ñāṇaṃ uppajjati. Ahutvā sambhontīti pubbe avijjamānā hutvā sambhavanti, anuppannā
tika-s0203t0:209_8: uppajjantīti attho. Udayaṃ passati tesaṃ dhammānaṃ, “ahutvā sambhontī”ti uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgibhāvadassanato.
tika-s0203t0:209_9: Pubbe abhāvabodhako hi attalābho dhammānaṃ udayo. Hutvāti uppajjitvā. Paṭiventīti
tika-s0203t0:209_10: paṭi khaṇe khaṇe vinassanti. Vayaṃ passati, “hutvā paṭiventī”ti tesaṃ dhammānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgibhāvadassanato.
tika-s0203t0:210_0: Tesu dhammesu natthi etassa upayo rāgavasena upagamananti anupayo, ananurodho. Hutvā
tika-s0203t0:210_1: viharatīti yojanā. Tathā natthi etassa apāyo paṭighavasena apagamananti anapāyo,
tika-s0203t0:210_2: avirodho. “Etaṃ mama, eso me atthā”ti tassa taṇhādiṭṭhiabhinivesābhāvato taṇhādiṭṭhinissayehi
tika-s0203t0:210_3: anissito. Appaṭibaddhoti anupayānissitabhāvato vipassanāya paribandhavasena chandarāgena
tika-s0203t0:210_4: na paṭibaddho na vibandhito. Vippamuttoti tato eva vikkhambhanavimuttivasena kāmarāgato
tika-s0203t0:211_0: Kilesamariyādā tena katā bhaveyyāti antosamāpattiyaṃ pavatte soḷasa dhamme ārabbha
tika-s0203t0:211_1: pavattamānaṃ vipassanāvīthiṃ bhinditvā sace rāgādayo uppajjeyyuṃ; tassa vipassanāvīthiyā
tika-s0203t0:211_2: kilesamariyādā tena cittena, cittasamaṅginā vā katā bhaveyya. Tesūti tesu dhammesu.
tika-s0203t0:211_3: Assāti therassa. Ekopīti rāgādīsu ekopīti ca vadanti. Vuttākārena ekaccānaṃ anāpāthagamane
tika-s0203t0:211_4: sati vipassanā na tesu dhammesu nirantarappavattāti ārammaṇamariyādā bhaveyya. Vikkhambhitapaccanīkattāti
tika-s0203t0:211_5: vipassanāya paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ pageva vikkhambhitattā idānipi vikkhambhetabbā kilesā natthīti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:212: Itoti paṭhamajjhānato. Anantaroti uparimo jhānādiviseso. Tassa pajānanassāti, “atthi uttari nissaraṇa”nti evaṃ pavattajānanassa. Bahulīkaraṇenāti punappunaṃ uppādanena.
tika-s0203t0:213: Sampasādanaṭṭhenāti kilesakālusiyāpagamanena, tassa vicārakkhobhavigamena vā cetaso sammadeva pāsādikabhāvena.
tika-s0203t0:214_0: Vīriyaṃ sati upekkhāti āgataṭṭhāne pārisuddhiupekkhā, adukkhamasukhāvedanāti ettha
tika-s0203t0:214_1: jhānupekkhāti, “sukhaṭṭhāne vedanupekkhāvā”ti vuttaṃ. Sukhaṭṭhāneti ca paṭhamajjhānādīsu
tika-s0203t0:214_2: sukhassa vuttaṭṭhāne. Passaddhattāti samadhuracetayitabhāvena ārammaṇe visaṭavitthatabhāvato
tika-s0203t0:214_3: yo so cetaso ābhogo vutto. Sāmaññaphalādīsu satiyā pārisuddhi, sā thana atthato sativinimuttā
tika-s0203t0:215_0: 95. Īdisesu ṭhānesu satiyā na kadācipi ñāṇaviraho atthīti āha – “ñāṇena sampajāno
tika-s0203t0:215_1: hutvā”ti. Tathā hi tatiyajjhāne, “satimā sukhavihārī”ti ettha sampajānoti ayamattho
tika-s0203t0:215_2: vutto eva hoti. Na sāvakānaṃ anupadadhammavipassanā hoti saṅkhārāvasesasukhumappavattiyā
tika-s0203t0:216: 96. Paññāya cassadisvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontīti dassanasamakālaṃ khīyamānā āsavā, “disvā parikkhīṇā hontī”ti vuttā. Samānakālepi hi ediso saddappayogo dissati –
tika-s0203t0:220_0: Evamādīsu. Hetuattho vā ayaṃ disvāsaddo asamānakattuko yathā – “ghataṃ pivitvā balaṃ
tika-s0203t0:220_1: hoti, sīhaṃ disvā bhayaṃ hotī”ti. Dassanahetuko hi āsavānaṃ parikkhayo pariññāsacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamaye
tika-s0203t0:220_2: sati pahānābhisamayassa labbhanato. Yuganaddhaṃ āharitvāti paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā
tika-s0203t0:220_3: vuṭṭhāya tattha jhānadhamme sammasanto samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāveti. Evaṃ
tika-s0203t0:220_4: yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha sammasanto samathavipassanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:220_5: yuganaddhaṃ katvā yathā thero arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “arahattaṃ
tika-s0203t0:220_6: pattavāro idha gahito”ti. Idhāti imasmiṃ sutte. Dīghanakhasuttadesanāya hi thero
tika-s0203t0:220_7: arahattaṃ patto. Tadā ca anāgāmī hutvā nirodhaṃ samāpajjatīti vacanaavasaro natthi,
tika-s0203t0:220_8: tasmā vuttaṃ – “arahattaṃ pattavāro idha gahito”ti. Yadi evaṃ – “sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:220_9: samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti idaṃ kasmā vuttanti? There
tika-s0203t0:220_10: vijjamāne paṇḍitaguṇe anavasesato dassetvā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpetuṃ.
tika-s0203t0:220_11: Nirodhasamāpajjanaṃ pana therassa āciṇṇasamāciṇṇaṃ. Tenāha “nirodhaṃ pana…pe… vadantī”ti.
tika-s0203t0:221_0: Vomissaṃ vivarituṃ “tatthassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “nirodhaṃ samāpajjissāmī”ti ābhogena
tika-s0203t0:221_1: samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ āharitvā ṭhitassa nirodhasamāpatti sīsaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0203t0:221_2: tassa ābhogavasena nirodhassa vāro āgacchati. Phalasamāpatti gūḷho hoti, “phalasamāpattiṃ
tika-s0203t0:221_3: samāpajjissāmī”ti ābhogassa abhāvato. Phalasamāpatti sīsaṃ hotīti etthāpi vuttanayena
tika-s0203t0:221_4: attho veditabbo. Etena ābhogapaṭibaddhametesaṃ āgamananti dīpitanti veditabbaṃ. Jambudīpavāsino
tika-s0203t0:221_5: therā panātiādi aṭṭhakathāruḷhameva taṃ vacanaṃ. Antosamāpattiyanti nirodhaṃ samāpannakāle.
tika-s0203t0:222_1: ukkaṃsaparinipphattiṃ patto. Ure vāyāmajanitāya oraso. Pabhāvitanti uppāditaṃ. Dhammenāti
tika-s0203t0:222_2: ariyamaggadhammena. Tassa hi adhigamena ariyāya jātiyā jāto nibbattoti katvā, “dhammajo
tika-s0203t0:222_3: dhammanimmito”ti vuccati. Dhammadāyassāti navavidhassa lokuttaradhammadāyassa. Ādiyanatoti
tika-s0203t0:222_4: gaṇhanato, sasantāne uppādanatoti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0203t0:225_0: 98. Khīṇā jātīti attano jātikkhayaṃ paṭijānantena arahattaṃ byākataṃ hoti arahato
tika-s0203t0:225_1: tadabhāvato. Tathā vusitaṃ brahmacariyanti maggabrahmacariyavāso me pariyositoti
tika-s0203t0:225_2: paṭijānantenapi. Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūhi maggehi catūsu saccesu pariññādivasena
tika-s0203t0:225_3: soḷasavidhassapi kiccassa attanā niṭṭhāpitabhāvaṃ paṭijānantenapi. Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti
tika-s0203t0:225_4: āyatiṃ punabbhavābhāvaṃ, āyatiṃ vā pariññādikaraṇīyābhāvaṃ paṭijānantenapīti āha
tika-s0203t0:225_5: – “ekenapi padena aññā byākatāva hotī”ti. Dvikkhattuṃ baddhaṃ pana subaddhaṃ viyāti
tika-s0203t0:225_6: vuttaṃ. Idha pana aññābyākaraṇaṃ catūhi padehi āgataṃ, tasmā vattabbameva cettha
tika-s0203t0:225_7: natthīti adhippāyo. Cetanāya diṭṭhavāditā nāma ariyavohāro. Sabhāvoti pakatiattho
tika-s0203t0:225_8: hi ayaṃ dhammasaddo, “jātidhammā jarādhammā”tiādīsu viya tasmā, anudhammoti ariyabhāvaṃ
tika-s0203t0:225_9: anugatā pakatīti attho. Paramappicchatāya ariyā attano guṇe anāvikarontāpi sāsanassa
tika-s0203t0:226_0: 99. Dubbalanti pheggu viya subhejjanīyaṃ balavirahitaṃ, asāranti attho. Virāgutanti
tika-s0203t0:226_3: ca yathārahaṃ upenti upagacchantīti upayā, “etaṃ mama, eso me attā”ti upādiyanti
tika-s0203t0:226_4: daḷhaggāhaṃ gaṇhantīti upādānā. Adhitiṭṭhati cetaso abhinandanabhūtāti cetaso adhiṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:226_5: Tāhīti taṇhādiṭṭhīhi. Tanti cittaṃ. Abhinivisatīti abhirativasena nivisati, ayañhettha
tika-s0203t0:226_6: attho – sakkāyadhammesu cittaṃ abhinivisati “etaṃ mamaṃ, eso me attā”ti ajjhosāya
tika-s0203t0:226_7: tiṭṭhati etāhi abhinivesāhi, tathā sakkāyadhammesu cittaṃ anuseti etāhīti anusayā,
tika-s0203t0:226_8: taṇhādiṭṭhiyo. Yadaggena hi tebhūmakadhammesu rāgādayo anusenti, tadaggena taṃsahagatadhammā
tika-s0203t0:226_9: tattha anusentīti pariyāyena, “taṃ anusetī”ti vuttaṃ. Khayā virāgāti hetumhi nissakkavacananti
tika-s0203t0:226_10: “khayena virāgenā”ti hetumhi karaṇavasena attho vutto. Virāgenāti ca itisaddo ādi
tika-s0203t0:226_11: attho. Tena “nirodhenā”ti evamādikaṃ gahitaṃ hoti. Aññamaññavevacanāneva upayādīnaṃ
tika-s0203t0:227_0: 100. Patiṭṭhāti ettha sesabhūtattayaṃ upādārūpañcāti patiṭṭhānā, nijjīvaṭṭhena dhātucāti
tika-s0203t0:227_1: patiṭṭhānadhātu. Nhānīyacuṇṇaṃ bāhiraudakaṃ viya sesabhūtattayaṃ ābandhatīti ābandhanaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:227_2: Pacanīyabhattaṃ bāhiratejo viya sesabhūtattayaṃ paripācetīti paripācanaṃ. Bāhiravāto
tika-s0203t0:227_3: viya sesabhūtattayaṃ vitthambhetīti vitthambhanaṃ. Dhātusaddattho vuttoyeva. Asamphuṭṭhadhātūti
tika-s0203t0:227_4: asamphusitabhāvo tesaṃ viparimaṭṭhatābhāvato. Vijānanaṃ ārammaṇūpaladdhi. Ahaṃ attāti
tika-s0203t0:227_5: ahaṃ, “rūpadhammo me attā”ti attakoṭṭhāsena attabhāvena na upagamiṃ na gaṇhiṃ. Nissitanissitāpi
tika-s0203t0:227_6: nissitā eva nāmāti āha “pathavīdhātunissitāvā”ti. Attanā vā pana tannissitāti “ekena
tika-s0203t0:227_7: pariyāyenā”ti. Upādārupampi kāmaṃ nissitampi hoti. Tathāpi taṃ nissitaṃ hotiyevāti
tika-s0203t0:227_8: taṃ na uddhaṭaṃ. Paricchedakarattā paricchedākāsassa “avinibbhogavasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:227_9: Tena ca tathā paricchinnattā sabbampi bhūtupādārūpaṃ ākāsadhātunissitaṃ nāma. Taṃ
tika-s0203t0:227_10: nissāya pavattiyā upādārūpaṃ viya bhūtarūpāni, arūpakkhandhā viya ca vatthurūpāni,
tika-s0203t0:227_12: vedanādayo arūpakkhandhā ākāsadhātunissitā nāmāti imamatthaṃ tathā-saddena upasaṃharati.
tika-s0203t0:227_13: Idhāpīti ākāsadhātunissitapadepi, na pathavīdhātunissitapadādīsu eva. Rūpārūpanti
tika-s0203t0:227_14: sabbampi rūpārūpaṃ gahitameva hoti, aggahitaṃ natthi. Sahajātā…pe… nissitanti idaṃ
tika-s0203t0:227_15: nippariyāyasiddhaṃ nissayattaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. Heṭṭhā vuttanayena pariyāyasiddhe
tika-s0203t0:227_16: nissayatte gayhamāne – “pacchājātapaccayoti pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa
tika-s0203t0:227_17: imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanato sabbaṃ catusamuṭṭhānikarūpaṃ,
tika-s0203t0:228_0: 101. Ruppati vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti rūpanti ayamattho
tika-s0203t0:228_1: cakkhudvāre āpāthagate rūpāyatane nippariyāyato labbhati, na āpāthamanāgate. Cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbabhāvo
tika-s0203t0:228_2: pana āpāthamanāgatepi tasmiṃ labbhateva taṃsabhāvānativatthanato. Rūpāyatanaṃ dvidhā
tika-s0203t0:228_3: vibhajitvā. Thero pana āpāthaṃ anāgatassāpi rūpāyatanassa rūpabhāvaṃ na sakkā paṭikkhipitunti
tika-s0203t0:228_4: dvidhākaraṇaṃ nānujānanto channovādaṃ nidasseti, “upari channovāde kinti karissathā”ti.
tika-s0203t0:228_5: Tattha hi “cakkhuṃ, āvuso channa, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe dhamme”ti
tika-s0203t0:228_6: āgataṃ, na cettha cakkhudvāre āpāthaṃ āgatameva rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbapadena
tika-s0203t0:228_7: gahitaṃ, na āpāthaṃ anāgatanti sakkā viññātuṃ aviseseneva rūpāyatanena taṇhāmānadiṭṭhigāhābhāvassa
tika-s0203t0:228_8: jotitattā. Tenāha “na yidaṃ labbhatī”ti. Rūpamevāti rūpāyatanameva. Yadi evaṃ “cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbesu
tika-s0203t0:228_9: dhammesū”ti padaṃ kathaṃ netabbanti āha – “cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttā panā”tiādi. Cakkhuviññāṇena
tika-s0203t0:228_10: saddhiṃ viññātabbesūti yena manoviññāṇena cakkhuviññāṇaṃ aniccantiādinā cakkhuviññāṇena
tika-s0203t0:228_11: saddhiṃ tena viññātabbesu taṃsampayuttadhammesūti attho. Taṇhāchandoti tassanasabhāvo
tika-s0203t0:228_12: chando, na kattukamyatā chandoyevāti taṇhāchando. Rajjanavasenāti vatthaṃ viya raṅgajātaṃ
tika-s0203t0:228_13: cittassa anurañjanavasena. Abhinandanavasenāti ārammaṇe abhiramitvā nandanavasena.
tika-s0203t0:228_14: Sappītikataṇhā hi nandīti vuccati. Taṇhāyanavasena taṇhā.
tika-s0203t0:229_0: 102. Ahaṅkāroti “seyyohamasmī”tiādinā ahaṃkaraṇaṃ. Yena hi mamaṃ karoti, etaṃ mamaṅkāro.
tika-s0203t0:229_1: Svevāti “ahaṅkāro”ti vuttamāno. Evaṃ catutthajjhāne niddiṭṭhe sabbāsu lokiyābhiññāsu
tika-s0203t0:229_2: vuccamānāsu heṭṭhā vijjādvayaṃ vattabbanti adhippāyena, “pubbenivāsaṃ dibbacakkhuñca
tika-s0203t0:229_3: avatvā kasmā vutta”nti āha? Itaro idha sabbavāresupi lokuttaradhammapucchā adhikatā
tika-s0203t0:229_4: tasmā “so evaṃ samāhite”tiādinā tatiyā vijjā kathitāti dassento, “bhikkhū lokiyadhammaṃ
tika-s0203t0:229_5: na pucchantī”tiādimāha. Ekavissajjitasuttaṃ nāmetaṃ tatiyavijjāya eva āgatattā. Ariyadhammavasenapissa
tika-s0203t0:229_6: samaññā atthevāti dassento, “chabbisodhanantipissa nāma”nti vatvā tesu dhammesu bhedaṃ
tika-s0203t0:229_7: dassetuṃ, “ettha hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Visuddhāti tassā codanāya sodhanavasena visodhitā.
tika-s0203t0:229_8: Ekameva katvāti ekavāravaseneva pāḷiyaṃ ekajjhaṃ āgatattā ekameva koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā.
tika-s0203t0:229_9: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ vā chabbisodhanatāti āha – “catūhi āhārehi saddhi”nti kathaṃ panettha
tika-s0203t0:229_10: cattāro āhārā gahetabbāti? Keci tāva āhu – “sādhūti bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā
tika-s0203t0:229_11: uttari pañho pucchitabbo”ti heṭṭhā āgatena nayena āhāravāro āharitvā vattabboti.
tika-s0203t0:229_12: “Bahiddhā sabbanimittesū”ti ettha āhārānampi saṅgahitattā āhārā atthato āgatā evāti
tika-s0203t0:229_13: aññe. Apare pana rūpakkhandhaggahaṇena kabaḷīkāro āhāro, saṅkhārakkhandhaggahaṇena
tika-s0203t0:229_14: phassāhāro, manosañcetanāhāraggahaṇena viññāṇāhāro sarūpatopi gahitoti vadanti.
tika-s0203t0:230_0: “Chabbisodhana”nti imassa suttassa samaññāya anvatthataṃ dassetvā āyatimpi tādisena
tika-s0203t0:230_1: byākaraṇena bhikkhūnaṃ paṭipattimpi dassanatthaṃ, “ime panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Vinayaniddesapariyāyenāti
tika-s0203t0:230_2: vinayaniddese āgatena kāraṇena. Vinaye vā āgataniddesānukkamena.
tika-s0203t0:231: Adhigantabbato adhigamo, jhānādiadhigamapucchā. Tenāha – “jhānavimokkhādīsū”tiādi. Upāyapucchāti adhigamopāyapucchā. Kintīti kena pakārena vidhināti attho.
tika-s0203t0:232_0: Katamesaṃ tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhīti idaṃ pana pubbe “kiṃ te adhigata”nti aniddhāritabhedā
tika-s0203t0:232_1: jhānādivisesā pucchitāti idāni tesaṃ niddhāretvā pucchanākāradassanaṃ. Tasmāti yasmā
tika-s0203t0:232_2: yathāvuttehi ākārehi adhigamabyākaraṇaṃ sodhetabbaṃ, tasmā. Ettāvatāvāti ettakena
tika-s0203t0:232_3: byākaraṇamatteneva na sakkāro kātabbo. Byākaraṇañhi ekaccassa ayāthāvatopi hoti,
tika-s0203t0:232_4: yathā nāma jātarūpapatirūpaṃ jātarūpaṃ viya khāyatīti jātarūpaṃ nighaṃsanatāpanachedanehi
tika-s0203t0:232_5: sodhetabbaṃ evamevaṃ imesu idāneva vuttesu chasu ṭhānesu pakkhipitvā sodhanatthaṃ
tika-s0203t0:233_0: Pākaṭo hoti adhigatavisesassa satisammosābhāvato. Sesapucchāsupi “pākaṭo hotī”ti
tika-s0203t0:233_1: pade eseva nayo. Uggahaparipucchākusalāti sajjhāyamaggasaṃvaṇṇanāsu nipuṇā. Yāya
tika-s0203t0:233_2: paṭipadāya yassa ariyamaggo āgacchati, sā pubbabhāgapaṭipatti āgamanapaṭipadā. Sodhetabbāti
tika-s0203t0:233_3: suddhā udāhu asuddhāti vicāraṇavasena sodhetabbā. Na sujjhatīti tattha tattha pamādapaṭipattibhāvato.
tika-s0203t0:233_4: Apanetabbo attano paṭiññāya. “Sujjhatī”ti vatvā sujjhanākāraṃ dassetuṃ, “dīgharatta”ntiādi
tika-s0203t0:233_5: vuttaṃ. Paññāyatīti ettha “yadī”ti padaṃ ānetvā yadi so bhikkhu tāya paṭipadāya yadi
tika-s0203t0:233_6: paññāyatīti sambandho. Khīṇāsavapaṭipattisadisā paṭipadā hoti dīgharattaṃ vikkhambhitakilesattā.
tika-s0203t0:234: Nadiyā samuddaṃ pakkhandanaṭṭhānaṃ nadīmukhadvāraṃ. Maddamānoti badarasāḷavaṃ sarasaṃ patte pakkhitto hutvā maddamāno. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0203t0:237_0: 105. Sappurisadhammanti sappurisabhāvakaraṃ dhammaṃ. So pana yasmā sappurisānaṃ paveṇiko
tika-s0203t0:237_1: dhammo hoti. Tasmā āha – “sappurisānaṃ dhamma”nti, esa nayo asappurisadhammanti etthāpi.
tika-s0203t0:237_2: Evaṃ padhānaṃ anuṭṭhātabbañca sappurisadhammaṃ ādiṃ katvā mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā ayathānupubbiyā
tika-s0203t0:237_3: niddisanto “katamo ca, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo”tiādimāha. Tathā pana niddisanto
tika-s0203t0:237_4: udāharaṇapubbakaṃ hetuṃ dassetuṃ, “yathā nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena icchitabbapariccāgapubbakaṃ
tika-s0203t0:237_5: gahetabbaggahaṇaṃ nāma ñāyapaṭipatti, tasmā sappurisadhammā sampādetabbāti dīpento
tika-s0203t0:237_6: satthā ayathānupubbiyā niddhārīyatīti imamatthaṃ dasseti. Tathā aññatthāpi “asevanā
tika-s0203t0:237_7: ca bālānaṃ, paṇḍitānañca sevanā”ti. Etadeva hi kuladvayaṃ “uccakula”nti vuccati nippariyāyato.
tika-s0203t0:237_8: Tathāhi antimabhavikā bodhisattā tattheva paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti. Soti sāmīcippaṭipanno
tika-s0203t0:237_9: bhikkhu. Antaraṃ karitvāti taṃ kāraṇaṃ katvā. Paṭipadā hi viññūnaṃ pūjāya kāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0203t0:237_10: na uccakulīnatā. Mahākulāti vipulakulā upāditoditakulasampavattikāti attho.
tika-s0203t0:238_0: 106. Yasasaddo parivāravācako. Yasassīti ca sātisayaparivāravantatā vuccatīti āha
tika-s0203t0:238_1: “parivārasampanno”ti. Ādhipateyyābhāvato paresaṃ uparinatti etesaṃ īso īsanaṃ issariyanti
tika-s0203t0:238_2: akkhātabbāti appesakkhā. Tenāha “appaparivārā”ti. Abhāvattho hi idha appa-saddo.
tika-s0203t0:239_0: 107. Naveva dhutaṅgāni āgatānīti ettha yathā ukkaṭṭhapaṃsukūlikassa tecīvarikatā
tika-s0203t0:239_1: sukarā. Evaṃ ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātikassa sapadānacārikatā sukarā. Ekāsanikassa ca pattapiṇḍikakhalupacchābhattikatā
tika-s0203t0:239_2: sukarā evāti – “paṃsukūliko hotī”tiādivacaneneva pāḷiyā anāgatānampi āgatabhāvo veditabbo
tika-s0203t0:240_0: 108. Kāmataṇhādikāya tāya taṇhāya nibbattāti tammayā, puthujjanā, pakatibhāvūpagamanena
tika-s0203t0:240_1: tesaṃ bhāvo tammayatā, tappaṭikkhepato atammayatā, nittaṇhatā. Taṃyeva kāraṇaṃ katvāti
tika-s0203t0:240_2: paṭhamajjhānepi taṇhāpahānaṃyeva kāraṇaṃ katvā. Citte uppādetvāti atammayatāpariyāyena
tika-s0203t0:240_3: vutte taṇhāya paṭipakkhadhamme sampādetvā. Na maññatīti maññanānaṃ ariyamaggena sabbaso
tika-s0203t0:240_4: samucchinnattā kismiñci okāse kāmabhavādike kenaci vatthunā hatthiassakhettavatthādinā
tika-s0203t0:240_5: pattacīvaravihārapariveṇādinā ca puggalaṃ na maññati. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0203t0:243_0: 109. Aññamaññanti aññaṃ aññaṃ. Tenāha “aññaṃ sevitabba”ntiādi. Sattahi padehīti sattahi
tika-s0203t0:243_1: vākyehi. Pajjati etena yathādhippeto atthoti padaṃ, vākyaṃ. Sāriputtattherassa okāsakaraṇaṃ
tika-s0203t0:244_0: 113. Diṭṭhiyeva paccayavasena paṭiladdhatāya diṭṭhipaṭilābho. Saññāpaṭilābhepi eseva
tika-s0203t0:244_1: nayo. Micchādiṭṭhisammādiṭṭhiyo…pe… na gahitā kammapathappattānaṃ tesaṃ manosamācārabhāvena
tika-s0203t0:244_2: gahitattā. Yadi evaṃ kasmā diṭṭhi cittuppādavāre na gahitāti? Kāmaṃ micchādiṭṭhiyā
tika-s0203t0:244_3: avayavibhāvo labbhati, tathāpi cittuppādakkhaṇe lokiyalokuttaracittuppādesu kammapathakoṭṭhāso na uddhaṭo.
tika-s0203t0:245_0: 115. Kāmasaññādīnanti ettha ādi-saddena yathā byāpādavihiṃsāsaññā saṅgahitā, evaṃ
tika-s0203t0:246_0: 117. Ti kāmabhavādīnaṃ apariyosānāya pariyosānaṃ icchatopi tādisassa bhavānaṃ apariyosānameva
tika-s0203t0:246_1: hoti. Cattāro honti puggalavasena. Tenāha “puthujjanopi hī”tiādi. Akusalā dhammā
tika-s0203t0:246_2: vaḍḍhantīti tesaṃ pahānāya appaṭipajjamānassāti adhippāyo, tato eva kusalā dhammā
tika-s0203t0:246_3: parihāyanti. Tenassa kilesadukkhena vipākadukkhena ca sadukkhameva attabhāvaṃ abhinibbatteti.
tika-s0203t0:246_4: Orambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni pahāya suddhāvāsesu nibbattanāraho anāgāmī kathaṃ…pe… abhivaḍḍhantīti
tika-s0203t0:246_5: āha “anāgāmīpī”tiādi. Sadukkhameva attabhāvaṃ abhinibbatteti, yāya labbhamānaakusalābhivuddhiṃ
tika-s0203t0:246_7: Evaṃ yathālabbhamānaṃ akusalaparihāniṃ kusalābhivuddhiñca gahetvā puthujjanassapi
tika-s0203t0:246_9: Akusalameva hāyati,na kusalaṃ tassa buddhipakkhe ṭhitattā. Tatthāpi vipassanameva
tika-s0203t0:246_10: gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpeti, na vaṭṭagabbhaṃ antimabhavikatāya vivaṭṭūpanissitattā ajjhāsayassa,
tika-s0203t0:247_1: tathā “nibbindatī”tiādīsupi. Uggaṇhitvāpīti pi-saddo luttaniddiṭṭho. Bhagavato bhāsitassa
tika-s0203t0:247_2: atthaṃ ajānantā tāva dīgharattaṃ hitasukhato paribāhirā hontu jānantānampi sabbesaṃ
tika-s0203t0:247_3: dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya hotīti anekaṃsikataṃ codento “evaṃ santepī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0203t0:247_4: Itaro sabbesampi dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya hotiyevāti, “appaṭisandhikā”tiādinā anekaṃsikataṃ
tika-s0203t0:250_0: 124. Bhayanti cittasaṃsappatāti āha “cittutrāso”ti. Upaddavoti antarāyo. Tassa pana
tika-s0203t0:250_1: vikkhepakāraṇattā vuttaṃ “anekaggatākāro”ti. Upasaggoti upasajjanaṃ. Tato appatīkāravighātāpatti
tika-s0203t0:250_2: yasmā patīkārābhāvena vihaññamānassa kiñci kātuṃ asamatthassa osīdanakāraṇaṃ, tasmā
tika-s0203t0:250_3: vuttaṃ – “tattha tattha lagganākāro”ti. Vañcetvā āgantuṃ yathāvutte divase anāgacchantesu.
tika-s0203t0:251_0: Naḷehīti naḷacchannasaṅkhepena upari chādetvā tehiyeva dārukacchadananiyāmena paritopi
tika-s0203t0:251_1: chāditā. Eseva nayoti iminā tiṇehi channataṃ, sesasambhārānaṃ rukkhamayatañca atidisati.
tika-s0203t0:251_2: Vidhavāputteti adantabhāvopalakkhaṇaṃ. Te hi nippitikā avinītā asaṃyatā akiccakārino honti.
tika-s0203t0:252_0: Matthakaṃ apāpetvāva niṭṭhāpitāti kasmā bhagavā evamakāsīti? Ānandattherassa pucchākosalladīpanatthameva,
tika-s0203t0:252_1: tattha nisinnānaṃ sannipatitabhikkhūnaṃ desanāya jānanatthañca. Te kira saṅkhepato
tika-s0203t0:252_2: vuttamatthaṃ ajānantā andhakāraṃ paviṭṭhā viya ṭhitā. Pucchānusandhivasena pariggayha jānissantīti.
tika-s0203t0:253_0: 125. Rūpapariggahova kathito, na aññaṃ kiñcīti attho. Idāni tato saccāni niddhāretvā
tika-s0203t0:253_1: catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ, “sabbāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pañcakkhandhā hontīti addhekādasa
tika-s0203t0:253_2: dhātuyo rūpakkhandho, addhaṭṭhamā dhātuyo yathārahaṃ vedanādayo cattāro arūpino khandhāti
tika-s0203t0:253_3: evaṃ aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo pañcakkhandhā honti. Pañcapi khandhā taṇhāvajjā dukkhasaccaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:253_4: Appavattīti appavattinimittaṃ. Nirodhapajānanāti paññāsīsena maggakiccamāha. Sammādiṭṭhipamukho
tika-s0203t0:253_5: hi ariyamaggo. Matthakaṃ pāpetvā kathitaṃ hoti sammasanassa bhūmiyā nipphattiyā ca
tika-s0203t0:253_6: kathitattā. Jānāti passatīti iminā ñāṇadassanaṃ kathitaṃ taṃ pana lokiyaṃ lokuttaranti
tika-s0203t0:253_7: duvidhanti tadubhayampi dassento āha – “saha vipassanāya maggo vutto”ti.
tika-s0203t0:254_0: Ettāvatāpi khoti pi-saddaggahaṇena aññena pariyāyena satthā dhātukosallaṃ desetukāmoti
tika-s0203t0:254_1: thero, “siyā pana, bhante”ti pucchatīti bhagavā pathavīdhātuādivasenapi dhātukosallaṃ
tika-s0203t0:254_3: vuttā”ti āha. Tāpi hi ādito cha dhātuyo. “Viññāṇadhātuto nīharitvā pūretabbā”ti vatvā
tika-s0203t0:254_4: kathaṃ rūpadhātuyo nīharīyantīti codanaṃ sandhāya taṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ, “viññāṇadhātū”tiādi
tika-s0203t0:254_5: vuttaṃ. Kāmañcettha kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇaṃ phoṭṭhabbadhātupathavīdhātu ādivasena
tika-s0203t0:254_6: desanāruḷameva, kāyadhātu pana nīharitabbāti ekaṃsameva nīharaṇavidhiṃ dassento,
tika-s0203t0:254_7: “esa nayo sabbatthā”ti āha. Purimapacchimavasena manodhātūti pacchimabhāgavasena
tika-s0203t0:254_8: kiriyāmanodhātu gahetabbā tassānurūpabhāvato. Nanu cettha manodhātu nāmāyaṃ manoviññāṇadhātuyā
tika-s0203t0:254_9: asaṃsaṭṭhā, visuṃyeva cesā dhātūti? Saccametaṃ aṭṭhārasadhātudesanāya, cittavibhattiniddese
tika-s0203t0:254_10: chaviññāṇakāyadesanāyaṃ pana sā manoviññāṇakāyasaṅgahitāvāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yaṃ panettha
tika-s0203t0:254_11: vattabbaṃ taṃ visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Atha vā purimapacchimavasenāti
tika-s0203t0:254_12: purecarānucaravasena. Manodhātūti vipākamanodhātu gahetabbā purecaraṇato, parato
tika-s0203t0:255_0: Dhammānaṃ yāvadeva nissattanijjīvavibhāvanatthāya satthu dhātudesanāti aññesu sabhāvadhāraṇādiatthesu
tika-s0203t0:255_1: labbhamānesupi ayamettha attho padhānoti āha – “esanayo sabbatthā”ti. Sappaṭipakkhavasenāti
tika-s0203t0:255_2: sappaṭibhāgavasena sukhaṃ dukkhena sappaṭibhāgaṃ, dukkhaṃ sukhena, evaṃ somanassadomanassāti.
tika-s0203t0:255_3: Yathā sukhādīnaṃyeva samudācāro vibhūto, na upekkhāya, evaṃ rāgādīnaṃyeva samudācāro
tika-s0203t0:255_4: vibhūto, na mohassa, tena vuttaṃ “avibhūtabhāvenā”ti. Kāyaviññāṇadhātu pariggahitāva
tika-s0203t0:255_5: hoti tadavinābhāvato. Sesāsu somanassadhātuādīsu, pariggahitāva hoti avinābhāvato
tika-s0203t0:255_6: eva. Na hi somanassādayo manodhātuyā vinā vattanti. Upekkhādhātuto nīharitvāti ettha
tika-s0203t0:255_7: cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādayo catasso viññāṇadhātuyo tāsaṃ vatthārammaṇabhūtā cakkhudhātuādayo
tika-s0203t0:255_8: cāti aṭṭha rūpadhātuyo, manodhātu, upekkhāsahagatā manoviññāṇadhātu, upekkhāsahagatā
tika-s0203t0:255_9: eva dhammadhātūti evaṃ pannarasa dhātuyo upekkhādhātuto nīharitabbā. Somanassadhātuādayo
tika-s0203t0:255_10: pana catasso dhātuyo dhammadhātuantogadhā, evaṃ sukhadhātuto kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā tassā
tika-s0203t0:256_1: kāmavitakkādīsu vuttanayena attho veditabbo”ti āha. Tattha hi “kāmavitakkoti kāmapaṭisaṃyutto
tika-s0203t0:256_2: vitakko, byāpādavitakkoti byāpādapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko, vihiṃsāvitakkoti vihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto
tika-s0203t0:256_3: vitakko, nekkhammapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko nekkhammavitakko, so yāva paṭhamajjhānā vaṭṭati.
tika-s0203t0:256_4: Abyāpādapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko abyāpādavitakko, so mettāpubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya yāva
tika-s0203t0:256_5: paṭhamajjhānā vaṭṭati. Avihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko avihiṃsāvitakko, so karuṇāya
tika-s0203t0:256_6: pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānā vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ panattho abhidhamme
tika-s0203t0:256_7: vitthārato āgato evāti dassetuṃ, “abhidhamme”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kāmadhātuto nīharitvāti
tika-s0203t0:256_8: ettha kāmaggahaṇena gahitā rūpadhātuādayo cha, taṃvisayā sattaviññāṇadhātuyo, tattha
tika-s0203t0:256_9: pañcannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ cakkhudhātuādayo pañcāti aṭṭhārasa. Nekkhammadhātuādayo
tika-s0203t0:257_0: Kāmataṇhāya visayabhūtā dhammā kāmadhātūti āha – “pañca kāmāvacarakkhandhā kāmadhātū”ti.
tika-s0203t0:257_1: Tathā rūpataṇhāya visayabhūtā dhammā rūpadhātu, arūpataṇhāya visayabhūtā dhammā arūpadhātūti
tika-s0203t0:257_2: āha – “cattāro arūpāvacarakkhandhā”tiādi. Kāmataṇhā kāmo uttarapadalopena, evaṃ rūpārūpataṇhā
tika-s0203t0:257_3: rūpārūpaṃ. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena tā yattha avacaranti, te kāmāvacarādayoti evaṃ kāmāvacarakkhandhādīnaṃ
tika-s0203t0:257_4: kāmataṇhādibhāvo veditabbo. Ādinā nayenāti etena “uparito paranimmitavasavattideve
tika-s0203t0:257_6: kāmataṇhāya visayabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tadokāsatā ca taṇhāya tanninnattā veditabbā.
tika-s0203t0:257_8: nīharitvā pūretabbā”ti vuttaṃ. Manoviññāṇadhātudhammadhātu ekadesamattameva hi rūpārūpāvacaradhammāti.
tika-s0203t0:258_0: Samāgantvāti sahitā hutvā. Yattakañhi paccayadhammā attano phalassa kāraṇaṃ, tattha
tika-s0203t0:258_1: tannibbattane samāgatā viya hoti vekalle tadanibbattanato. Saṅkhatadhātuto nīharitvā
tika-s0203t0:259_0: 126. Evaṃ pavattamānā mayaṃ attāti gahaṇaṃ gamissāmāti iminā viya adhippāyena attānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:259_1: adhikicca uddissa pavattā ajjhattā, tesu bhavā tappariyāpannattāti ajjhattikāni.
tika-s0203t0:259_2: Tato bahibhūtāni bāhirāni. Āyatanakathā paṭiccasamuppādakathā ca visuddhimagge vuttanayeneva
tika-s0203t0:260_0: 127. Avijjamānaṃ ṭhānaṃ aṭṭhānaṃ, natthi ṭhānanti vā aṭṭhānaṃ. Anavakāsoti ettha
tika-s0203t0:260_1: eseva nayo. Tadatthanigamanameva hi “netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti vacananti. Tenāha “ubhayenapī”tiādi.
tika-s0203t0:260_2: Yanti kāraṇe paccattavacanaṃ, hetuattho ca kāraṇatthoti āha – “yanti yena kāraṇenā”ti.
tika-s0203t0:260_3: Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena ettha diṭṭhisampatti veditabbāti vuttaṃ “maggadiṭṭhiyā sampanno”ti.
tika-s0203t0:260_4: Kuto panāyamattho labbhatīti? Liṅgato. Liṅgañhetaṃ, yadidaṃ niccato upagamanapaṭikkhepo.
tika-s0203t0:260_6: vuttaṃ; na pana te ārabbha niccato upagamanasabbhāvato. Vakkhati ca “catutthabhūmakasaṅkhārā
tika-s0203t0:260_8: “saṅkhatasaṅkhāresū”ti vuttaṃ. Lokuttarasaṅkhārānaṃ pana nivattane kāraṇaṃ sayameva
tika-s0203t0:260_9: vakkhati. Etaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthi setughātattā. Tejussadattāti saṃkilesavidhamanatejassa
tika-s0203t0:260_10: adhikabhāvato. Tathā hi te gambhīrabhāvena duddasā. Akusalānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na hontīti
tika-s0203t0:260_11: idaṃ pakaraṇavasena vuttaṃ. Appahīnavipallāsānaṃ sattānaṃ kusaladhammānampi te ārammaṇaṃ na honti.
tika-s0203t0:261_0: Asukhe “sukha”nti vipallāso ca idha sukhato upagamanassa ṭhānanti adhippetanti dassento,
tika-s0203t0:261_2: avisayabhāvo heṭṭhā vutto evāti “kasiṇādipaṇṇattisaṅgahattha”nti vuttaṃ. Paricchedoti
tika-s0203t0:261_3: saṅkhārānaṃ paricchedo saṅkhārānaṃ paricchijjagahaṇaṃ. Svāyaṃ yesaṃ niccādito upagamanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:261_4: bhavati tesaṃyeva vasena kātabboti dassento “sabbavāresū”tiādimāha. Sabbavāresūti
