tika-s0203t0:607: 294. Macchariyavasena na dātā hotīti sabbaso deyyadhammassa abhāvena na dātā na hoti. Amaccharī hi puggalo sati deyyadhamme yathārahaṃ detiyeva.
tika-s0203t0:608_0: 295. Abhivādetabbaṃ khettavasena matthakappattaṃ dassetuṃ, “buddhaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:608_1: Aññepi mātupitujeṭṭhabhātarādayo abhivādanādiarahā santi, tesu thaddhādivasena karaṇaṃ
tika-s0203t0:608_2: nīcakulasaṃvattanikameva. Na hi pavatte sakkā kātunti sambandho. Tena pavattivipākadāyino
tika-s0203t0:608_3: kammassa visayo esoti dasseti. Tenāha “paṭisandhimeva panā”tiādi.
tika-s0203t0:609_0: 296. Aparipucchanenāti aparipucchāmattena niraye na nibbattati; aparipucchāhetu pana
tika-s0203t0:609_1: kattabbākaraṇādīhi siyā nirayanibbattīti pāḷiyaṃ, “na paripucchitā hotī”tiādi vuttanti
tika-s0203t0:609_2: dassento, “aparipucchako panā”tiādimāha. Yathānusandhiṃ pāpesīti desanaṃ yathānusandhiniṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:612_0: 298. Kammassa moghabhāvo nāma phalena tucchatā phalābhāvoti āha – “moghanti tucchaṃ
tika-s0203t0:612_1: aphala”nti. Tathaṃ bhūtanti saccasaddassa atthamāha. Paribbājako pana “sacca”nti
tika-s0203t0:612_2: iminā tameva saphalanti vadati. Saphalañhi kammaṃ satthu abhimatamanokammanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t0:612_3: Idañca “moghaṃ kāyakamma”ntiādivacanaṃ. Taṃ gahetvāti paramparāya gahetvā. Esāti
tika-s0203t0:612_4: potaliputto paribbājako. Abhisaññānirodhakathaṃ sandhāya vadati. Sāpi hi titthiyānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:612_5: antare pākaṭā jātāti. Theroti samiddhitthero. Yathā bhagavatā vuttaṃ, tato ca aññathāva
tika-s0203t0:612_6: dosāropanabhayena gahetvā tato bhagavantaṃ thero rakkhatīti adhippāyena paribbājako,
tika-s0203t0:612_8: rakkhitabba”nti. Sañcetanā assa atthīti sañcetanikaṃ. Kammanti sañcetanikassapi kammassa
tika-s0203t0:613_1: passatī”ti. Samāgamadassanaṃ sandhāyāti katthacipi tassa dassanaṃ sandhāya, na pariññādassanaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:614_1: Saṅkhāradukkhanti yadaniccaṃ, taṃ dukkhanti evaṃ vuttadukkhaṃ. Sace bhāsitaṃ bhaveyyāti
tika-s0203t0:614_2: imaṃ īdisaṃ dukkhaṃ sandhāya āyasmatā samiddhinā bhāsitaṃ siyā nu bhagavā, avibhajitvā
tika-s0203t0:615_0: 300. Ummaṅganti ummujjanaṃ, kathāmuḷhena antarā aññāṇavisayapañhā ummaṅgaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0203t0:615_1: – “pañhāummaṅga”nti neva dibbacakkhunāti kasmā vuttaṃ. Na hi taṃ ayoniso ummujjanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:615_3: pana siyāti tathā vuttaṃ. Adhippāyenevāti udāyittherassa adhippāyeneva gayhamānena
tika-s0203t0:615_4: taṃ ayoniyo ummujjanaṃ aññāsi. Sannisīdituṃ pubbe nisinnākārena sannisīdituṃ na sakkoti.
tika-s0203t0:615_5: Samiddhittherena anabhisaṅkhatasseva atthassa kathitattā, “yaṃ abhūtaṃ, tadeva kathessatī”ti
tika-s0203t0:615_6: vuttaṃ. Tenāha “ayoniso ummujjissatī”ti. Tisso vedanā pucchitā, “kiṃ so vediyatī”ti
tika-s0203t0:615_7: avibhāgena vediyamānassa jātitattā. Sukhāya vedanāya hitanti sukhavedaniyaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0203t0:616_0: Heṭṭhā tikajjhānacetanāti ettha, “kusalato”ti adhikārato rūpāvacarakusalato heṭṭhā
tika-s0203t0:616_2: Adukkhamasukhampīti pi-saddena iṭṭhārammaṇe sukhampīti imamatthaṃ sampiṇḍeti.
tika-s0203t0:617: Yadi kāyadvāre pavattato aññattha adukkhamasukhaṃ janeti, atha kasmā, “dukkhasseva jananato”ti vuttanti āha – “sā pana vedanā”tiādi.
tika-s0203t0:618_0: Catutthajjhānacetanāti ettha arūpāvacarakusalacetanātipi vattabbaṃ. Yathā hi “kāyena
tika-s0203t0:618_1: vācāya manasā”ti ettha yathālābhaggahaṇavasena manasā sukhavedaniyaṃ adukkhamasukhavedaniyanti
tika-s0203t0:618_2: ayamattho arūpāvacarakusalepi labbhatīti sukhampi janeti ukkaṭṭhassa ñāṇasampayuttakusalassa
tika-s0203t0:618_4: vattabbo. Pubbe pariyāyato dukkhavedanā vuttā, suttantasaṃvaṇṇanā hesāti idāni nippariyāyato
tika-s0203t0:618_5: puna dassetuṃ, “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena ettha dukkhavedaniyaṃ pavattivaseneva vaṭṭatīti.
tika-s0203t0:618_6: Etassāti dukkhavedaniyassa pavattivaseneva yujjamānattā etassa vasena sabbaṃ sukhavedaniyaṃ
tika-s0203t0:619_0: Ālayoti abhiruci. Mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇanti mahati kammavibhajane ñāṇaṃ, mahantaṃ
tika-s0203t0:619_1: vā kammavibhajanañāṇaṃ. Bhājanaṃ nāma niddeso, ayaṃ pana uddesoti katvā āha – “katame
tika-s0203t0:620_1: pucchānusandhiajjhāsayānusandhīsu ca anantogadhattā. Tenāha “idaṃ hī”tiādi. Idaṃ
tika-s0203t0:620_2: ārammaṇaṃ katvāti idha, “pāṇātipātiṃ adinnādāyi”ntiādinā puggalādhiṭṭhānena vuttaṃ
tika-s0203t0:620_3: kammavibhaṅgaṃ ārabbha. Imaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvāti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Idaṃ dassanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:620_4: gaṇhantīti idaṃ, “atthi kira, bho, pāpakāni kammāni, natthi kira, bho, pāpakāni kammānī”ti
tika-s0203t0:620_5: ca ādīni hatthidassakaandhāviya diṭṭhamatte eva ṭhatvā acittakadassanañca gaṇhanti.
tika-s0203t0:620_6: Vīriyaṃ kilesānaṃ ātāpanavasena ātappaṃ, tadeva padahavasena padhānaṃ, punappunaṃ
tika-s0203t0:620_7: yuñjanavasena anuyogo, tathā bhāvanāya nappamajjati etenāti appamādo, sammā yoniso
tika-s0203t0:620_8: manasi karoti etenāti sammāmanasikāroti vuccatīti adhippāyena, “pañcapi vīriyasseva
tika-s0203t0:620_9: nāmānī”ti āha. Appamādo vā satiyā avippavāso. Yasmiṃ manasikāre sati tassa dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ
tika-s0203t0:620_10: ijjhati, ayamettha sammāmanasikāroti ettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Cetosamādhinti dibbacakkhuñāṇasahagataṃ
tika-s0203t0:620_12: taṃ pana kusalakammakaraṇaṃ hotīti āha – “ye dassannaṃ kusalānaṃ kammapathānaṃ pūritattā”ti
tika-s0203t0:620_13: diṭṭhithāmenāti diṭṭhivasena diṭṭhibalena. Diṭṭhiparāmāsenāti diṭṭhivasena dhammasabhāvaṃ
tika-s0203t0:620_14: atikkamitvā parāmāsena. Adhiṭṭhahitvāti, “idameva saccaṃ, moghamañña”nti adhiṭṭhāya
tika-s0203t0:620_15: abhinivisitvā. Ādiyitvāti daḷhaggāhaṃ gahetvā. Voharatīti attano gahitaggahaṇaṃ paresaṃ dīpento voharati.
tika-s0203t0:621_0: 302. Tatrānandāti ettha iti-saddo ādiattho. Idampīti idaṃ vacanaṃ. “Tatrānandā”ti
tika-s0203t0:621_1: evamādivacanampīti attho. Na mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇassa bhājanaṃ tassa aniddesabhāvato.
tika-s0203t0:621_3: vasena anuññātabbassa ca dassanavasena uddesabhāvato. Tenāha “ettha panā”tiādi. Tattha
tika-s0203t0:621_4: ettha panāti “tatrānandā”tiādipāṭhe. Etesaṃ dibbacakkhukānanti etesaṃ heṭṭhā catūsupi
tika-s0203t0:621_5: vāresu āgatānaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ. Ettakāti ekacciyā saccagirā. Anuññātāti anujānitā.
tika-s0203t0:621_6: Ananuññātāti paṭikkhepitā. Idha ananuññātamukhena dīpitaṃ ananuññātabhāvamattaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:621_7: Tatrānandātiādike tatrāti niddhāraṇe bhummanti dassento, “tesu catūsu samaṇabrāhmaṇesū”ti
tika-s0203t0:621_8: āha. Idaṃ vacanaṃ “atthi kira, bho…pe… vipāko”ti idaṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ. Assāti tathāvādino
tika-s0203t0:621_9: samaṇabrāhmaṇassa. Aññenākārenāti “yo kira, bho”tiādinā vuttakāraṇato aññena kāraṇena.
tika-s0203t0:621_10: Dvīsu ṭhānesūti “atthi kira, bho…pe… vipāko”ti ca, “apāyaṃ…pe… nirayaṃ upapanna”nti
tika-s0203t0:621_11: ca imesu dvīsu pāṭhapadesesu. Anuññātā tadatthassa atthibhāvato. Tīsu ṭhānesūti “yo
tika-s0203t0:621_12: kira, bho…pe… nirayaṃ upapajjati”, “yampi so…pe… te sañjānanti”, “yampi so yadeva…pe…
tika-s0203t0:621_13: moghamañña”nti imesu tīsu pāṭhapadesesu. Ananuññātā tadatthassānekantikattā micchābhinivesato
tika-s0203t0:621_14: ca. Tenāha bhagavā – “aññathā hi, ānanda, tathāgatassa mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇa”nti.
tika-s0203t0:621_15: Yathā te appahīnavipallāsā padesañāṇasamaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavibhaṅgaṃ sañjānanti, tato
tika-s0203t0:621_16: aññathāva sabbaso pahīnavipallāsassa tathā āgamanādiatthena tathāgatassa sammāsambuddhassa
tika-s0203t0:622_0: 303. Iminā dibbacakkhukena yaṃ kammaṃ karonto diṭṭho, tato pubbeti yojanā. Tatoti
tika-s0203t0:622_1: tato kariyamānakammato pubbe. Khandoti kumāro. Sivoti issaro. Pitāmahoti brahmā.
tika-s0203t0:622_2: Issarādīhīti issarabrahmapajāpatiādīhi. Visaṭṭhoti nimmito. Micchādassanenāti micchādassanavasena.
tika-s0203t0:622_3: Yanti yaṃ kammaṃ. Tatthāti tesu pāṇātipātādivasena pavattakammesu. Diṭṭheva dhammeti
tika-s0203t0:622_4: tasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti yojanā. Upapajjitvāti dutiyabhave nibbattitvā.
tika-s0203t0:622_5: Aparasmiṃ pariyāyeti aññasmiṃ yattha katthaci bhave.
tika-s0203t0:623_0: Ekaṃ kammarāsinti pāṇātipātādibhedena ekaṃ kammasamudāyaṃ. Ekaṃ vipākarāsinti tasseva
tika-s0203t0:623_1: aṅgena ekaṃ vipākasamudāyaṃ. Imināti yathāvuttena dibbacakkhukena samaṇena brāhmaṇena
tika-s0203t0:623_2: vā adiṭṭhā. Tayoti “pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ hotī”tiādinā vuttā tayo. Dve vipākarāsīti
tika-s0203t0:623_3: diṭṭhadhammavedaniyo aparāpariyāyavedaniyoti dve vipākarāsī. Upapajjavedaniyaṃ pana
tika-s0203t0:623_4: tena diṭṭhaṃ, tasmā “dve”ti vuttaṃ. Diṭṭho eko, adiṭṭhā tayoti diṭṭhe ca adiṭṭhe
tika-s0203t0:623_5: ca cattāro kammarāsī, tathā diṭṭho eko, adiṭṭhā dveti tayo vipākarāsī. Imāni satta
tika-s0203t0:623_6: ṭhānānīti yathāvuttāni satta ñāṇassa pavattanaṭṭhānāni. “Imassa nāma kammassa idaṃ
tika-s0203t0:623_7: phalaṃ nibbatta”nti kammassa, phalassa vā adiṭṭhattā, “dutiyavāre dibbacakkhukena
tika-s0203t0:623_8: kiñci na diṭṭha”nti vuttaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ vuttanayena tayo kammarāsī veditabbā, idha dibbacakkhukena
tika-s0203t0:624_0: Bhavati vaḍḍhati etenāti bhabbaṃ, vaḍḍhinimittaṃ. Na bhabbaṃ abhabbanti āha “bhūtavirahita”nti.
tika-s0203t0:624_1: Attano phale bhāsanaṃ dibbanaṃ ābhāsananti āha – “ābhāsati abhibhavati paṭibāhatī”ti.
tika-s0203t0:624_2: Balavakammanti mahāsāvajjaṃ kammaṃ garusamāsevitādibhedaṃ. Āsanneti maraṇe, abhiṇhaṃ
tika-s0203t0:624_3: upaṭṭhānena vā tassa maraṇacittassa āsanne. Balavakammanti garusamāsevitatādivasena
tika-s0203t0:624_4: balavaṃ kusalakammaṃ. Dubbalakammassāti attano dubbalassa. Āsanne kusalaṃ katanti
tika-s0203t0:625_0: Upaṭṭhānākārenāti maraṇassa āsannakāle kammassa upaṭṭhānākārena. Tassāti tassa puggalassa.
tika-s0203t0:625_1: Nibbattikāraṇabhūtaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti akusalanti yojanā. Titthiyā kammantaravipākantaresu
tika-s0203t0:625_2: akusalatāya yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ yassa kassaci vipākassa kāraṇaṃ katvā gaṇhanti hatthidassakaandhādayo
tika-s0203t0:625_4: bhabbañceva bhabbābhāsañca, bhabbaṃ abhabbābhāsanti imasmiṃ dvaye. Eseva nayo paṭhamadutiyapuggalavasena
tika-s0203t0:625_5: purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ kammānaṃ yojanānayo vutto upaṭṭhānākāravasena. Ayameva tatiyacatutthapuggalavasena
tika-s0203t0:625_6: pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ kammānaṃ yojanānayo. Tatiyassa hi kammassa kusalattā tassa ca
tika-s0203t0:625_7: sagge nibbattattā tattha kāraṇabhūtaṃ kusalaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti; tathā catutthassapi
tika-s0203t0:625_8: kammassa kusalattā, tassa pana niraye nibbattattā tattha nibbattikāraṇabhūtaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:625_9: akusalaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhātīti. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0203t0:628_0: 304. Veditabbānīti ettha yathā viditāni cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni vaṭṭadukkhasamatikkamāya
tika-s0203t0:628_1: honti, tathā vedanaṃ adhippetanti āha – “sahavipassanena maggena jānitabbānī”ti.
tika-s0203t0:628_2: Tattha vipassanāya ārammaṇato maggena asammohato jānanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sesapadesupi
tika-s0203t0:628_3: eseva nayo. Mano savisesaṃ upavicarati ārammaṇe pavattati etehīti manopavicārā, vitakkavicārā.
tika-s0203t0:628_4: Ārammaṇe hi abhiniropanānumajjanehi vitakkavicārehi saha cittaṃ pavattati, na tabbirahitaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:628_5: Tenāha “vitakkavicārā”tiādi. Sattā pajjanti etehi yathārahaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vivaṭṭañcāti
tika-s0203t0:628_6: sattapadā, gehanissitā vaṭṭapadā. Yoggānaṃ damanaācariyā yoggācariyā. Tenāha “dametabbadamakāna”nti.
tika-s0203t0:629: 305. Idhāti imissaṃ chaviññāṇakāyadesanāyaṃ. Manodhātuttayavinimuttameva manoviññāṇadhātūti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:630: Cakkhumhi samphassoti cakkhuṃ nissāya uppanno samphasso. Tenāha – “cakkhuviñāṇasampayuttasamphassassetaṃ adhivacana”nti.
tika-s0203t0:631_0: Yathā kevalena viññāṇena rūpadassanaṃ na hoti, evaṃ kevalena cakkhupasādenapīti vuttaṃ
tika-s0203t0:631_1: “cakkhuviññāṇenā”ti. Tena pāḷiyaṃ cakkhunāti nissayamukhena nissitakiccaṃ vuttanti
tika-s0203t0:631_3: nanu tattha vitakkabyāpāropi atthīti? Saccaṃ atthi. So panettha taggatikoti āha –
tika-s0203t0:632_0: 306. Upavicārānaṃ upassayaṭṭhena gehaṃ viyāti gehaṃ, rūpādayoti āha – “gehassitānīti
tika-s0203t0:632_2: vipassanānissitānī”ti vuttaṃ. Iṭṭhānanti kasivaṇijjādivasena pariyiṭṭhānanti āha
tika-s0203t0:632_3: “pariyesitāna”nti. Piyabhāvo pana kantasaddeneva kathitoti kāmitabbānaṃ mano rametīti
tika-s0203t0:632_4: manoramānaṃ. Lokena āmasīyatīti lokāmisaṃ, taṇhā. Tāya gahetabbatāya iṭṭhabhāvāpādanena
tika-s0203t0:632_5: paṭisaṅkhatatāya ca paṭisaṃyuttānaṃ. Atīte kataṃ uppajjati ārammaṇikaanubhavanassa
tika-s0203t0:632_6: asambhavatoti adhippāyo. Edisaṃ anussaraṇaṃ diṭṭhaggahaṇānussarena ca hotīti dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t0:633_0: Aniccākāranti hutvā abhāvākāraṃ. Vipariṇāmavirāganirodhanti jarāya maraṇena cāti
tika-s0203t0:633_1: dvedhā vipariṇāmetabbañceva, tato eva palokitaṃ bhaṅgañca. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yasmā
tika-s0203t0:633_2: uppannaṃ rūpaṃ tenevākārena na tiṭṭhati, atha kho uppādāvatthāsaṅkhātaṃ pakatiṃ vijahati,
tika-s0203t0:633_3: vijahitañca jarāvatthāya tato vigacchati, vigacchantañca bhaṅguppattiyā nirujjhatīti
tika-s0203t0:633_4: imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ, “pakativijahanenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kāmañcettha “yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya
tika-s0203t0:633_5: passato”ti vuttaṃ, anubodhañāṇaṃ pana adhippetaṃ vīthipaṭipannāya vipassanāya vasenāti
tika-s0203t0:633_7: iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate”tiādi. Saṅkhārānaṃ bhedaṃ passatoti sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:633_8: khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanasabhāvaṃ vīthipaṭipannena vipassanāñāṇena passato. Tenāha “saṅkhāragatamhi
tika-s0203t0:633_9: tikkhe”tiādi. Tattha saṅkhāgatamhīti saṅkhāragate visayabhūte. Tikkheti bhāvanābalena
tika-s0203t0:633_10: indriyānañca samatāya tibbe. Sūreti paṭipakkhehi anabhibhūtatāya, tesañca abhibhavanasamatthatāya
tika-s0203t0:634_0: Kilesānaṃ vikkhambhanavasena vūpasantatāya santacittassa, saṃsāre bhayassa ikkhanato
tika-s0203t0:634_1: bhikkhuno, uttarimanussadhammasannissitattā amānusī ratīti vivekarati nekkhammarati.
tika-s0203t0:634_2: Yato yatoti yathā yathā nayavipassanādīsu yena yena sammasanākārenāti attho. Khandhānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:634_3: udayabbayanti pañcupādānakkhandhānaṃ uppādañca bhaṅgañca. Amatantaṃ vijānatanti vijānantānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:634_4: viññūnaṃ āraddhavipassanānaṃ taṃ pītipāmojjaṃ amatādhigamahetutāya amatanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:635: Chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagateti rūpādivasena chabbidhe iṭṭhārammaṇe yathārahaṃ chasu dvāresu āpāthagate. Visaye cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:636_0: 307. Paccuppannanti santatipaccuppannaṃ. Anuttaravimokkho nāma arahattaṃ idha adhippetaṃ
tika-s0203t0:636_1: ukkaṭṭhaniddesena. Kathaṃ pana tattha pihaṃ upaṭṭhapeti, na hi adhigataṃ arahattaṃ
tika-s0203t0:636_2: ārammaṇaṃ hoti, na ca taṃ ārabbha pihā pavattatīti? Ko vā evamāha – “arahattaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0203t0:636_3: katvā pihaṃ upaṭṭhapetī”ti. Anussutiladdhaṃ pana parikappasiddhaṃ arahattaṃ uddissa
tika-s0203t0:636_4: patthanaṃ ṭhapeti, tattha cittaṃ paṇidahati. Tenāha bhagavā – “kudāssu nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:636_6: manāyatanadhammāyatanabhāvato ca tathā vuttaṃ, taṃ panetaṃ domanassaṃ patthanaṃ paṭṭhapentassa
tika-s0203t0:636_7: uppajjati patthanāya sahāvattanato. Na hi lobhadosānaṃ saha vutti atthi. Patthanāmūlakattāti
tika-s0203t0:636_8: iminā upaṭṭhāpayato padassa hetuatthajotakatamāha. Evanti “kudāssunāmā”tiādinā vuttākārena.
tika-s0203t0:636_9: Ussukkāpetunti yathā maggena ghaṭeti, evaṃ ussukkāpetuṃ.
tika-s0203t0:637_0: 308. Aññāṇupekkhāti aññāṇasahitā upekkhā asamapekkhanapavattā. Tena tena maggodhinā
tika-s0203t0:637_1: tassa tassa apāyagamanīyakilesodhissa anavasesato jitattā khīṇāsavo nippariyāyato
tika-s0203t0:637_2: odhijino nāma; tadabhāvato puthujjano nippariyāyatova anodhijino nāma; sekho pana
tika-s0203t0:637_3: siyā pariyāyato odhijinoti. Tampi nivattento, “akhīṇāsavassāti attho”ti āha. Āyatiṃ
tika-s0203t0:637_4: vipākaṃ jinitvāti appavattikaraṇavasena sabbaso āyatiṃ vipākaṃ jinitvā ṭhitattā khīṇāsavova
tika-s0203t0:637_5: nippariyāyato vipākajino nāma; tadabhāvato puthujjano nippariyāyato avipākajino nāma;
tika-s0203t0:637_6: sekho pana siyā pariyāyato vipākajinoti. Tampi nivattento “akhīṇāsavassevāti attho”ti
tika-s0203t0:637_7: āha. Apassantassa rūpanti pāḷito padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ pubbe “puthujjanassā”ti
tika-s0203t0:637_8: vatvā puna “assutavato puthujjanassā”ti vacanaṃ andhaputhujjanassāyaṃ upekkhā, na
tika-s0203t0:637_9: kalyāṇaputhujjanassāti dassanatthaṃ. Gehassitā upekkhā hi yaṃ kiñci ārammaṇavatthuṃ
tika-s0203t0:637_10: apekkhasseva, na nirapekkhassāti iṭṭhe, iṭṭhamajjhatte vā ārammaṇe siyāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0203t0:637_11: “iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate”ti. Aññāṇena pana tattha ajjhupekkhanākārappatti hoti. Tenāha “guḷapiṇḍake”tiādi.
tika-s0203t0:638_0: Iṭṭhe arajjantassa aniṭṭhe adussantassāti idaṃ yebhuyyena sattānaṃ iṭṭhe rajjanaṃ,
tika-s0203t0:638_1: aniṭṭhe dussananti katvā vuttaṃ. Ayoniyomanasikāro hi taṃtaṃārammaṇavasena na katthacipi
tika-s0203t0:638_2: javananiyamaṃ karotīti vuttaviparītepi ārammaṇe rajjanadussanaṃ sambhavati, tathāpissa
tika-s0203t0:638_3: rajjanadussanaṃ atthato paṭikkhittamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Asamapekkhaneti asamaṃ ayuttadassane
tika-s0203t0:639_0: 309. Pavattanavasenāti uppādanavasena ceva bahulīkaraṇavasena ca. Nissāya ceva āgamma
tika-s0203t0:639_1: cāti āgamanaṭṭhānabhūte nissayapaccayabhūte ca katvā. Atikkantāni nāma honti vikkhambhanena
tika-s0203t0:640_1: Idhāpi pahāyakaṃ nāma pahātabbato balavameva, saṃkilesadhammānaṃ balavabhāvato sātisayaṃ
tika-s0203t0:640_2: pana balavabhāvaṃ sandhāya “idāni balavatā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Balavabhāvato vodānadhammānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:640_3: adhigamassa adhippetattā hettha nekkhammassitadomanassānampi pahānaṃ jotitaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:641_0: Upekkhāya pahāyakabhāvena adhippetattā “upekkhākathā veditabbā”ti vuttaṃ. Jhānassa
tika-s0203t0:641_1: alābhino ca lābhino ca pakiṇṇakasaṅkhārasammasanaṃ sandhāya, “suddhasaṅkhāre ca pādake
tika-s0203t0:641_2: katvā”ti. Upekkhāsahagatāti bhāvanāya paguṇabhāvaṃ āgamma kadāci ajjhupekkhanavasenapi
tika-s0203t0:641_3: hi sammasanaṃ hotīti. Pādakajjhānavasena, sammasitadhammavasena vā āgamanavipassanāya
tika-s0203t0:641_5: niyametvā vuttaṃ. Upekkhāsahagatā hotīti etthāpi eseva nayo. Catutthajjhānādīnīti
tika-s0203t0:641_6: ādi-saddena arūpajjhānāni saṅgaṇhāti. Purimasadisāvāti purimasadisā eva, upekkhāsahagatā
tika-s0203t0:641_7: vā hoti somanassasahagatā vāti attho. Idaṃ sandhāyāti yaṃ catutthajjhānādipādakato
tika-s0203t0:641_8: eva upekkhāsahagataṃ vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanaṃ nissāya somanassasahagatāya vipassanāya
tika-s0203t0:641_9: pahānaṃ, idaṃ sandhāya. Pahānanti cettha samatikkamalakkhaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:642_0: Etaṃ visesaṃ vipassanāya āvajjanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ. Vuṭṭhānagāminiyā āsanne samāpannajjhānavipassanā
tika-s0203t0:642_1: pādakajjhānavipassanā, sammasitadhammoti vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā. Puggalajjhāsayoti
tika-s0203t0:642_2: pādakajjhānassa sammasitajjhānassa ca bhede sati paṭipajjanakassa puggalassa, “aho
tika-s0203t0:642_3: vata mayhaṃ pañcaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ bhaveyya caturaṅgika”ntiādinā pubbe pavattaajjhāsayo.
tika-s0203t0:642_4: Tesampi vādeti ettha paṭhamatheravāde. Ayameva…pe… niyameti tato tato dutiyādipādakajjhānato
tika-s0203t0:642_6: virāgabhāvanābhāvato itarassa ca atabbhāvato. Eteneva hi paṭhamatheravāde apādakapaṭhamajjhānapādakamaggā
tika-s0203t0:642_7: paṭhamajjhānikāva honti, itare ca dutiyajjhānikādimaggā pādakajjhānavipassanāniyamehi
tika-s0203t0:642_8: taṃtaṃjhānikāva. Evaṃ sesavādesupi vipassanāniyamo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo. Tenāha
tika-s0203t0:642_9: – “tesampi vāde ayameva pubbabhāge vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāva niyametī”ti. Vuttāva,
tika-s0203t0:643_2: Ekārammaṇanissitāti ekappakāreneva ārammaṇe pavattā. Heṭṭhā aññāṇupekkhā vuttā “bālassa
tika-s0203t0:643_3: muḷhassā”tiādinā. Upari chaḷaṅgupekkhā vakkhati “upekkhako viharatī”tiādinā. Dve
tika-s0203t0:643_4: upekkhā gahitā dvinnampi ekattā, ekajjhaṃ gahetabbato, nānattasitāya upekkhāya pakāsitabhāvato ca.
tika-s0203t0:644_0: Aññāṇupekkhā aññā saddādīsu tattha tattheva vijjamānattā. Rūpesūti ca iminā na kevalaṃ
tika-s0203t0:644_1: rūpāyatanavisesā eva gahitā, atha kho kasiṇarūpānipīti āha – “rūpe upekkhābhāvañca
tika-s0203t0:644_2: aññā”tiādi. Ekattasitabhāvopi idha ekattavisayasampayogavaseneva icchito, na ārammaṇavasena
tika-s0203t0:644_3: cāti dassetuṃ, “yasmā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tenevāha “tatthā”tiādi. Sampayuttavasenāti
tika-s0203t0:645_1: etthāpi eseva nayo. Tāya kāmarūpārūpabhedāya taṇhāya nibbattāti tammayā, tebhūmakadhammā,
tika-s0203t0:645_2: tesaṃ bhāvo tammayatā, taṇhā yassa guṇassa vasena atthe saddaniveso, tadabhidhānakoti
tika-s0203t0:645_3: āha – “tammayatā nāma taṇhā”ti. Atammayatā tammayatāya paṭipakkhoti katvā. Vipassanupekkhanti,
tika-s0203t0:645_4: “yadatthi yaṃ bhūtaṃ, taṃ pajahati upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti evamāgataṃ saṅkhāravicinane
tika-s0203t0:646_0: 311. Yadariyoti ettha da-kāro padasandhikaro, upayogaputhuvacane ca ya-saddoti dassento,
tika-s0203t0:646_1: “ye satipaṭṭhāne ariyo”ti āha. Kāmaṃ “ariyo”ti padaṃ sabbesampi paṭividdhasaccānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:646_2: sādhāraṇaṃ, vakkhamānassa pana visesassa buddhāveṇikattā, “ariyo sammāsambuddho”ti
tika-s0203t0:646_3: vuttaṃ. Na hi paccekabuddhādīnaṃ ayamānubhāvo atthi. Tīsu ṭhānesūti na sussūsantīti
tika-s0203t0:646_4: vā, ekacce na sussūsanti ekacce sussūsantīti vā, sussūsantīti vā, paṭipannāpaṭipannānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:646_5: sāvakānaṃ paṭipattisaṅkhātesu tīsu satipaṭṭhānesu. Satiṃ paṭṭhapentoti paṭighānunayehi
tika-s0203t0:646_6: anavassutattā tadubhayanivattattā sabbadā satiṃ upaṭṭhapento. Buddhānameva sā niccaṃ
tika-s0203t0:646_7: upaṭṭhitasatitā, na itaresaṃ āveṇikadhammabhāvato. Ādarena sotumicchā idha sussūsāti
tika-s0203t0:646_8: tadabhāvaṃ dassento, “saddahitvā sotuṃ na icchantī”ti āha. Na aññāti “na aññāyā”ti
tika-s0203t0:646_9: vattabbe yakāralopena niddesoti āha “na jānanatthāyā”ti. Satthu ovādassa anādiyanameva
tika-s0203t0:647_1: Nekkhammassitadomanassassapi satthu pasaṅgavasena “na ceva attamano hotī”ti attamanapaṭikkhepena
tika-s0203t0:647_2: anattamanatā vuttā viya hotīti taṃ paṭisedhento – “appatīto hotīti na evamattho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
tika-s0203t0:647_3: Tassa setughāto hi tathāgatānaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kasmā attamanatāpaṭikkhepoti āha – “appaṭipannakesu
tika-s0203t0:647_4: pana anattamanatākāraṇassa abhāvenetaṃ vutta”nti. Paṭighaavassavenāti chahi dvārehi
tika-s0203t0:647_5: paṭighavissandanena, paṭighappavattiyāti attho. Uppilāvitoti na evamattho daṭṭhabbo
tika-s0203t0:647_6: uppilāvitattassa bodhimūle eva pahīnattā. Paṭipannakesūti idaṃ adhikāravasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0203t0:647_7: appaṭipannakesupi tathāgatassa anattamanatākāraṇaṃ nattheva. Etaṃ vuttanti etaṃ “attamano
tika-s0203t0:647_8: ceva hotī”tiādivacanaṃ vuttaṃ sāvakānaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā satthu anavajjāya cittārādhanāya sambhavato.
tika-s0203t0:648_1: ekadisāya eva sattadisāvidhāvanassa idhādhippetattā sāritānaṃ hatthidammādīnaṃ ekadisādhāvanampi
tika-s0203t0:648_2: anivattanavaseneva yuttanti āha – “anivattitvā dhāvanto ekaṃyeva disaṃ dhāvatī”ti.
tika-s0203t0:648_3: Kāyena anivattitvāvāti kāyena aparivattitvā eva. Vimokkhavasena aṭṭha disā vidhāvati,
tika-s0203t0:648_4: na puratthimādidisāvasena. Ekappahārenevāti ekanīhāreneva, ekasmiṃyeva vā divase
tika-s0203t0:648_5: ekabhāgena. “Pahāro”ti hi divasassa tatiyo bhāgo vuccati. Vidhāvanañcettha jhānasamāpajjanavasena
tika-s0203t0:651_0: 313. Desetabbassa atthassa uddisanaṃ uddeso, vibhajanaṃ vibhaṅgoti āha – “mātikañca
tika-s0203t0:651_1: vibhajanañcā”ti tuleyyātiādīni cattāripi padāni paññāvevacanāni. Atha vā tuleyyāti
tika-s0203t0:651_2: tulanabhūtāya paññāya tassa dhammassa paggahādividhinā parituleyya. Tīreyyāti tīraṇabhūtāya
tika-s0203t0:651_3: paññāya tattha ñāṇakiriyāsamāpanavasena tīreyya. Pariggaṇheyyāti tathāsamāpanno ānisaṃse
tika-s0203t0:651_4: assādaādīnave ca vicineyya. Paricchindeyyāti paricchindabhūtena ñāṇena atthaṃ paricchinditvā
tika-s0203t0:651_5: jāneyya. Ārammaṇesūti rūpādiputhuttārammaṇesu. Nikantivasenāti nikāmanavasena apekkhāvasena.
tika-s0203t0:651_6: Tiṭṭhamānanti pavattamānaṃ. Gocarajjhatteti jhānārammaṇabhūte. Tañhi bhāvanācittenābhibhuyya
tika-s0203t0:651_7: avissajjitvā gayhamānaṃ ajjhattaṃ viya hotīti “gocarajjhatta”nti vuccati. Bhāvanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:651_8: āraddhassa bhikkhuno yadi bhāvanārammaṇe nikanti uppajjeyya, tāya nikantiyā upari
tika-s0203t0:651_9: bhāvanaṃ vissajjetvā cittasaṃkocavasena saṇṭhitaṃ nāma, tadabhāvena asaṇṭhitaṃ nāma
tika-s0203t0:651_11: asaṇṭhita”nti āha. Tathā hi vakkhati – “nikantivasena hi atiṭṭhamānaṃ hānabhāgiyaṃ
tika-s0203t0:651_12: na hoti, visesabhāgiyameva hotī”ti. Aggahetvāti rūpādīsu kiñci taṇhādiggāhavasena
tika-s0203t0:651_13: aggahetvā. Tathā aggahaṇeneva hi taṇhāparitāsādivasena na paritasseyya. Avasesassa
tika-s0203t0:651_14: ca dukkhassāti sokādidukkhassa. Avasesassa ca dukkhassāti vā jātijarāmaraṇasīsena
tika-s0203t0:651_15: vipākadukkhassa gahitattā kilesadukkhassa ceva saṃsāradukkhassa cāti attho.
tika-s0203t0:652: 316. Rūpameva kilesuppattiyā kāraṇabhāvato rūpanimittaṃ. Rāgādivasena taṃ anudhāvatīti rūpanimittānusārī.
tika-s0203t0:653: 318. Nikantivasena asaṇṭhitanti apekkhāvasena saṇṭhitaṃ nikantiṃ pahāya pavattamānaṃ upari visesāvahatoti. Tenāha “nikantivasena hī”tiādi.
tika-s0203t0:654_1: upādiyitvā taṇhāparitāsādivasena paritassanā, vuttavipariyāyena aggahetvā aparitassanā
tika-s0203t0:654_2: veditabbā. Kathaṃ panesā anupādāparitassanā hotīti mahātherassa adhippāyaṃ vivarituṃ
tika-s0203t0:654_3: codanaṃ samuṭṭhapeti? Upādātabbassa abhāvatoti tassa anupādāparitassanābhāve kāraṇavacanaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:654_4: Yadi hītiādi tassa samatthanaṃ. Upādāparitassanāva assa tathā upādātabbassa tatheva
tika-s0203t0:654_5: upādinnattā. Evanti niccādiākārena. Upādinnāpīti gahitaparāmaṭṭhāpi. Anupādinnāva
tika-s0203t0:654_6: honti ayoniso gahitattā, viññūsu nissāya jānitabbattā ca. Diṭṭhivasenāti micchādiṭṭhiyā
tika-s0203t0:654_7: gahaṇākāravasena, tassa pana ayathābhūtagāhitāya paramatthato ca abhāvato. Atthatoti
tika-s0203t0:654_8: paramatthato. Anupādāparitassanāyeva nāma hoti upādātabbākārassa abhāvena taṃ anupādiyitvā
tika-s0203t0:655_0: Parivattatīti na tadeva rūpaṃ aññathā pavattaṃ parivattati, atha kho pakatijahanena
tika-s0203t0:655_1: sabhāvavigamena nassati bhijjati. Vipariṇatanti aññathattaṃ gataṃ vinaṭṭhaṃ. Kammaviññāṇanti
tika-s0203t0:655_2: abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ. “Rūpaṃ attā”tiādi micchāgāhavasena viññāṇassa rūpabhedena vuttassa
tika-s0203t0:655_3: bhedānuparivatti hoti. Vipariṇāmaṃ anugantvā viparivattanataṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ vipariṇāmānuparivattaṃ;
tika-s0203t0:655_4: tato samuppannā paritassanā vipariṇāmānuparivattajā paritassanāti dassento āha –
tika-s0203t0:655_5: “vipariṇāmassa…pe… paritassanā”ti. Akusaladhammasamuppādā cāti, “yaṃ ahu vata me,
tika-s0203t0:655_6: taṃ vata me natthī”tiādinā pavattā akusalacittuppādadhammā. Khepetvāti pavattituṃ
tika-s0203t0:655_7: appadānavasena anuppattinimittatāya khepetvā. Bhayatāsenāti bhāyanavasenapi cittutrāsena.
tika-s0203t0:655_8: Taṇhātāsenāti tassanena. Savighātoti cittavighātanavighātena savighāto. Tato eva
tika-s0203t0:655_10: uppannasaññāya. Aggahetvā paritassanāti gahetabbassa abhāvena gahaṇampi avijjamānapakkhiyamevāti
tika-s0203t0:656: 321. Kammaviññāṇameva natthi sati kammaviññāṇe rūpabhedānuparivatti siyāti kammaviññāṇābhāvadassanamukhena khīṇāsavassa sabbaso kilesābhāvaṃ dasseti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0203t0:659_0: 323. Gehassitavasenāti kilesanissitavasena anurodhavasena. Neva ukkhipeyyāti na anuggaṇheyya.
tika-s0203t0:659_1: Na avakkhipeyyāti gehassitavasena virodhavasena na niggaṇheyya. Anurodhena vinā sampahaṃsanavasena
tika-s0203t0:659_2: yathābhūtaguṇakathanaṃ nevussādanā vajjābhāvato; tathā virodhena vinā vivecanavasena
tika-s0203t0:659_3: yathābhūtadosakathanaṃ na apasādanaṃ. Sabhāvamevāti yathābhūtasabhāvameva kassaci
tika-s0203t0:659_4: puggalassa anādesakaraṇavasena katheyya, seyyathāpi āyasmā subhūtitthero. Vinicchitasukhanti,
tika-s0203t0:659_5: “ajjhattaṃ anavajja”ntiādinā visesato vinicchitasukhāya hoti. Parammukhā avaṇṇanti
tika-s0203t0:659_6: svāyaṃ rahovādo pesuññūpasaṃhāravasena pavatto idhādhippetoti āha “pisuṇavācanti
tika-s0203t0:659_7: attho”ti. Khīṇātīti khīṇo, yo bhāsati, yañca uddissa bhāsati, dvepi hiṃsati vibādhatīti
tika-s0203t0:659_8: attho, taṃ khīṇavādaṃ. Svāyaṃ yasmā kilesehi ākiṇṇo saṃkiliṭṭho eva ca hoti, tasmā
tika-s0203t0:659_9: vuttaṃ – “ākiṇṇaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ vāca”nti. Tena avasiṭṭhaṃ tividhampi vacīduccaritamāha.
tika-s0203t0:659_10: Adhiṭṭhahitvāti, “idameva sacca”nti ajjhosāya. Ādāyāti paggayha. Vohareyyāti samudācareyya.
tika-s0203t0:660_0: 324. Ārammaṇato sampayogato kāmehi paṭisaṃhitattā kāmapaṭisandhi, kāmasukhaṃ. Tenāha
tika-s0203t0:660_2: Tathā sapariḷāhoti vipākapariḷāhena ceva kilesapariḷāhena ca sapariḷāho.
tika-s0203t0:661_0: 326. Vaṭṭato nissarituṃ adatvā tattheva sīdāpanato micchāpaṭipadābhāvena satte saṃyojetīti
tika-s0203t0:661_1: saṃyojanaṃ, visesato bhavasaṃyojanaṃ taṇhāti āha “taṇhāyetaṃ nāma”nti. Na taṇhāyeva
tika-s0203t0:661_2: mānādayopi saṃyojanattaṃ sādhenti nāma sabbaso saṃyojanato suṭṭhu bandhanato. Tena
tika-s0203t0:662_0: Imaṃ catukkanti, “ye kāmapaṭisandhisukhino somanassānuyogaṃ anuyuttā, ye attakilamathānuyogaṃ
tika-s0203t0:662_1: anuyuttā”ti evamāgataṃ imaṃ catukkaṃ nissāya. “Etadagge ṭhapito”ti, vatvā taṃ nissāya
tika-s0203t0:662_2: ṭhapitabhāvaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ, “bhagavato hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ussādanāapasādanā
tika-s0203t0:662_3: paññāyanti tathāgatena vinetabbapuggalavasena dhammadesanāya pavattetabbato. Ayaṃ
tika-s0203t0:662_4: puggalo…pe… ācārasampannoti vā natthi paresaṃ anuddesakavasena dhammadesanāya pavattanato.
tika-s0203t0:663_0: 329. Parammukhā avaṇṇanti nindiyassa dosassa nindanaṃ. Na hi kadāci nindiyo pasaṃsiyo
tika-s0203t0:663_1: hoti, taṃ pana kālaṃ ñatvāva kathetabbanti āha, “yuttapattakālaṃ ñatvāvā”ti. Khīṇavādepi
tika-s0203t0:664: 330. Ghātīyatīti vadhīyati. Saddopi bhijjati nassati, bhedo hotīti attho. Gelaññappattoti khedaṃ parissamaṃ patto. Apalibuddhanti dosehi ananupatitaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:665_0: 331. Abhinivissa voharatīti evametaṃ, na ito aññathāti taṃ janapadaniruttiṃ abhinivisitvā
tika-s0203t0:665_1: samudācarati. Atidhāvananti samaññaṃ nāmetaṃ lokasaṅketasiddhā paññattīti paññattimatte
tika-s0203t0:667_1: saṅkarabhāvavibhājanaṃ. Raṇanti sattā etehi kandanti akandantāpi kandanakāraṇabhāvatoti
tika-s0203t0:667_2: raṇā; rāgadosamohā, dasapi vā kilesā, sabbepi vā ekantākusalā, tehi nānappakāradukkhanibbattakehi
tika-s0203t0:667_3: abhibhūtā sattā kandanti; saha raṇehīti saraṇo. Raṇasaddo vā rāgādireṇūsu niruḷho.
tika-s0203t0:667_4: Tenāha “sarajo sakileso”ti. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “sadukkho eso dhammo”tiādinā āgatattā kāmasukhānuyogādayopi
tika-s0203t0:667_5: “saraṇo”ti vuttāti dukkhādīnaṃ raṇabhāvo tannibbattakasabhāvānaṃ akusalānaṃ saraṇatā
tika-s0203t0:667_6: ca veditabbā. Araṇotiādīnaṃ padānaṃ vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0203t0:668_1: attānaṃ visodheti; nirodhasamāpattiyā vatthuvisodhanaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhitānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:668_3: “tathā hī”tiādi. Tathevāti iminā “piṇḍāya caranto”tiādiṃ upasaṃharati. Mettābhāvanāya
tika-s0203t0:668_5: Tena dāyakatopi dakkhiṇāvisuddhiṃ dasseti. Vatthusodhanaṃ pana paṭibhāgato. Evaṃ
tika-s0203t0:668_6: pana kātuṃ sakkāti sāvakānampi kimevaṃ lahuvuṭṭhānādhiṭṭhānaṃ sāvakesu ciṇṇavasībhāvo
tika-s0203t0:668_7: sambhavatīti pucchati. Itaro aggasāvakamahāsāvakesu kiṃ vattabbaṃ, pakatisāvakesupi
tika-s0203t0:668_8: vasippattesu labbhatīti te dassento, “āma sakkā”tiādimāha. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0203t0:671_0: 342. Aparikkhīṇāyukaṃ pukkusātikulaputtaṃ uddissa gamananti katvā vuttaṃ “turitagamanacārika”nti.
tika-s0203t0:671_1: Mama vāsupagamanena tava cittassa aphāsukaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ sace natthi. Soti pubbupagato.
tika-s0203t0:671_2: Dinnaṃ dinnameva vaṭṭatīti ekavāraṃ dinnaṃ dinnameva yuttaṃ, na puna dātabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t0:671_3: Kataṃ katamevāti saṅgahatthaṃ kataṃ anucchavikakammaṃ katameva, na taṃ puna viparivattetabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t0:672_0: Pukkusātimhi ubhayathāpi kulaputtabhāvo paripuṇṇo evāti āha – “jātikulaputtopi ācārakulaputtopī”ti.
tika-s0203t0:672_1: Tatrāti tasmiṃ takkasīlato āgamane. Aṅke nipannadārakaṃ viya janaṃ toseti tuṭṭhiṃ
tika-s0203t0:672_2: pāpeti. Ratanāni uppajjanti pabbatasamuddādisannissitattā paccantadesassa. Dassanīyanti
tika-s0203t0:673: Anagghakambale mahagghakambale. Sārakaraṇḍaketi candanasārādisāramayakaraṇḍake. Likhāpetvā ukkirāpetvā. Lākhāya vaṭṭāpetvāti mukhaṃ pidahitvā lākhāparikammaṃ kāretvā.
tika-s0203t0:674_0: Anto dussabhaṇḍikaṃ atthīti aññāsi nātigarukabhāvato. Anagghā ahesunti vaṇṇasampattiphassasampattipamāṇamahattadunnimmāpiyatāhi
tika-s0203t0:674_1: mahagghā ahesuṃ, mahāpuñño rājā tassa atthevāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t0:675_0: Yadi evaṃ, “kinnu kho pesemī”ti kasmā vīmaṃsaṃ āpajjīti āha – “apica kho panā”tiādi.
tika-s0203t0:675_1: Soti bimbisāro rājā. Vicinituṃ āraddho ratanassa anekavidhattā uttaruttariñca paṇītatarādibhāvato.
tika-s0203t0:676_0: Sāmaṃ saccānaṃ abhisambuddhatāsāmaññena, “buddharatanampi duvidha”nti vuttaṃ. Buddharatanasamaṃ
tika-s0203t0:676_1: ratanaṃ nāma natthi, yasmā pana imasmiṃ loke parasmiṃ vā pana buddhena sadiso na
tika-s0203t0:677_0: Rājā tuṭṭho cintesi, “tattha avijjamānaṃyeva pesetuṃ laddha”nti. Tasmāti yasmā paripuṇṇaṃ
tika-s0203t0:677_1: ekadivasampi tasmiṃ padese buddhānaṃ āvāsapariggaho natthi, tasmā. Pubbadisāmukhanti
tika-s0203t0:678_0: Evaṃ anaññasādhāraṇassa bhagavato īdiso samudāgamoti dassetuṃ, “evaṃ dasa pāramiyo
tika-s0203t0:678_1: pūretvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sampannasamudāgamassa tadanurūpā ayaṃ phalasampadāti dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t0:679_0: Ariyadhammo nāma ariyamaggappadhāno, ariyamaggo ca sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyasaṅgaho,
tika-s0203t0:679_1: te ca uddesamatteneva gahitāti āha – “sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiye ekadesena likhitvā”ti.
tika-s0203t0:679_2: Cūḷasīlādīni brahmajāle āgatanayena veditabbāni. Chadvārasaṃvaraṃ satisampajaññanti
tika-s0203t0:679_3: manacchaṭṭhānaṃ dvārānaṃ saṃvaraṇavasena sattaṭṭhānikaṃ satisampajaññaṃ. Dvādasappabhedaṃ
tika-s0203t0:679_5: “Abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyā”tiādinā vuttaṃ nīvaraṇappahānaṃ. Parikammanti kasiṇādiparikammaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:679_6: Pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayena aṭṭhatiṃsa kammaṭṭhānāni. Visuddhipaṭipāṭiyā yāva āsavakkhayā
tika-s0203t0:679_7: imaṃ paṭipattiṃ ekadesena likhi. Soḷasavidhanti soḷasavidhabhāvanāya payogaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:680_1: Bahi vatthena veṭhetvāti paṭhamaṃ sukhumakambalena veṭhetvā paṭipāṭiyā tettiṃsāya
tika-s0203t0:680_2: samuggesu pakkhipitvā tato bahi sukhumavatthena veṭhetvā chādetvā. Tiṇagacchapahānasammajjanādinā
tika-s0203t0:680_4: mā niṭṭhāpethāti attho. Rājānubhāvena paṭiyādethāti mama rājānurūpaṃ sajjetha, alaṅkarothāti
tika-s0203t0:680_5: attho. Antarabhogikānanti anuyuttarājamahāmattānaṃ. Javanadūteti khippaṃ gacchantakadūtapurise.
tika-s0203t0:681_0: Raññā paṇṇākāraṃ uddissa katapūjāsakkārassa amaccato sutattā paṇṇākāraṃ uccaṭṭhāne
tika-s0203t0:681_1: ṭhapetvā sayaṃ nīcāsane nisinno. Nāyaṃ aññassa ratanassa bhavissatīti ayaṃ parihāro
tika-s0203t0:681_2: aññassa maṇimuttādibhedassa ratanassa na bhavissati maṇimuttādīhi abhisaṅkhatattā.
tika-s0203t0:681_3: Balavasomanassaṃ uppajji ciratanakālaṃ buddhasāsane bhāvitabhāvanatāya vāsitavāsanatāya
tika-s0203t0:681_4: ghaṭe dīpo viya abbhantare eva samujjalamānaparipakkatihetukabhāvato.
tika-s0203t0:682_0: Dhāremīti icchāmi, gaṇhāmīti attho. Dvejjhavacananti dveḷhakabhāvo. Antaraṃ karotīti
tika-s0203t0:682_1: dvinnaṃ pādānaṃ antaraṃ taṃ lekhaṃ karoti, ekena pādena atikkamīti attho. Tassā gatamaggenāti
tika-s0203t0:682_2: tāya deviyā vivaṭṭamānāya nāsitāya gatamaggena. Taṃ pana lekhanti pukkusātinā katalekhaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:683_1: manasi katvā tanninnabhāvena gacchanto, “pucchissāmī”tipi cittaṃ na uppādesi, “ettha
tika-s0203t0:683_2: nu kho satthā vasatī”ti parivitakkasseva abhāvato; rājagahaṃ pana patvā rañño pesitasāsanavasena
tika-s0203t0:683_3: tattha ca vihārassa bahubhāvato satthā kahaṃ vasatīti pucchi. Satthu ekakasseva nikkhamanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:683_4: pañcacattālīsa yojanāni padasā gamanañca dhammapūjāvasena katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dhammapūjāya
tika-s0203t0:683_5: ca buddhānaṃ āciṇṇabhāvo heṭṭhā vitthāritoyeva. Buddhasobhaṃ pana paṭicchādetvā aññātakavesena
tika-s0203t0:683_6: tattha gamanaṃ tassa kulaputtassa vissatthavasena maggadarathapaṭipassambhanatthaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:683_7: Appaṭipassaddhamaggadaratho hi dhammadesanāya bhājanaṃ na hotīti. Tathāhi vakkhati,
tika-s0203t0:684_0: Uruddhanti visālanti keci. Atirekatiyojanasatantiādinā anvayato byatirekato ca maccheravinayane
tika-s0203t0:684_1: sabrahmacārīnaṃ ovādadānaṃ. Accantasukhumālotiādinā satthu dhammagāravena saddhiṃ
tika-s0203t0:684_2: kulaputtassapi dhammagāravaṃ saṃsandati sametīti dasseti. Tena bhagavato katassa
tika-s0203t0:684_3: paccuggamanassa ṭhānagatabhāvaṃ vibhāvento aññesampi bhabbarūpānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ yathārahaṃ
tika-s0203t0:685_0: Brahmalokappamāṇanti uccabhāvena. Ānubhāvenāti iddhānubhāvena yathā so sotapathaṃ
tika-s0203t0:685_1: na upagacchati, evaṃ vūpasametuṃ sakkoti. Avibbhantanti vibbhamarahitaṃ nilloluppaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:685_3: vuttaṃ. Itthambhūtalakkhaṇe etaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha “yathā iriyato”tiādi.
tika-s0203t0:685_4: Amanāpo hoti passantānaṃ. Sīhaseyyāya nipannassapi hi ekacce sarīrāvayavā adhokhittavikkhittā
tika-s0203t0:685_5: viya dissanti. Kaṭiyaṃ dvinnaṃ ūrusandhīnaṃ dvinnañca jāṇusandhīnaṃ vasena catusandhikapallaṅkaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:685_6: Na patiṭṭhātīti nappavattati, “kaṃsi tva”ntiādinā apucchite kathāpavatti eva na hoti.
tika-s0203t0:685_7: Appatiṭṭhitāya kathāya na sañjāyatīti tathā pana pucchāvasena kathāya appavattitāya
tika-s0203t0:685_8: upari dhammakathā na sañjāyati na uppajjati. Itīti tasmā. Kathāpatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ
tika-s0203t0:686_0: Sabhāvameva kathetīti attano bhagavato adiṭṭhapubbattā “adiṭṭhapubbakaṃ kathamahaṃ
tika-s0203t0:686_1: jāneyya”nti sabhāvameva kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayameva katheti; na pana sadevakassa
tika-s0203t0:686_2: lokassa supākaṭaṃ sabhāvasiddhaṃ buddharūpakāyasabhāvaṃ. Atha vā sabhāvameva kathetīti
tika-s0203t0:686_3: “idameva”nti jānantopi tadā bhagavato ruciyā tathāpavattamānaṃ rūpakāyasabhāvameva
tika-s0203t0:686_4: katheti appavikkhambhanti adhippāyo. Tenāha – “tathā hi na”ntiādi, vipassanālakkhaṇameva
tika-s0203t0:687_1: pubbabhāgapaṭipadañca sarūpato dassetuṃ, “yassa hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Aparisuddhāyapi
tika-s0203t0:687_2: pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya vipassanā tathā na kiccakārī, pageva avijjamānāyāti, “yassa
tika-s0203t0:687_3: hi…pe… aparisuddhā hoti”cceva vuttaṃ. Pubbabhāgapaṭipadā ca nāma saṅkhepato pannarasa
tika-s0203t0:687_4: caraṇadhammāti āha – “sīlasaṃvaraṃ…pe… imaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ ācikkhatī”ti. Yānakiccaṃ
tika-s0203t0:687_5: sādheti maggagamanena akilantabhāvasādhanattā. Cirakālaṃ paribhāvitāya paripakkagatāya
tika-s0203t0:687_6: hetusampadāya upaṭṭhāpitaṃ sāmaṇerasīlampi paripuṇṇaṃ akhaṇḍādibhāvappattiyā, yaṃ
tika-s0203t0:688_0: Dhātuyo paramatthato vijjamānā, paññattimattho puriso avijjamāno. Atha kasmā bhagavā
tika-s0203t0:688_2: desanaṃ ārabhīti āha – “bhagavā hī”tiādi. Katthaci “tevijjo chaḷabhiñño”tiādīsu vijjamānena
tika-s0203t0:688_3: avijjamānaṃ dasseti. Katthaci – “itthirūpaṃ, bhikkhave, purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya
tika-s0203t0:688_4: tiṭṭhatī”tiādīsu avijjamānena vijjamānaṃ dasseti. Katthaci “cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sotaviññāṇa”ntiādīsu
tika-s0203t0:688_5: vijjamānena vijjamānaṃ dasseti. Katthaci – “khattiyakumāro brāhmaṇakaññāya saddhiṃ
tika-s0203t0:688_6: saṃvāsaṃ kappetī”tiādīsu avijjamānena avijjamānaṃ dasseti. Idha pana vijjamānena
tika-s0203t0:688_7: avijjamānaṃ dasseti. “Chadhāturo”ti hi samāsattho avijjamāno puggalavisayattā, tassa
tika-s0203t0:688_8: padassa avayavattho pana appadhānattho vijjamāno, so saddakkamena appadhānopi atthakkamena
tika-s0203t0:688_9: padhānoti āha – “vijjamānena avijjamānaṃ dassento”ti. Puggalādhiṭṭhānāyettha desanāya
tika-s0203t0:688_10: kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ, “sace hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Upaṭṭhāpeyyāti – “dhātuyo”icceva kulaputtassa
tika-s0203t0:688_11: cittaṃ niveseyya tathā sañjāneyya, evaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyāti attho. Sandehaṃ kareyyāti
tika-s0203t0:688_12: asati purise ko karoti? Ko paṭisaṃvedeti, dhātuyo evāti kiṃ nu kho idaṃ, kathaṃ nu
tika-s0203t0:688_13: kho idanti saṃsayaṃ uppādeyya? Sammohaṃ āpajjeyyāti caturaṅgasamannāgate andhakāre
tika-s0203t0:688_14: vattamānaṃ viya desiyamāne atthe sammohaṃ āpajjeyya. Tathābhūto ca desanāya abhājanabhūtattā
tika-s0203t0:688_15: desanaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ na sakkuṇeyya. Evamāhāti evaṃ “chadhāturo”ti āha.
tika-s0203t0:689_0: Yaṃ tvaṃ purisoti sañjānāsīti yaṃ rūpārūpadhammasamūhaṃ pabandhavasena pavattamānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:689_1: adhiṭṭhānavisesavisiṭṭhaṃ – “puriso satto itthī”tiādinā tvaṃ sañjānāsi, so chadhāturo.
tika-s0203t0:689_2: Santesupi chadhātuvinimuttesu dhātvantaresu sukhāvaggahaṇatthaṃ tathā vuttaṃ taggahaṇeneva
tika-s0203t0:689_3: ca tesaṃ gahetabbato, svāyamattho heṭṭhā dassito eva. Sesapadesūti “chaphassāyatano”tiādipadesupi.
tika-s0203t0:689_4: Cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni catasso patiṭṭhā etassāti caturādhiṭṭhāno, adhitiṭṭhati patiṭṭhahati
tika-s0203t0:689_5: etenāti adhiṭṭhānaṃ, yesu patiṭṭhāya uttamatthaṃ arahattaṃ adhigacchati, tesaṃ paññādīnaṃ
tika-s0203t0:689_6: etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tenāha “svāyaṃ bhikkhū”tiādi. Ettoti vaṭṭato. Vivaṭṭitvāti vinivaṭṭitvā
tika-s0203t0:689_7: apasakkitvā. Ettoti vā etehi chadhātuādīhi. Ettha hi niviṭṭhassa āyattassa uttamāya
tika-s0203t0:689_8: siddhiyā asambhavoti. Patiṭṭhitanti ariyamaggādhigamavasena suppatiṭṭhitaṃ. Evañhi
tika-s0203t0:689_9: sabbaso paṭipakkhasamucchindanena tattha patiṭṭhito hoti. Maññassavā nappavattantīti
tika-s0203t0:689_10: chahipi dvārehi pavattamānasotāya maggena visositāya sabbaso vigatāya sabbaso vicchedappattiyā
tika-s0203t0:689_11: na sandanti. Tenāha “nappavattantī”ti. Yasmā māne sabbaso samucchinne asamucchinno
tika-s0203t0:689_12: anupasanto kileso nāma natthi, tasmā āha – “muni santoti vuccatī”ti rāgaggiādīnaṃ nibbānena nibbuto.
tika-s0203t0:690_0: Paññaṃ nappamajjeyyāti, “divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ
tika-s0203t0:690_3: sīlavisodhanamāha; sacce ṭhito samādinnasīlaṃ avikopetvā paripūrento samādhisaṃvattaniyataṃ
tika-s0203t0:690_4: karoti. Tenāha “vacīsaccaṃ rakkheyyā”ti. Kilesapariccāgaṃ brūheyyāti tadaṅgādivasena
tika-s0203t0:690_5: kilesānaṃ pariccajanavidhiṃ vaḍḍheyya. Kilesavūpasamanaṃ sikkheyyāti yathā te kilesā
tika-s0203t0:690_6: tadaṅgādivasena pariccattā yathāsamudācārappavattiyā santāne pariḷāhaṃ na janenti;
tika-s0203t0:690_7: evaṃ kilesānaṃ vūpasamanavidhiṃ sikkheyya paññādhiṭṭhānādīnanti lokuttarānaṃ paññādhiṭṭhānādīnaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:691: 347. Pubbe vuttānanti, “caturādhiṭṭhāno, yattha ṭhitaṃ maññassavā nappavattantī”ti evaṃ pubbe vuttānaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:692_0: 348. Vattabbaṃ bhaveyyāti niddesavasena vattabbaṃ bhaveyya. Ādīhīti evamādīhi. Kiccaṃ
tika-s0203t0:692_2: desetabbadhammānaṃ yathāsabhāveneva. Sappāyaṃ dhutaṅganti attano kilesaniggaṇhanayoggaṃ
tika-s0203t0:692_3: dhutaṅgaṃ. Cittarucitanti attano cittapakatiyā ācariyehi virocetabbaṃ, cariyānukūlanti
tika-s0203t0:693_0: 354. Ayampetthāti pi-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena “athāparaṃ upekkhāyeva avasissatī”ti
tika-s0203t0:693_1: uparidesanaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Sopi hi pāṭiyekko anusandhīti. Nanu cāyaṃ yathāuddiṭṭhāya
tika-s0203t0:693_2: viññāṇadhātuyā niddesopi bhavissatīti yathānusandhinayo vijjatīti? Na, viññāṇadhātuniddesanayena
tika-s0203t0:693_3: desanāya appavattattā tenāha “heṭṭhato”tiādi. Yaṃ vā panātiādinā pana desanāya sānusandhitaṃ
tika-s0203t0:693_4: vibhāveti. Na hi buddhā bhagavanto ananusandhikaṃ desanaṃ desenti. Āgamanīyavipassanāvasenāti
tika-s0203t0:693_5: yassā pubbe pavattattā āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhitā vipassanā, tassā vasena. Kammakārakaviññāṇanti
tika-s0203t0:693_6: “netaṃ mama nesohamasmi, na meso attā”ti evaṃ vipassanākiccakārakaṃ vipassanāsahitaṃ
tika-s0203t0:693_7: viññāṇaṃ. Viññāṇadhātuvasenāti yathāuddiṭṭhāya viññāṇadhātuyā bhājanavasena. Satthu
tika-s0203t0:693_8: kathanatthāyāti satthārā uddesameva katvā ṭhapitattā niddesavasena kathanatthāya.
tika-s0203t0:693_9: Akathitabhāvo eva hissa avasiṭṭhatā kathanatthāya paṭivijjhanatthāya ca. Paṭipakkhavigamena
tika-s0203t0:693_10: tassa cittassa parisuddhatāti āha “nirupakkilesa”nti. Upakkilesānaṃ pana pahīnabhāvato
tika-s0203t0:693_12: Kāraṇabhāvena sukhāya vedanāya hitanti sukhavedaniyaṃ. Tenāha “sukhavedanāya paccayabhūta”nti.
tika-s0203t0:694: 360. Rūpakammaṭṭhānampi catudhātuvavatthānavasena, arūpakammaṭṭhānampi sukhadukkhavedanāmukhena paguṇaṃ jātaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:695_1: nisedheti, tasmā vuttamevatthaṃ samatthetuṃ, “imasmiṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Kulaputtassa
tika-s0203t0:695_3: tava idaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāna”nti. Yaṃ kiñci suvaṇṇatāpanayogyaṃ aṅgārabhājanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:695_4: idha “ukkā”ti adhippetanti āha “aṅgārakapalla”nti. Sajjeyyāti yathā tattha pakkhittasuvaṇṇañca
tika-s0203t0:695_5: tappati, evaṃ paṭiyādiyeyya. Nīhaṭadosanti vigatībhūtakāḷakaṃ. Apanītakasāvanti apagatasukhumakāḷakaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:696_0: Ariyamagge patiṭṭhāpetukāmena nāma sabbasmimpi lokiyadhamme virajjanatthāya dhammo
tika-s0203t0:696_1: kathetabboti adhippāyena, “kasmā panā”tiādinā codanā katā. Vineyyadamanakusalena
tika-s0203t0:696_2: bhagavatā veneyyajjhāsayavasena tāva catutthajjhānupekkhāya vaṇṇo kathitoti tassa
tika-s0203t0:697_0: 361. Tadanudhammanti tassa arūpāvacarassa kusalassa anurūpadhammaṃ, yāya paṭipadāya
tika-s0203t0:697_1: tassa adhigamo hoti, tassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadanti attho. Tenāha “rūpāvacarajjhāna”nti.
tika-s0203t0:697_2: Taggahaṇāti tassa gahaṇena tassā paṭipattiyā paṭipajjamānena. Ito uttarinti “viññāṇañcāyatana”ntiādīsu.
tika-s0203t0:698_0: 362. Tassevāti arūpāvacarajjhānassa. Etaṃ pana savipākaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānaṃ samecca
tika-s0203t0:698_1: sambhuyya paccayehi katattā saṅkhataṃ. Pakappitanti paccayavasena savihitaṃ. Āyūhitanti
tika-s0203t0:698_2: sampiṇḍitaṃ. Karontena karīyatīti paṭipajjanakena paṭipajjīyati saṅkharīyati. Nibbānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:698_3: viya na niccaṃ na sassataṃ. Atha kho khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanasabhāvatāya tāvakālikaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:698_4: Tato eva cavanādisabhāvanti sabbametaṃ rūpāvacaradhammesu ādīnavavibhāvanaṃ. Dukkhe
tika-s0203t0:698_5: patiṭṭhitanti saṅkhāradukkhe patiṭṭhitaṃ. Atāṇanti cavanasabhāvāditāya tāṇarahitaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:698_6: Aleṇanti tato arakkhattā līyanaṭṭhānarahitaṃ. Asaraṇanti appaṭisaraṇaṃ. Asaraṇībhūtanti
tika-s0203t0:699_0: Samattapattavise khandhādīsu gahite duttikicchā siyāti, “khandhaṃ vā sīsaṃ vā gahetuṃ
tika-s0203t0:699_1: adatvā”ti vuttaṃ. Evamevāti etthāyaṃ upamāsaṃsandanā – cheko bhisakko viya sammāsambuddho.
tika-s0203t0:699_2: Visavikāro viya kilesadukkhānubandho, bhisakkassa visaṃ ṭhānato cāvetvā upari āropanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:699_3: viya bhagavato desanānubhāvena kulaputtassa kāmabhave nikantiṃ pariyādāya arūpajjhāne
tika-s0203t0:699_4: bhavanaṃ. Bhisakkassa visaṃ otāretvā pathaviyaṃ pātanaṃ viya kulaputtassa orambhāgiyakilesadukkhāpanayanaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:700_0: Asampattassāti arūpāvacarajjhānaṃ anadhigatassa. Appaṭiladdhassevāti tassa vevacanaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:700_1: Sabbametanti “aniccaṃ adhuva”ntiādinā vitthārato vuttaṃ sabbametaṃ ādīnavaṃ. Ekapadeneva
tika-s0203t0:700_2: “saṅkhatameta”nti kathesi saṅkhatapadeneva tassa atthassa anavasesato pariyādinnattā.
tika-s0203t0:701_0: Nāyūhatīti bhavakāraṇacetanāvasena byāpāraṃ na samūheti na sampiṇḍeti. Tenāha – “na
tika-s0203t0:701_1: rāsiṃ karotī”ti. Abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ nāma cetanābyāpāroti āha – “na abhisañcetayatī”ti.
tika-s0203t0:701_2: Taṃ pana phaluppādanasamatthatāya phalena kappananti āha “na kappetī”ti. Sace abhisaṅkhāracetanā
tika-s0203t0:701_3: uḷārā, phalamahattasaṅkhātāya vuḍḍhiyā hoti, anuḷārā ca avuḍḍhiyāti āha – “vuḍḍhiyā
tika-s0203t0:701_4: vā parihāniyā vā”ti. Buddhavisaye ṭhatvāti bhagavā attano buddhasubuddhatāya sīhasamānavuttitāya
tika-s0203t0:701_5: ca desanaṃ ukkaṃsato sāvakehi pattabbaṃ visesaṃ anavasesento tathā vadati, na sāvakavisayaṃ
tika-s0203t0:701_6: atikkamitvā attano buddhavisayameva desento. Tenāha – “arahattanikūṭaṃ gaṇhī”ti.
tika-s0203t0:701_7: Yadi kulaputto attano…pe… paṭivijjhi, atha kasmā bhagavā desanāya arahattanikūṭaṃ
tika-s0203t0:702_0: Ito pubbeti ito anāgāmiphalādhigamato uttari upari. Assāti kulaputtassa. Kathentassa
tika-s0203t0:702_1: bhagavato dhamme neva kaṅkhā na vimati paṭhamamaggeneva kaṅkhāya samucchinnattā.
tika-s0203t0:702_2: Ekaccesu ṭhānesūti tathā vineyyaṭhānesu. Tathā hi ayampi kulaputto anāgāmiphalaṃ
tika-s0203t0:702_3: patvā bhagavantaṃ sañjāni. Tena vuttaṃ “yato anenā”tiādi.
tika-s0203t0:703: 363. Anajjhositāti anajjhosanīyāti ayamatthoti āha – “gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvā gahetuṃ na yuttā”ti.
tika-s0203t0:704_0: 364. Rāgova anusayo rāgānusayo, so ca paccayasamavāye uppajjanārahoti vattabbataṃ
tika-s0203t0:704_1: labhatīti vuttaṃ – “sukhavedanaṃ ārabbha rāgānusayo uppajjeyyā”ti. Na pana tassa
tika-s0203t0:704_2: uppādanaṃ atthi khaṇattayasamāyogāsambhavato. Esa nayo sesesupi. Itaranti adukkhamasukhavedanaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:704_3: Visaṃyuttoti kenaci saññojanena asaṃyuttatāya eva niyatavippayutto. Kāyassa koṭi
tika-s0203t0:704_4: paramo anto etassāti kāyakoṭikaṃ. Dutiyapadeti “jīvitapariyantika”nti imasmiṃ pade.
tika-s0203t0:704_5: Visevanassāti upādānassa. Sītībhavissantīti padassa “nirujjhissantī”ti attho vutto,
tika-s0203t0:704_6: kathaṃ pana vedayitānaṃ dvādasasu āyatanesu nirujjhanaṃ sītibhāvappattīti codanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:704_8: Nanu sabbaso kilesapariḷāhavigame sītibhāvo nāma vedanānirodhamattena adhippeto;
tika-s0203t0:704_9: tena idha vedayitāni vuttāni, na kilesāti vedayitānaṃ accantanirodhasaṅkhāto sītibhāvopi
tika-s0203t0:705_0: 365. Idaṃ opammasaṃsandananti ettha saññojanā dīpasikhā viya, adhiṭṭhānakapallikā
tika-s0203t0:705_1: viya vedanāya nissayabhūtā cattāro khandhā, telaṃ viya kilesā, vaṭṭi viya kammavaṭṭaṃ,
tika-s0203t0:705_2: upaharaṇakapuriso viya vaṭṭagāmī puthujjano, tassa sīsacchedakapuriso viya arahattamaggo
tika-s0203t0:705_3: santānassa samucchedakaraṇato, anāhārāya dīpasikhāya nibbāyanaṃ viya kammakilesānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:706_0: Ādimhi samādhivipassanāpaññāhīti pubbabhāgapaṭipadābhūtā tayā paguṇasamādhito arahattassa
tika-s0203t0:706_1: padaṭṭhānabhūtavipassanāpaññāto ca. Uttaritarāti visiṭṭhatarā. Evaṃ samannāgatoti
tika-s0203t0:706_2: ettha evaṃ-saddo idaṃsaddatthavacanoti āha – “iminā uttamena arahattaphalapaññādhiṭṭhānenā”ti.
tika-s0203t0:706_3: Sabbaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ khepetīti sabbadukkhakkhayo, aggamaggo, taṃpariyāpannatāya tattha
tika-s0203t0:706_4: ñāṇanti āha – “sabbadukkhakkhaye ñāṇaṃ nāma arahattamagge ñāṇa”nti. Arahattaphale
tika-s0203t0:706_5: ñāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ vuttanayena sabbadukkhakkhaye sante tannimittaṃ vā uppannañāṇanti
tika-s0203t0:706_6: katvā. Tassāti, “evaṃ samannāgato bhikkhu iminā paramena paññādhiṭṭhānena samannāgato
tika-s0203t0:707_0: 366. Hīti yasmā. Vimuttīti arahattaphalavimutti, tasmā sabbadukkhakkhaye ñāṇanti
tika-s0203t0:707_1: arahattaphalañāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ. Saccanti paramatthasaccaṃ nibbānaṃ, na maggasaccaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:707_2: Kāmaṃ arahattaphalavimutti paṭipakkhehi akopanīyatāya akuppā, “sacce ṭhitā”ti pana
tika-s0203t0:707_3: vacanato, “akuppārammaṇakaraṇena akuppāti vuttā”ti āha. Vitathanti naṭṭhaṃ, jarāya
tika-s0203t0:707_4: maraṇena ca vipariṇāmetabbatāya yādisaṃ uppādāvatthāya jātaṃ, tato aññādisanti attho.
tika-s0203t0:707_5: Tathā hi taṃ jarāmaraṇehi parimusitabbarūpatāya “musā”ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha – “mosadhammanti
tika-s0203t0:707_6: nassanasabhāva”nti. Taṃ avitathanti taṃ vuttanayena avitathaṃ nāma, taṃ sabhāvo sabbakālaṃ
tika-s0203t0:707_7: teneva labbhanato. Samathavipassanāvasena vacīsaccatoti samathavipassanāvasena yaṃ
tika-s0203t0:707_9: Iti nesaṃ yathāsakaṃ sabhāvena avitathabhāve amosadhammatāya tehipi avitathabhāvā
tika-s0203t0:707_10: paramatthasaccaṃ nibbānameva uttaritaraṃ. Tasmāti nibbānasseva uttaritarabhāvato.
tika-s0203t0:708_0: 367. Upadhīyati ettha dukkhanti upadhī, khandhā kāmaguṇā ca. Upadahanti dukkhanti
tika-s0203t0:708_1: upadhī, kilesābhisaṅkhārā. Paripūrā gahitā parāmaṭṭhāti pariyattabhāvena taṇhāya
tika-s0203t0:708_2: gahitā diṭṭhiyā parāmaṭṭhā. Samathavipassanāvasena kilesapariccāgatoti vikkhambhanavasena
tika-s0203t0:708_3: tadaṅgappahānavasena ca kilesānaṃ pariccajanato. Uttaritaro visiṭṭhatarassa pahānappakārassa abhāvato.
tika-s0203t0:709_1: vipattibhāvavasena. Sampadussanavasenāti sabbaso dussanavasena. Tīhi padehi yadi
tika-s0203t0:709_2: arahattamaggena kilesānaṃ pariccāgo cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ, arahattamaggeneva nesaṃ vūpasamo
tika-s0203t0:709_3: upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ hotīti dasseti. Ettha visesena pariccāgo sampajahanaṃ anuppattidhammatāpādanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:709_4: cāgo, tathā pana pariccāgena yo so nesaṃ tadā vūpasantatāya abhāvo, ayaṃ upasamoti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-s0203t0:710_0: 369. Maññitanti maññanā, “etaṃ mamā”tiādinā kappanāti attho. Avijjāvibandhanataṇhāgāhādīnaṃ
tika-s0203t0:710_1: sādhāraṇabhāvato ayamahanti ettha ahanti diṭṭhimaññanādassanaṃ, sā pana diṭṭhi mānamaññanāya
tika-s0203t0:710_2: attaniyagāhavasena hotīti sveva “aya”nti iminā gahitoti āha – “ayamahanti ekaṃ taṇhāmaññitameva
tika-s0203t0:710_3: vaṭṭatī”ti. Ābādhaṭṭhenāti paṭipīḷanaṭṭhena. Maññanāvasena hi sattānaṃ tathā hoti.
tika-s0203t0:710_4: Antodosaṭṭhenāti abbhantaraduṭṭhabhāvena. Maññanādūsitattā hi sattānaṃ attabhāvo
tika-s0203t0:710_6: hotīti phalūpacārena “maññitaṃ gaṇḍo”ti vutto. Anupaviṭṭhaṭṭhenāti anupavisitvā hadayamāhacca
tika-s0203t0:710_7: adhiṭṭhānena. Maññitañhi pīḷājananato antotudanato duruddharaṇato sallaṃ. Khīṇāsavamuni
tika-s0203t0:710_8: sabbaso kilesānaṃ santattā, tato eva pariḷāhānaṃ parinibbutattā vūpasantattā santo
tika-s0203t0:710_9: upasanto nibbutoti vuccati. Yattha ṭhitanti yasmiṃ asekkhabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitaṃ. Yadi bhagavā
tika-s0203t0:710_10: attano desanāñāṇānurūpaṃ desanaṃ pavattāpeyya, mahāpathaviṃ pattharantassa viya,
tika-s0203t0:710_11: ākāsaṃ pasārentassa viya, anantāparimeyyalokadhātuyo paṭicca tesaṃ ṭhitākāraṃ anuppūraṃ
tika-s0203t0:710_12: vicinantassa viya desanā pariyosānaṃ na gaccheyya. Yasmā panassa vineyyajjhāsayānurūpameva
tika-s0203t0:710_13: desanā pavatti, na tato paraṃ aṇumattampi vaḍḍhati. Tasmā vuttaṃ – “sabbāpi dhammadesanā
tika-s0203t0:710_14: saṃkhittāva, vitthāradesanā nāma natthī”ti. Nanu sattapakaraṇadesanā vitthārakathāti?
tika-s0203t0:710_15: Na sāpi vitthārakathāti āha – “samantapaṭṭhānakathāpi saṃkhittāyevā”ti. Sannipatitadevaparisāya
tika-s0203t0:710_16: ajjhāsayānurūpameva hi tassāpi pavatti, na satthudesanāñāṇānurūpanti. Yathānusandhiṃ
tika-s0203t0:710_17: pāpesi yathāuddiṭṭhe anupubbena anavasesato vibhajanavasena desanāya niṭṭhāpitattā.
tika-s0203t0:711_1: aññatarassāti vacanaseso. Tathā hi, “mayhaṃ iddhimayaparikkhāralābhāya paccayo hotū”ti
tika-s0203t0:711_2: patthanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā pattacīvaraṃ, pattaṃ, cīvarameva vā dinne carimabhave iddhimayaparikkhāro
tika-s0203t0:711_3: nibbattatīti vadanti. Adinnattāti kecivādo, tenāha “kulaputto”tiādi. Okāsābhāvatoti
tika-s0203t0:712: Vibbhantāti bhantacittā. Siṅgena vijjhitvā ghātesi purimajātibaddhāghātatāyāti vadanti.
tika-s0203t0:713: Mānusaṃ yoganti manussattabhāvaṃ. Attabhāvo hi yujjati kammakilesehīti “yogo”ti vuccati. Upaccagunti upagacchiṃsu. Upakotiādi tesaṃ nāmāni.
tika-s0203t0:717_0: 371. Ācikkhanāti – “idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasacca”nti
tika-s0203t0:717_1: ādito kathanaṃ. Desanāti tasseva atthassa atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ. Paññāpanāti pakārehi
tika-s0203t0:717_2: ñāpanā, sā pana yasmā itthamidanti veneyyānaṃ paccakkhato dassanā, tesaṃ vā santāne
tika-s0203t0:717_3: patiṭṭhāpanā hoti, tasmā āha – “dukkhasaccādīnaṃ ṭhapanā”ti. Paṭṭhapanāti patiṭṭhāpanā.
tika-s0203t0:717_4: Yasmā paṭṭhapiyamānasabhāvā desanā bhājanaṃ upagacchantī viya hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ
tika-s0203t0:717_5: – “paññāpanā”ti, jānāpanāti attho. Vivaṭakaraṇāti desiyamānassa atthassa vivaṭabhāvakaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:717_7: agambhīrabhāvāpādanaṃ. Aparo nayo – catusaccasaññitassa atthassa paccekaṃ sarūpato
tika-s0203t0:717_8: dassanavasena idanti ādito sikkhāpanaṃ kathanaṃ ācikkhanā, evaṃ parasantāne pabodhanavasena
tika-s0203t0:717_9: pavattāpanā desanā, evaṃ vineyyānaṃ cittaparitosajananena tesaṃ buddhiparipācanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:717_10: “paññāpanā”ti vuccati. Evaṃ paññāpentī ca sā desiyamānaṃ atthaṃ veneyyasantāne pakārato
tika-s0203t0:717_11: ṭhapeti patiṭṭhapetīti “paṭṭhapanā”ti vuccati. Pakārato ṭhapentī pana saṃkhittassa
tika-s0203t0:718_0: Anuggāhakāti anuggaṇhanakāmā. Svāyamanuggaho saṅgahavatthuvasena pākaṭo hotīti āha
tika-s0203t0:718_1: “āmisasaṅgahenā”tiādi. Janetā janettīti āha “janikā mātā”ti. Vuddhiṃ parisaṃ āpādetīti
tika-s0203t0:718_2: āpādetā. Tenāha “posetā”ti. Idāni dvinnaṃ mahātherānaṃ yathākkamaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ
tika-s0203t0:718_3: bhagavatā vuttehi janikaposikamātuṭṭhāniyehi saṅgāhakataṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ, “janikamātā
tika-s0203t0:718_4: hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Paratoghosena vināpi uparimaggādhigamo hotīti “paccattapurisakārenā”ti
tika-s0203t0:718_5: vuttaṃ. Paṭhamamaggo eva hi sāvakānaṃ ekantato ghosāpekkhoti. Pattesupīti pi-saddena
tika-s0203t0:718_6: pageva appattesūti dasseti. Bhavassa appamattakatā nāma ittarakālatāyāti āha “accharāsaṅghātamattampī”ti.
tika-s0203t0:718_7: Janetāti janako, thero pana ariyāya janayitā. Āpādetāti vaḍḍhetā paribrūhetā. Purimasmiṃ
tika-s0203t0:718_8: saccadvaye sammasanaggahaṇaṃ lokiyattā tassa, itarasmiṃ tassa aggahaṇaṃ lokuttarattā.
tika-s0203t0:719_0: Kāmehi nikkhanto saṅkappo nekkhammasaṅkappo. Svāyamassa tato nikkhamanattho tesaṃ
tika-s0203t0:719_1: paṭipakkhabhāvato tehi visaṃsaggato virajjanato samucchindanato sabbaso vivittabhāvato
tika-s0203t0:719_2: ca hotīti dassetuṃ, “kāmapaccanīkaṭṭhenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha kāmapadaghātanti yathā
tika-s0203t0:719_3: kāmo padaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ na labhati, evaṃ hananaṃ, kāmasamucchedanti attho. Kāmehi sabbaso
tika-s0203t0:719_4: vivittattā kāmavivitto, ariyamaggo, tassa anto, ariyaphalaṃ, tasmiṃ kāmavivittante.
tika-s0203t0:719_5: Eseva nayoti iminā “byāpādapaccanīkaṭṭhenā”tiādiyojanaṃ atidisati. Sabbe cete nekkhammasaṅkappādayo
tika-s0203t0:719_6: nānācittesu labbhantīti yojanā. Yadi ekacitte labbhanti, kathaṃ tividhamicchāsaṅkappānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:719_7: samugghātoti āha “tatra hī”tiādi. Na nānā labbhatīti iminā tividhakiccakāritaṃ sammāsaṅkappassa
tika-s0203t0:719_8: dasseti. Kiccavasena hi tassa nāmassa lābho. Sammāvācādīnampi maggakkhaṇe ekacitte
tika-s0203t0:719_9: labbhamānānampi catukiccakāritāya catubbidhanāmāditā veditabbā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0203t0:722_0: 376. Mahāpajāpatigotamīti ettha gotamīti tassa gotamagottato āgataṃ nāmaṃ, mahāpajāpati
tika-s0203t0:722_1: pana guṇato. Taṃ vivarituṃ, “nāmakaraṇadivase panassā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Mahatiṃ uḷāraṃ
tika-s0203t0:722_2: pajaṃ jananaposanehi parirakkhatīti mahāpajāpati. Paribhogavasena na haññatīti ahataṃ.
tika-s0203t0:722_3: Sippikānanti tantavāyānaṃ. Vāyanaṭṭhānanti vīnaṭṭhānaṃ. Tāni maṃ na tosenti kāyikassa
tika-s0203t0:722_4: puññassa abhāvato. Tenāha – “sahatthā katameva maṃ tosetī”ti. Pisitvā nibbattanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:722_5: katvā. Pothetvāti sukhumabhāvāpādanatthaṃ dhanukena netvā. Kālānukālañca dhātigaṇaparivutā
tika-s0203t0:722_6: gantvā vemakoṭiṃ aggahesi ekadivasanti adhippāyo. Evañhi “ekadivasaṃ pana…pe… akāsī”ti
tika-s0203t0:723_0: Cha cetanāti chabbidhā cetanā. Na hi tā chayeva cetanāti. Saṅghe gotami dehi…pe…
tika-s0203t0:723_1: saṅgho cāti idameva suttapadaṃ. Saṅghe gotami dehīti saṅghassa dānāya niyojesi, tasmā
tika-s0203t0:723_2: saṅghova dakkhiṇeyyataroti ayamevettha attho. Yadi evantiādinā tattha byabhicāraṃ
tika-s0203t0:723_3: dasseti. Rājamahāmattādayotiādinā tattha byatirekato nidassanaṃ āha. Mahantatarā
tika-s0203t0:723_4: bhaveyyunti ānubhāvādinā mahantatarā bhaveyyuṃ, na ca taṃ atthīti. Tasmāti yasmā
tika-s0203t0:723_5: guṇavisiṭṭhahetukaṃ dakkhiṇeyyataṃ anapekkhitvā attano dīyamānassa dāpanaṃ labhati,
tika-s0203t0:723_6: tasmā. Mā evaṃ gaṇhāti sammāsambuddhato saṅghova dakkhiṇeyyo”ti mā gaṇha.
tika-s0203t0:724_0: Tattha nicchayasādhakaṃ suttapadaṃ dassento, “nayimasmiṃ loke…pe… vipulaphalesina”nti
tika-s0203t0:724_1: āha. Svāyamattho ratanasutte, “yaṃ kiñci vitta”nti gāthāya, aggapasādasuttādīhi ca
tika-s0203t0:724_2: vibhāvetabboti. Tenāha – “satthārā uttaritaro dakkhiṇeyyo nāma natthī”ti.
tika-s0203t0:725_0: Gotamiyā antimabhavikatāya dānassa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya anuppādanato na taṃ
tika-s0203t0:725_1: garutaraṃ saṅghassa pādāpane kāraṇanti āha – “pacchimāya janatāyā”tiādi. Vacanatopīti
tika-s0203t0:725_2: tassa vatthayugassa satthu eva paṭiggahaṇāya vacanatopi. Tenāha “na hī”tiādi.
tika-s0203t0:726_0: Satthā saṅghapariyāpannova īdise ṭhāne aggaphalaṭṭhatāya aṭṭha-ariyapuggalabhāvato,
tika-s0203t0:726_1: sace panassa na sayaṃ saṅghapariyāpannatā, kathaṃ saṅghe pūjite satthā pūjito nāma
tika-s0203t0:726_2: siyāti adhippāyo. Tīṇi saraṇagamanāni tayo eva aggapasādāti vakkhatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t0:726_3: Abhidheyyānurūpāni hi liṅgavacanāni. Na ruhati ayāthāvapaṭipattibhāvato, na gihivesaggahaṇādinā
tika-s0203t0:726_4: gihibhāvassa paṭikkhipitattā. Na vattabbametaṃ “satthā saṅghapariyāpanno”ti satthubhāvato.
tika-s0203t0:726_5: Sāvakasamūho hi saṅgho. Saṅghagaṇe hi satthā uttaritaro anaññasādhāraṇaguṇehi samannāgatabhāvato
tika-s0203t0:727: 377. Sampatijātassa mahāsattassa sattapadavītihāragamanaṃ dhammatāvasena jātaṃ, paraṃ tadaññadaharasadisī paṭipattīti āha – “hatthapādakiccaṃ asādhentesū”ti.
tika-s0203t0:728_0: 378. Paccūpakāraṃ na sukaraṃ vadāmi anucchavikakiriyāya kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā. Abhivādenti
tika-s0203t0:728_1: etenāti abhivādanaṃ. Vandamānehi antevāsikehi ācariyaṃ “sukhī hotū”tiādinā abhivādenti
tika-s0203t0:728_2: nāma. Tena vuttaṃ “abhivādana”nti. Tadabhimukho…pe… vanditvā nipajjati, seyyathāpi
tika-s0203t0:728_3: āyasmā sāriputto. Kālānukālaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ bījayanapādasambāhanādi anucchavikakammassa
tika-s0203t0:728_4: karaṇaṃ nāma. Anucchavikaṃ kiriyaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotiyeva, yasmā ācariyena katassa
tika-s0203t0:728_5: dhammānuggahassa antevāsinā kariyamāno āmisānuggaho saṅkhampi kalampi kalabhāgampi
tika-s0203t0:728_6: na upetiyevāti. Tena vuttaṃ “na suppatikāraṃ vadāmī”ti.
tika-s0203t0:729_0: 379. Pāṭipuggalikaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ ārabbha samuṭṭhitaṃ, “taṃ me bhagavā paṭiggaṇhatū”ti
tika-s0203t0:729_1: mahāpajāpatigotamiyā vacanaṃ nimittaṃ katvā desanāya uṭṭhitattā. Na kevalañca tassā
tika-s0203t0:729_2: eva vacanaṃ, atha kho ānandattheropi…pe… samādapesi, tasmā vibhāgato cuddasasu…pe…
tika-s0203t0:729_3: hotīti dassetuṃ, imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. Tattha patipaccekaṃ puggalaṃ dīyatīti pāṭipuggalikaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:729_4: Paṭhamasaddo yathā aggattho, evaṃ seṭṭhapariyāyopīti āha “jeṭṭhakavasenapī”ti. Aggā
tika-s0203t0:729_5: uttame khette pavattattā. Dutiyatatiyāpi paramadakkhiṇāyeva sabbaso sammāvikkhambhitarāgādikilesattā.
tika-s0203t0:729_6: Rāgādayo hi adakkhiṇeyyabhāvassa kāraṇaṃ. Tenevāha – “tiṇadosāni khettāni, rāgadosā
tika-s0203t0:729_7: ayaṃ pajā”tiādi. Yasmā pana savāsanaṃ sabbaso samucchinnakilesehi tato eva sabbaso
tika-s0203t0:729_9: loke koci dakkhiṇeyyo natthi. Tasmā “paramadakkhiṇāyevā”ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati. Yasmā
tika-s0203t0:729_10: pañcābhiñño aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī eva hoti lokiyābhiññānaṃ aṭṭhasamāpattiadhiṭṭhānattā,
tika-s0203t0:729_12: Gosīladhātukoti gosīlasabhāvo, sīlavatā sadisasīloti attho. Tenāha “asaṭho”tiādi.
tika-s0203t0:729_13: Tena na alajjidhātuko pakatisiddho idha puthujjanasīlavāti adhippetoti dasseti.
tika-s0203t0:730_0: Paricchindantoti ettakoti paccekappamāṇato tato eva aññamaññaṃ asaṅkaratova paricchindanto.
tika-s0203t0:730_1: Kathaṃ pana asaṅkhyeyyabhāvena vuccamāno vipāko paricchinno hoti? Sopi tassa paricchedo
tika-s0203t0:730_2: eva itarehi asaṃkiṇṇabhāvadīpanato, etadatthameva pubbe asaṅkaraggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Guṇavasenāti
tika-s0203t0:730_4: dinnaṃ, idaṃ na gahitaṃ dānalakkhaṇāyogato. Anuggahapūjanicchāvasena hi attano deyyavatthupariccāgo
tika-s0203t0:730_5: dānaṃ bhayarāgaladdhukāmakulādivasena sāvajjābhāvato. Tampi na gahitaṃ ayāvadatthatāaparipuṇṇabhāvena
tika-s0203t0:730_7: anapekkhataṃ dasseti. Phalaṃ paṭikaṅkhitvāti “idaṃ me dānamayaṃ puññaṃ āyatiṃ sukhahitabhāvāya
tika-s0203t0:730_8: hotū”tiādinā phalaṃ paccāsīsitvā. Tenassa phaladāne namiyataṃ dasseti, yāvadatthanti
tika-s0203t0:730_9: iminā paripuṇṇaphalataṃ. Sataguṇāti ettha guṇasaddo na “guṇena nāmaṃ uddhareyya”ntiādīsu
tika-s0203t0:730_10: viya sampattiattho, “taddiguṇa”ntiādīsu viya na vaḍḍhanattho, “pañca kāmaguṇā loke,
tika-s0203t0:730_11: manochaṭṭhā paveditā”tiādīsu viya na koṭṭhāsattho, “antaṃ antaguṇa”ntiādīsu viya
tika-s0203t0:730_12: na antabhāgattho, atha kho ānisaṃsatthoti dassento, “satānisaṃsā”ti āha, te ānisaṃse
tika-s0203t0:730_13: sarūpato dassetuṃ, “āyusata”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Sataguṇāti vā satavaḍḍhikāti evamettha
tika-s0203t0:730_14: attho daṭṭhabbo. Nipparitasaṃ karotīti āyuādīnaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ aparittāsaṃ karoti.
tika-s0203t0:730_15: Atha vā nipparitasaṃ karotīti āyuādinimittaṃ aparittāsaṃ karoti. Atha vā nipparitasaṃ
tika-s0203t0:730_16: karotīti āyuādīni tato uttarimpi āhārādihetu aparittāsaṃ karoti. Attabhāvavinimuttasañcaraṇassa
tika-s0203t0:731_0: Sāsanāvataraṇaṃ nāma yāvadeva vaṭṭadukkhanittharaṇatthaṃ, tañca maggapaṭivedhanaṃ,
tika-s0203t0:731_1: tasmā nibbedhabhāgiyasaraṇagamanaṃ sikkhāpadasamādānaṃ pabbajjā upasampadā sīlaparipūraṇaṃ
tika-s0203t0:731_3: eva hotīti āha – “tisaraṇaṃ gato upāsakopī”tiādi. Tattha yathā nibbedhabhāgiyo samādhi
tika-s0203t0:731_4: tāva nāma paramparāya ariyamaggādhigamassa paccayabhāvato upanissayo; tathā nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ
tika-s0203t0:731_5: sīlaparipūraṇaṃ upasampadā pabbajjā upāsakassa dasasu pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:731_6: antamaso saraṇādigamanampi nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ ariyamaggādhigamassa upanissayo hotiyevāti,
tika-s0203t0:731_9: bhagavā, svākhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho”ti tapparāyaṇatādiākārappatto ñāṇaparisodhito
tika-s0203t0:731_10: pasādo saraṇagamananti tena vatthugatena pasādena paribhāvite santāne kataṃ puññakkhettasampattiyā
tika-s0203t0:731_11: mahapphalaṃ mahānisaṃsameva hotīti āha – “tasmiṃ dinnadānampi asaṅkhyeyyaṃ appameyya”nti.
tika-s0203t0:731_12: Tayidaṃ saraṇaṃ vatthuttaye pasādabhāvena ajjhāsayasampattimattaṃ, tādisassa pana
tika-s0203t0:731_13: pañcasīlaṃ ajjhāsayasampattiupathambhito kāyavacīsaṃyamoti tattha dinnaṃ tato uttari
tika-s0203t0:731_14: mahapphalanti, dasasīlaṃ pana paripuṇṇuposathasīlaṃ, tattha dinnaṃ mahapphalanti,
tika-s0203t0:731_15: “tato uttari mahapphala”nti vuttaṃ. Sāmaṇerasīlādīnaṃ pana uttari visiṭṭhatarādibhāvato
tika-s0203t0:732_0: Maggasamaṅgitā nāma maggacittakkhaṇaparicchinnā, tasmiñca khaṇe kathaṃ dātuṃ paṭiggahetuñca
tika-s0203t0:732_1: sambhavatīti codeti “kiṃ pana maggasamaṅgissa sakkā dānaṃ dātu”nti. Itaro tādise
tika-s0203t0:732_2: sati samayeti dassento, “āma sakkā”ti paṭijānitvā, “āraddhavipassako”tiādinā tamatthaṃ
tika-s0203t0:732_3: vivarati. Tasmiṃ khaṇeti tasmiṃ pakkhipanakkhaṇe. Yadi aṭṭhamakassa sotāpannassa
tika-s0203t0:732_4: dinnadānaṃ phalato asaṅkhyeyyameva, ko nesaṃ visesoti āha “tatthā”tiādi. Tena satipi
tika-s0203t0:732_5: asaṅkhyeyyabhāvasāmaññe atthi nesaṃ appabahubhāvo saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī asaṅkhyeyyamahākappāsaṅkhyeyyānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:732_6: viyāti dasseti. Maggasamaṅgīnaṃ tena tena odhinā saṃkilesadhammānaṃ pahīyamānattā
tika-s0203t0:732_8: phalasamaṅgīnaṃ paripuṇṇaguṇatāti taṃtaṃmaggaṭṭhehi phalaṭṭhānaṃ khettātisayatā veditabbā.
tika-s0203t0:732_9: Heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimehi pana maggaṭṭhehi uparimānaṃ maggaṭṭhānaṃ phalaṭṭhehi phalaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:732_10: uttaritaratā pākaṭā eva. Tathā hi uparimānaṃ dinnadānassa mahapphalatā vuttā.
tika-s0203t0:733_0: 380. Kāmañcettha buddhappamukhe ubhatosaṅghe kevale ca bhikkhusaṅghe dānaṃ atthi
tika-s0203t0:733_1: eva, na pana buddhappamukhe bhikkhusaṅghe, taṃ pana buddhappamukhaubhatosaṅgheneva
tika-s0203t0:733_2: saṅgahitanti aviruddhaṃ. Na pāpuṇanti mahapphalabhāvena sadisatampi, kuto adhikataṃ.
tika-s0203t0:734_0: “Tathāgate parinibbute ubhatosaṅghassa” icceva vuttattā – “kiṃ panā”tiādinā codeti.
tika-s0203t0:734_1: Itaro parinibbute tathāgate taṃ uddissa gandhapupphādipariccāgo viya cīvarādipariccāgopi
tika-s0203t0:734_2: mahapphalo hotiyevāti katvā paṭipajjanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ, “ubhatosaṅghassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:734_3: “Ettakāyeva, bhikkhū uddisathā”ti evaṃ paricchedassa akaraṇena upacārasīmāpariyāpannānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:735_0: Gottaṃ vuccati sādhāraṇanāmaṃ, mattasaddo luttaniddiṭṭho, tasmā samaṇāti gottamattaṃ
tika-s0203t0:735_2: saṃhato samaṇagaṇo saṅgho, tasmā saṅgho dussīlo nāma natthi. Guṇasaṅkhāyāti ānisaṃsagaṇanāya,
tika-s0203t0:735_3: mahapphalatāyāti attho. Kāsāva…pe… asaṅkhyeyyāti vuttā saṅghaṃ uddissa dinnattā.
tika-s0203t0:735_4: Yathā pana saṅghaṃ uddissa dānaṃ hoti, taṃ vidhiṃ dassetuṃ, “saṅghagatā dakkhiṇā”tiādi
tika-s0203t0:736_0: Saṅghato na puggalato. Aññathattaṃ āpajjatīti “imassa mayā dinnaṃ saṅghassa dinnaṃ
tika-s0203t0:736_1: hotī”ti evaṃ cittaṃ anuppādetvā, “saṅghassa dassāmī”ti deyyadhammaṃ paṭiyādetvā sāmaṇerassa
tika-s0203t0:736_2: nāma dātabbaṃ jātanti aññathattaṃ āpajjati; tasmā tassa dakkhiṇā saṅghagatā na hotiyeva
tika-s0203t0:736_3: puggalavasena cittassa pariṇāmitattā. Nibbematiko hutvāti “kiṃ nu kho mayā imassa
tika-s0203t0:736_4: dinnaṃ hoti vā na vā”ti vimatiṃ anuppādetvā, “yo panā”tiādinā vuttākārena karoti.
tika-s0203t0:737_1: Opuñjāpetvā paribhaṇḍaṃ kāretvā, haritagomayena upalimpitvāti attho. Kāsāvakaṇṭhasaṅghassāti
tika-s0203t0:737_2: kāsāvakaṇṭhasamūhassa. Ko sodhetīti mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena ko visodheti. Mahapphalabhāvāpattiyā
tika-s0203t0:737_3: hi dakkhiṇā visujjhati nāma. Tattha yesaṃ hatthe dinnaṃ, tesaṃ vasena paṭiggāhakato
tika-s0203t0:737_4: dakkhiṇāya visuddhattā, – “tadāpāhaṃ, ānanda, saṅghagataṃ dakkhiṇaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ
tika-s0203t0:737_5: appameyyaṃ vadāmī”ti ca vuttaṃ, tasmā kammavaseneva dakkhiṇāvisuddhiṃ pucchati. Itaro
tika-s0203t0:737_6: ariyasaṅghe dinnadakkhiṇāya nibbisiṭṭhaṃ katvā vuttattā matthakappattasseva ariyasaṅghassa
tika-s0203t0:737_7: vasena dakkhiṇāvisuddhiṃ dassento, “sāriputta…pe… sodhentī”ti vatvā puna, “ye keci
tika-s0203t0:737_8: arahanto sodhentī”ti dassento, “apicā”tiādimāha. Therā ciraparinibbutāti idaṃ ajjatanānampi
tika-s0203t0:737_9: ariyānaṃ sāvakataṃ dassentena maggasodhanavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, na uddissa
tika-s0203t0:737_10: puññakaraṇe sati akaraṇappattiyā. Evañhi “asītimahātherā sodhentī”ti idaṃ suvuttaṃ hoti, na aññathā.
tika-s0203t0:738_0: “Saṅghagatāya dakkhiṇāyā”ti kāmañcetaṃ sādhāraṇavacanaṃ, tathāpi tattha tattha puggalaviseso
tika-s0203t0:738_1: ñātabboti dassento, “atthi buddhappamukho saṅgho”tiādimāha. Na upanetabbo bhagavato
tika-s0203t0:738_2: kāle bhikkhūnaṃ abhiññāpaṭisambhidāguṇavasena ativiya uḷārabhāvato, etarahi tadabhāvato.
tika-s0203t0:738_3: Etarahi saṅgho…pe… na upanetabboti ettha nayānusārena attho vattabbo. Tena teneva
tika-s0203t0:738_4: samayenāti tassa tassa kālassa sampattivipattimukhena paṭipattiyā uḷārataṃ anuḷāratañca
tika-s0203t0:738_5: ulliṅgeti. Yattha hi bhikkhū guṇehi sabbaso paripuṇṇā honti, tasmiṃ samaye saṅghagatā
tika-s0203t0:738_6: dakkhiṇā itarasmiṃ samaye dakkhiṇato mahapphalatarāti daṭṭhabbā. Saṅghe cittīkāraṃ
tika-s0203t0:738_7: kātuṃ sakkontassāti suppaṭipannatādiṃ saṅghe āvajjitvā saṅghagatena pasādena saṅghassa
tika-s0203t0:738_8: sammukhā viya tasmiṃ puggale ca gāravavasena dentassa puthujjanasamaṇe dinnaṃ mahapphalataraṃ
tika-s0203t0:738_9: saṅghato uddisitvā gahitattā, “saṅghassa demī”tiyeva dinnattā ca.
tika-s0203t0:739_0: Eseva nayoti iminā, “sotāpanne dinnaṃ mahapphalatara”nti evamādiṃ atidisati. Ādi-saddena
tika-s0203t0:739_1: uddisitvā gahito sakadāgāmī, pāṭipuggaliko anāgāmīti evamādi saṅgahitaṃ. Mahapphalatarameva.
tika-s0203t0:739_2: Tenāha bhagavā – “na tvevāhaṃ, ānanda, kenaci pariyāyena saṅghagatāya dakkhiṇāya
tika-s0203t0:739_3: pāṭipuggalikaṃ dānaṃ mahapphalataraṃ vadāmī”ti. Yadi khīṇāsave dinnadānato saṅghato
tika-s0203t0:739_4: uddisitvā gahitadussīlepi dinnadānaṃ mahapphalaṃ, evaṃ sante – “sīlavato, mahārāja,
tika-s0203t0:739_5: dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ, no tathā dussīle”ti idaṃ kathanti āha – “taṃ imaṃ nayaṃ gahāyā”tiādi.
tika-s0203t0:739_6: Saṅghato uddisitvā gahaṇavidhiṃ pahāya dussīlasseva gahaṇavasena vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ
tika-s0203t0:739_7: catukke daṭṭhabbanti imassa padassa vasena daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha hi “paṭiggāhakā honti
tika-s0203t0:740_0: 381. Visujjhatīti na kilissati, mahājutikārī mahāvipphārā hotīti attho. Sucidhammoti
tika-s0203t0:740_1: rāgādiasucividhamanena sucisabhāvo. Na pāpadhammoti na nihīnasabhāvo pāpakiriyāya.
tika-s0203t0:740_2: Akusaladhammo hi ekantanihīno. Jūjako sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo na hoti. Tassa mahābodhisattassa
tika-s0203t0:740_3: attano puttadānaṃ dānapāramiyā matthakaṃ gaṇhantaṃ mahāpathavīkampanasamatthaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0203t0:741: Uddharatīti bahulaṃ katapāpakammavasena laddhavinipātato uddharati. Tasmā natthi mayhaṃ kiñci cittassa aññathattanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t0:742_0: Petadakkhiṇanti pete uddissa dātabbadakkhiṇaṃ. Pāpitakāleyevāti, “idaṃ dānaṃ asukassa
tika-s0203t0:742_1: petassa hotū”ti uddisanavasena patte pāpitakāleyeva. Assāti petassa. Pāpuṇīti phalasamāpattiyā
tika-s0203t0:742_2: vasena pāpuṇi. Ayañhi pete uddissa dāne dhammatā.
tika-s0203t0:743: Tadā kosalarañño pariccāgavasena ativiya uḷārajjhāsayataṃ, buddhappamukhassa ca bhikkhusaṅghassa ukkaṃsagataguṇavisiṭṭhataṃ sandhāyāha, “asadisadānaṃ kathetabba”nti.
tika-s0203t0:744_0: Asārampi khettanti sārahīnaṃ dukkhettaṃ. Samayeti kasanārahe kāle. Paṃsuṃ apanetvāti
tika-s0203t0:744_1: nissāraṃ paṃsuṃ nīharitvā. Sārabījānīti sabhāvato abhisaṅkhārato ca sārabhūtāni bījāni.
tika-s0203t0:744_2: Patiṭṭhapetvāti vapitvā. Evanti yathā kassako attano payogasampattiyā asārepi khette
tika-s0203t0:744_3: phalaṃ adhigacchati. Evaṃ sīlavā attano payogasampattiyā dussīlassapi datvā phalaṃ
tika-s0203t0:744_4: mahantaṃ adhigacchati. Iminā upāyenāti iminā paṭhamapade vuttanayena. Sabbapadesūti
tika-s0203t0:744_5: sabbakoṭṭhāsesu visujjhanaṃ vuttaṃ, tatiyapade pana visujjhanaṃ paṭikkhittameva.
tika-s0203t0:745_0: 382. Arahato dinnadānameva aggaṃ dānacetanāya kenaci upakkilesena anupakkiliṭṭhattā,
tika-s0203t0:745_2: “ubhinnampī”ti vacanaseso. Khīṇāsavo dānaphalaṃ na saddahatīti idaṃ tassa appahīnakilesajanassa
tika-s0203t0:745_3: viya kammakammaphalānaṃ saddahanākārena pavatti natthīti katvā vuttaṃ, yato arahā
tika-s0203t0:745_4: “asaddho akataññū ca…pe… poriso”ti thomīyati. Asaddahanaṃ anumānapakkhikaṃ, anumānañca
tika-s0203t0:745_5: saṃsayapubbakaṃ, nissandiddho ca kammakammaphalesu paccakkhabhāvaṃ gato. Tameva hi
tika-s0203t0:745_7: Yadi evaṃ tena katakammaṃ kammalakkhaṇappattaṃ hotīti āha “khīṇāsavenā”tiādi. Tenevāha
tika-s0203t0:746_0: Kiṃ pana sammāsambuddhenātiādinā dāyakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhi coditā, sāriputtattherenātiādinā
tika-s0203t0:746_1: pana paṭiggāhakatoti vadanti; tadayuttaṃ, sāvakassa mahapphalabhāve saṃsayābhāvato,
tika-s0203t0:746_2: heṭṭhā nicchitattā ca, tasmā ubhayenapi dāyakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhi eva coditā. Sā
tika-s0203t0:746_3: hi idha sādhāraṇavasena nicchitattā saṃsayavatthu. Tenāha – “sammāsambuddhena…pe…
tika-s0203t0:746_4: vadantī”ti. Sammāsambuddhaṃ hītiādi yathāvuttaatthassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Añño dānassa
tika-s0203t0:746_5: vipākaṃ jānituṃ samattho nāma natthi sabbaso sattānaṃ kammavipākavibhāgajānanañāṇassa
tika-s0203t0:746_6: ananuññātattā. Tenāha bhagavā – “yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, sattā na jānanti, dānasaṃvibhāgassa
tika-s0203t0:746_7: vipākaṃ yathāhaṃ jānāmi, tasmā adatvā bhuñjantī”tiādi. Etena ettha ñāṇavisodhanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:746_8: nāma kathitaṃ, na dakkhiṇāya visuddhi nāma dāyakato paṭiggāhakato ca vasena hotīti;
tika-s0203t0:746_9: sammāsambuddhena sāriputtattherassa dinnadānaṃ sabbaso upakkilesavisuddhiyā ñāṇassa
tika-s0203t0:746_10: ca ativiya uḷārattā mahānubhāvaṃ nāma siyā mahātejavantañca; na mahapphalaṃ tesaṃ
tika-s0203t0:746_11: santāne paripuṇṇaphalassa asambhavato. Yadi dinnadānaṃ paripuṇṇaphalaṃ na hoti ubhayavipākadānābhāvato,
tika-s0203t0:747_0: Catūhīti sahayoge karaṇavacanaṃ, catūhi sampadāhi sahagatā sahitaṃ katvāti attho.
tika-s0203t0:747_1: Imā catasso sampadā sabbasādhāraṇavasena vuttā, na yathādhigatapuggalavasena. Tenāha
tika-s0203t0:747_2: – “deyyadhammassa dhammenā”tiādi. Tasmiṃyeva attabhāveti yasmiṃ attabhāve taṃ dānamayaṃ
tika-s0203t0:747_3: puññaṃ uppannaṃ, tasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ deti, cetanāya mahantattā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ
tika-s0203t0:747_4: hutvā vipaccatīti attho. Pubbacetanādivasenāti sanniṭṭhāpakajavanavīthito pubbāparavīthicetanāvasena,
tika-s0203t0:747_5: aññathā sanniṭṭhāpakavīthiyaṃyeva pubbacetanādivasenāti vattabbaṃ siyā. Sā hi cetanā
tika-s0203t0:747_6: diṭṭhadhammavedanīyabhūtā tasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ deti, na itarā. Mahattatāti
tika-s0203t0:747_8: yassa deti, tassa khīṇāsavabhāvena. Vatthusampannatāti ettha yathā paṭighasaññā nānattasaññānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:747_9: vigamena dibbavihārānaṃ vasena, byāpādasaññādīnaṃ vigamena brahmavihārānaṃ vasena,
tika-s0203t0:747_10: sabbaso rūpasaññānānattasaññānaṃ vigamena āneñjavihārānaṃ vasena sabbaso niccasaññādīnaṃ
tika-s0203t0:747_12: icchitā. Taṃtaṃsamāpattisamāpajjanena santānassa nirodhasādhanatā taṃ divasaṃ nirodhassa
tika-s0203t0:747_13: sādhanatā nāma. Vatthusampannatāti sabbaso nirodhasamāpattisamāpajjanena vatthusampannatā
tika-s0203t0:747_14: icchitā; na sabbaso anavasesasaññānirodhatāyāti āha – “taṃ divasaṃ nirodhato vuṭṭhitabhāvena
tika-s0203t0:747_15: vatthusampannatā”ti. Saññānirodhassa cettha accāsannataṃ sandhāya, “taṃ divasa”nti
tika-s0203t0:747_16: vuttaṃ. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0203t0:751_0: 383. Adhimattagilānoti adhikāya mattāya maraṇassa āsannatāya ativiya gilānoti attho.
tika-s0203t0:751_1: Tenāha “maraṇaseyyaṃ upagato”ti. Akhaṇḍaṃ akāsi gahapatino satthari paramapemattā.
tika-s0203t0:751_2: Yattakaṃ cassāti, “sakiṃ vā dvikkhattuṃ vā”ti vuttaṃ yattakaṃ assa gahapatissa.
tika-s0203t0:752_0: 384. Osakkantīti parihāyanti. Ottharantīti abhibhavanti. Usmā nāma kammajatejodhātu,
tika-s0203t0:752_1: sā saha jīvitindriyanirodhā pariyādiyati, yāva tā āyuusmā vattanti, tāva maraṇantikā
tika-s0203t0:752_2: vedanā vattanteva viññāṇassa aniruddhattā. Tenāha “yāva usmā”tiādi.
tika-s0203t0:753_0: 385. Tīhi gāhehīti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāhehi. Paṭibāhituṃ vikkhambhetuṃ. Cakkhuṃ tīhi
tika-s0203t0:753_1: gāhehi na gaṇhissāmīti mānaggāhapaṭikkhepamukhena cakkhusmiṃ aniccānupassanāti dasseti.
tika-s0203t0:753_2: Aniccānupassanāya hi sati appatiṭṭho mānaggāho, dukkhānupassanāya sati appatiṭṭho
tika-s0203t0:753_3: taṇhāggāho, anattānupassanāya sati appatiṭṭho diṭṭhiggāhoti, gāho ca nāma oḷāriko,
tika-s0203t0:753_4: tasmiṃ vigatepi nikanti tiṭṭheyyāti taṃ vijahāpetukāmena, – “na ca me cakkhunissitaṃ
tika-s0203t0:753_5: viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī”ti vuttanti āha – “viññāṇañcāpi me cakkhunissitaṃ na bhavissatī”ti.
tika-s0203t0:753_7: vā pāṭho. So yutto imassa vārassa eva anavasesapañcavokārabhavapariyāpannato. Tathā
tika-s0203t0:754_1: vuttaṃ, tañca kho paṭhamadutiyavārehi idhaloko gahitoti katvā. Paṭhamadutiyavārehi
tika-s0203t0:754_2: pana idhaloko paralokoti vibhāgena vinā pañcavokārabhavo gahito; tathā tatiyavāre
tika-s0203t0:754_3: pañcavokārabhavo catuvokārabhavo ca gahitoti puna diṭṭhadhammasamparāyavasena taṃ
tika-s0203t0:754_4: vibhajitvā dassetuṃ, “na idhaloka”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Idhalokanti ca sattasaṅkhāravaseneva
tika-s0203t0:754_5: gahitaṃ. Sabbampi saṅkhāravasena pariggahetvā dassetuṃ, “yampi me diṭṭha”ntiādi vuttanti
tika-s0203t0:754_6: keci. Aparitassanatthaṃ taṇhāparitassanāya anuppādanatthaṃ. Yassa diṭṭhadhammoti
tika-s0203t0:754_7: vuccati, tassa pana abhāvato, “manussalokaṃ ṭhapetvā sesā paralokā nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:754_8: Yesaṃ pana “idhaloka”nti iminā sattalokassapi gahaṇaṃ icchitaṃ. Tesaṃ matena, “manussalokaṃ ṭhapetvā”ti yojanā.
tika-s0203t0:755_0: 387. Allīyasīti attabhāve bhogesu ca apekkhaṃ karosīti attho. Evarūpīti yādisī tadā
tika-s0203t0:755_1: dhammasenāpatinā kathitā, evarūpī. Dhammakathā na sutapubbāti yathākathitākārameva
tika-s0203t0:756_0: Mayā gatamaggameva anugacchasīti dānamayapuññabhāvasāmaññaṃ gahetvā vadati, na bodhisattadānabhūtaṃ
tika-s0203t0:756_1: dānapāramitaṃ. Na paṭibhātīti ruccanavasena citte na upatiṭṭhati. Tenāha “na ruccatī”ti.
tika-s0203t0:756_2: Tathā hesa vaṭṭābhiratoti. Ujumaggāvahā vipassanā bhagavatā panassa kathitapubbā.
tika-s0203t0:757_0: 388. Esitaguṇattā esiyamānaguṇattā ca isi, asekkhā sekkhā kalyāṇaputhujjanā ca, isīnaṃ
tika-s0203t0:757_1: saṅgho, tena nisevitanti isisaṅghanisevitaṃ. Kāmaṃ tassa vihārassa gandhakuṭipāsādakūṭāgārādivasena
tika-s0203t0:757_2: nisīdananipajjanāya rukkhalatādivasena bhūmisayādivasena ca anaññasādhāraṇā mahatī
tika-s0203t0:757_3: ramaṇīyatā attheva, sā pana gehassitabhāvena ariyānaṃ cittaṃ tathā na toseti; yathā
tika-s0203t0:757_4: ariyānaṃ nisevitabhāvenāti āha – “paṭhamagāthāya jetavanassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā”ti.
tika-s0203t0:757_5: Tenāha bhagavā – “yattha arahanto viharanti, taṃ bhūmirāmaṇeyyaka”nti. Apacayagāminī
tika-s0203t0:757_6: cetanā sattānaṃ suddhimāvahatīti āha – “kammanti maggacetanā”ti. Catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ
