tika-s0203t0:757_7: viditakaraṇaṭṭhena kilesānaṃ vikkhambhanaṭṭhena ca vijjā, maggasammādiṭṭhīti āha
tika-s0203t0:757_8: – “vijjāti maggapaññā”ti. Samādhipakkhiko dhammo nāma sammāvāyāmasatisamādhayo. Tathā
tika-s0203t0:757_9: hi vijjābhāgiyo samādhipi samādhipakkhiko. Sīlaṃ tassa atthīti sīlanti āha – “sīle
tika-s0203t0:757_10: patiṭṭhitassa jīvitaṃ uttama”nti. Diṭṭhisaṅkappoti sammāsaṅkappo. Tattha sammāsaṅkappassa
tika-s0203t0:757_11: upakārakabhāvena vijjābhāgo. Tathā hi so paññākkhandhasaṅgahitoti vuccati, yathā
tika-s0203t0:757_12: sammāsaṅkappo paññākkhandhena saṅgahito, evaṃ vāyāmasatiyo samādhikkhandhasaṅgahitāti.
tika-s0203t0:757_13: Tenāha – “dhammoti vāyāmasatisamādhayo”ti. “Dhammo”ti hi idha sammāsamādhi adhippeto,
tika-s0203t0:757_14: – “evaṃ dhammā te bhagavanto ahesu”ntiādīsu viya. Vācākammantājīvāti sammāvācākammantājīvā
tika-s0203t0:757_15: maggapariyāpannā eva, te sabbepi gahitāti. Tenāha – “etena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggenā”ti.
tika-s0203t0:758_0: Upāyenāti yena vidhinā ariyamaggo bhāvetabbo, tena samādhipakkhiyaṃ vipassanādhammañceva
tika-s0203t0:758_1: maggadhammañca. “Ariyaṃ vo, bhikkhave, sammāsamādhiṃ desessāmi saupanisaṃ saparikkhāra”nti
tika-s0203t0:758_2: hi vacanato sammāsamādhiādayo maggadhammāpi samādhipakkhiyā. Vicineyyāti vīmaṃseyya,
tika-s0203t0:758_3: bhāveyyāti attho. Tatthāti hetumhi bhummavacanaṃ. Ariyamaggahetukā hi sattānaṃ visuddhi.
tika-s0203t0:758_4: Tenāha – “tasmiṃ ariyamagge visujjhatī”ti. Pañcakkhandhadhammaṃ vicineyya, pañcupādānakkhandhe
tika-s0203t0:758_5: vipasseyya. Tesu hi vipassiyamānesu vipassanā ukkaṃsagatā. Yadaggena dukkhasaccaṃ
tika-s0203t0:758_6: pariññāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhīyati, tadaggena samudayasaccaṃ pahānapaṭivedhena nirodhasaccaṃ
tika-s0203t0:758_7: sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhena, maggasaccaṃ bhāvanāpaṭivedhena paṭivijjhīyati, evaṃ accantavisuddhiyā
tika-s0203t0:758_8: sujjhati. Tenāha – “evaṃ tesu catūsu saccesu visujjhatī”ti. Idhāpi nimittatthe bhummavacanaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:759_0: Avadhāraṇavacananti vavatthāpanavacanaṃ, avadhāraṇanti attho. Sāriputtovāti ca avadhāraṇaṃ
tika-s0203t0:759_1: tassa sāvakabhāvato sāvakesu sāriputtova seyyoti imamatthaṃ dīpeti. Kilesaupasamenāti
tika-s0203t0:759_2: iminā mahātherassa tādiso kilesūpasamoti dasseti, yassa sāvakassa visaye paññāya
tika-s0203t0:759_3: pāramippatti ahosi. Yadi evaṃ – “yopi pāraṅgato bhikkhu, etāvaparamo siyā”ti idaṃ
tika-s0203t0:759_4: kathanti? Tesaṃ tesaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsane paññāya pāramippattasāvakavasenetaṃ vuttanti
tika-s0203t0:759_5: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā – “natthi vimuttiyā nānatta”nti vacanato sāvakehi vimuttipaññāmattaṃ
tika-s0203t0:759_6: sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha – “pāraṅgatoti nibbānaṃ gato”tiādi. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0203t0:762_0: 389. Channoti idaṃ tassa nāmanti āha “evaṃnāmako thero”ti. Yassa pana satthārā parinibbānakāle
tika-s0203t0:762_1: brahmadaṇḍo āṇatto, ayaṃ so na hotīti dassento āha – “na abhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhantatthero”ti,
tika-s0203t0:762_2: lokanāthassa abhinikkhamanakāle kapilapurato nikkhantoti attho. Gilānapucchakāti
tika-s0203t0:762_3: gilānassa pucchanakā, gilānabhāvassa avatthaṃ sotukāmāti attho. Sasanato hiṃsanato
tika-s0203t0:763: 390. Upavajjaṃ etassa natthīti anupavajjaṃ, karajakāyaṃ katvā āyatiṃ uppattirahitanti attho. Tenāha “anuppattika”nti.
tika-s0203t0:764_0: 391. Khayavayaṃ ñatvāti saṅkhāragataṃ khaṇabhaṅgaṃ netvā ñāṇena yāthāvato ñatvā.
tika-s0203t0:764_1: Netaṃ mamāti dukkhato samanupassanā saṅkhāresu diṭṭhesu mamaṃkārābhāvato. Nesohamasmīti
tika-s0203t0:764_2: aniccato samanupassanā aniccato tesu diṭṭhesu ahaṃkārābhāvato. Na meso attāti anattato
tika-s0203t0:764_3: samanupassanā anattato tesu diṭṭhesu attaggāhābhāvatoti āha – “netaṃ mama…pe… attāti samanupassāmī”ti.
tika-s0203t0:765_0: 393. Tasmā puthujjanoti yasmā ariyo sabbaso pariññātavatthuko dukkhavedanaṃ adhivāsetuṃ
tika-s0203t0:765_1: asakkonto nāma natthi, tasmā puthujjano, kevalaṃ pana adhimāneneva – “nābhikaṅkhāmi
tika-s0203t0:765_2: jīvitaṃ, pariciṇṇo me satthā, nirodhaṃ disvā”ti vadatīti adhippāyo. Idampīti idampi,
tika-s0203t0:765_3: “nissitassa calita”ntiādi. Taṇhānissitabhāvena hi āyasmā channo māraṇantikaṃ vedanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:765_4: adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto ito cito parivattanto calati vipphandati, tasmā “nissitassa
tika-s0203t0:765_5: calita”ntiādi manasikātabbaṃ, tena idaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ vipphanditaṃ na bhavissatīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t0:765_6: Kappasaddo kālapariyāyopi hoti, na kālavisesavācako evāti āha – “niccakappanti niccakāla”nti.
tika-s0203t0:765_7: Yathā appahīnataṇhādiṭṭhiko puggalo taṃnissito allino, evaṃ tāhipi nissito amuttabhāvatoti
tika-s0203t0:765_8: āha – “taṇhādiṭṭhīhi nissitassā”ti. Calitanti yathā yathā asamāraddhāya sammāpaṭipattiyā
tika-s0203t0:765_9: ādīnavavasena calantaṃ pana yasmā ariyassa vinaye virūpaṃ calitaṃ nāma hoti, tasmā
tika-s0203t0:765_10: āha – “vipphanditaṃ hotī”ti. Tādise pana papañcavikkhambhanavasena cittassa calite
tika-s0203t0:765_11: asati bhāvanāya vīthipaṭipannatāya kilesapaṭippassaddhi eva hotīti āha “calite asati
tika-s0203t0:766_0: Bhavantaraṃ disvā namanaṭṭhena nati. Tenāha – “natiyā asatīti bhavatthāya ālayanikantipariyuṭṭhānesu
tika-s0203t0:766_1: asatī”ti. Paṭisandhivasena āgati nāmāti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena bhavantarato idheva
tika-s0203t0:766_2: āgamanaṃ nāma, cutivasena cavanavasena ito bhavantarassa gamanaṃ nāma na hoti āgatigatiyā
tika-s0203t0:766_3: asati katūpacitassapi kammassa uppattiparikappavasena pavattiyā abhāvato. Cavanavasenāti
tika-s0203t0:766_4: nibbattabhavato cavanavasena cuti, āyatiṃ upapajjanavasena upapāto na hoti. Yato
tika-s0203t0:766_5: gati āgati cavanaṃ upapāto na hoti, tato eva nevidha, na huraṃ, na ubhayamantarena,
tika-s0203t0:766_6: kāyassa gatiyā āgatiyā ca abhāvato sabbaso cutūpapāto natthi; tena na idhaloke ṭhitoti
tika-s0203t0:766_7: vattabbo. Na paraloke ṭhitoti vattabbo, na ubhayamantarena ṭhitoti vattabbo. Tenāha
tika-s0203t0:766_9: “na ubhayamantarenā”ti vuttoti ubhayapariyāpanno na hotīti paṭikkhipanto, “na ubhayattha
tika-s0203t0:766_10: hotī”ti āha. Ayameva antoti yo idhaloke paraloke ca abhāvo avijjamānatā anuppajjanaṃ,
tika-s0203t0:767_0: 394. Kaṇṭhanāḷiṃ chindīti nāḷiṃ chindituṃ ārabhi. Tasmiṃ chindituṃ āraddhakkhaṇe
tika-s0203t0:767_1: chedo ca vattati; maraṇabhayañca okkami avītarāgabhāvato, tato eva gatinimittaṃ upaṭṭhāti.
tika-s0203t0:767_2: “Sopi nāma sabrahmacārīnaṃ anupavajjataṃ byākaritvā sarāgamaraṇaṃ marissatī”ti saṃviggamānaso
tika-s0203t0:767_3: saṅkhāre aniccādivasena pariggaṇhanto. Arahattaṃ patvāti pubbe bahuso vipassanāya
tika-s0203t0:767_4: udayabbayañāṇaṃ pāvitattā tāvadeva arahattaṃ patvā arahattaphalapaccavekkhaṇānantaraṃ
tika-s0203t0:767_5: kaṇṭhanāḷicchedapaccayā jīvitanirodhena samasīsī hutvā parinibbāyi. Na hi antimabhavikassa
tika-s0203t0:767_6: arahattaṃ appatvā jīvitantarāyo hoti. Therassāti āyasmato channattherassa. Byākaraṇenāti
tika-s0203t0:767_7: hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ “byākaraṇena hetunā”ti. Tannimittañhi thero vīriyaṃ paggaṇhanto
tika-s0203t0:767_8: vipassanaṃ ussukkāpeti. Imināti, “atthi, bhante”tiādivacanena. Theroti āyasmā sāriputtatthero.
tika-s0203t0:767_9: Pucchatīti, bhante, tathā kulasaṃsaggapasuto kathaṃ parinibbāyissatīti pucchati.
tika-s0203t0:767_10: “Pubbe kulesu saṃsaṭṭhavihārī”ti sabrahmacārīnaṃ paññātassapi imasmiṃ “honti hete
tika-s0203t0:767_11: sāriputtā”tiādinā bhagavato vutta-ṭṭhāne asaṃsaṭṭhabhāvo pākaṭo ahosi. Pakkampi nipakkaṃ
tika-s0203t0:767_12: viya sammāpaṭipajjamānāpi keci asaññatā upaṭṭhahanti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0203t0:770_1: ariyavihārassa adhippetattā, idha pana akatakiccassa paṭisallānaṃ nāma kāyavivekoti
tika-s0203t0:770_3: vijānantassa dvārabhūtaṃ cakkhunti ubhayaṃ ajjhattikaṃ bāhirañca āyatanaṃ abhinanditādisāmaññena
tika-s0203t0:770_4: tañceti ettha taṃ-saddena ekajjhaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti āha – “tañceti taṃ cakkhuñceva
tika-s0203t0:770_5: rūpañcā”ti. Yaṃ panettha viññeyyasaddena jotitaṃ viññāṇaṃ taṃ sampayuttadhammāti
tika-s0203t0:770_6: tadubhayaṃ, “manoviññeyyā dhammā”ti padena kathitamevāti idha na gahitaṃ. Esa nayo
tika-s0203t0:770_7: sesesupi. Samodhānenāti sahāvaṭṭhānena, cittena nandiyā taṇhāya saha pavattiyā cittasahuppattiyāti
tika-s0203t0:770_8: attho. Tenāha – “uppajjati nandī”ti. Pañcakkhandhadukkhassa samodhānanti pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātassa
tika-s0203t0:770_9: dukkhasaccassa paccavokāre sahappavatti hoti. Yasmā dukkhaṃ uppajjamānaṃ channaṃ
tika-s0203t0:770_10: dvārānaṃyeva vasena uppajjati, tathā samudayoti, tasmā āha – “iti chasu dvāresū”tiādi.
tika-s0203t0:770_11: Kilesavaṭṭassa kammavaṭṭassa vipākavaṭṭassa ca kathitattā āha – “vaṭṭaṃ matthakaṃ
tika-s0203t0:770_12: pāpetvā dassetī”ti. Dutiyanayeti “santi ca kho”tiādinā vutte dutiye desanānaye. Pāṭiyekko
tika-s0203t0:770_13: anusandhīti na yathānusandhi nāpi ajjhāsayānusandhīti adhippāyo, pucchānusandhissa
tika-s0203t0:770_14: pana idha sambhavo eva natthīti. Sattasu ṭhānesūti akkosane paribhāsane pāṇippahāre
tika-s0203t0:770_15: leḍḍuppahāre daṇḍappahāre satthappahāre jīvitāvoropaneti imesu sattasu. “Bhaddakā
tika-s0203t0:771_0: 396. Caṇḍāti kodhanā, tena dūsitacittatāya duṭṭhāti vuttā. Kibbisāti pāpā. Pharusāti
tika-s0203t0:771_1: īsakampi pasādasinehābhāvena luddā. Pharusavacanatāya vā pharusā, tathābhūtā pana
tika-s0203t0:771_2: luddā nāma honti, tasmā vuttaṃ “kakkhaḷā”ti. Idañca teti, “hatthacchedaṃ nāsikaccheda”nti
tika-s0203t0:771_3: evamādiṃ idañca aniṭṭhaṃ karissāmāti bhayadassanena tajjessanti.
tika-s0203t0:772_0: Ghaṭikamuggarenāti daṇḍānaṃ kira aggapasse ghaṭākāraṃ dassenti, tena so “ghaṭikamuggaro”ti
tika-s0203t0:772_1: vuccati. Ekatodhārādinā satthena karavālakhaggādinā. “Indriyasaṃvarādīnaṃ etaṃ nāma”nti
tika-s0203t0:772_2: vatvā yattha yattha indriyasaṃvarādayo “damo”ti vuttā, taṃ pāṭhapadesaṃ dassento
tika-s0203t0:772_3: “saccenā”tiādimāha. Manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni dameti saṃvaretīti indriyasaṃvaro, damo.
tika-s0203t0:772_4: Rāgādipāpadhamme dameti upasametīti damo, paññā. Pāṇātipātādikammakilese dameti upasameti
tika-s0203t0:772_5: vikkhambhetīti damo uposatho. Byāpādavihesādike dameti vinetīti damoti āha – “imasmiṃ
tika-s0203t0:772_6: pana sutte khanti ‘damo’ti veditabbā”ti. Upasamoti tasseva damassa vevacanaṃ, tasmā
tika-s0203t0:772_7: damo ca so byāpādādīnaṃ vinayanaṭṭhena tesaṃyeva upasamanaṭṭhena upasamo cāti damūpasamo, adhivāsanakhanti.
tika-s0203t0:773_0: 397. Tattha khantiyaṃ katādhikāro taṃ janapadaṃ gantvā mahājanassa avassayo hoti,
tika-s0203t0:773_1: tasmā tadassa apadānaṃ samudāgamato paṭṭhāya vibhāvetuṃ, “ko panesa puṇṇo”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:773_2: Etthāti etasmiṃ sunāparantajanapade. Asappāyavihāranti bhāvanābhiyogassa na sappāyaṃ vihāraṃ.
tika-s0203t0:774: Dve bhātaroti avibhattasāpateyyā avibhattavohārasaṃyogā. Tenāha “tesū”tiādi. Janapadacārikaṃ caranto bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā janapadesu vikkayaṃ karonto.
tika-s0203t0:775_0: “Buddhapūjaṃ dhammapūjaṃ saṅghapūjaṃ karissāmā”ti tanninnā. Aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsīti,
tika-s0203t0:775_1: “buddho”ti vacanaṃ assutapubbaṃ sotapathaṃ upagataṃ anappakaṃ pītisomanassaṃ samuṭṭhāpentaṃ
tika-s0203t0:775_2: pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpehi chavicammādīni chinditvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsi. Vissajjitanti
tika-s0203t0:775_3: vikkiṇanavasena viniyojitaṃ. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ na upaṭṭhātīti bhāvanāvīthiṃ na otarati.
tika-s0203t0:775_4: Mayhaṃ asappāyoti mayhaṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvanāya sappāyo upakāro na hoti.
tika-s0203t0:776: Koci caṅkamituṃ samattho nāma natthi mahatā samuddavīcisaddena upaddutattā bhāvanāmanasikārassa anabhisambhuṇanato. Tenāha “samuddavīciyo”tiādi. Soti makuḷavihāro.
tika-s0203t0:777: Uttamajavena gacchamānā yathādhippetaṃ maggaṃ atikkamitvā aññataraṃ dīpakaṃ pāpuṇi.
tika-s0203t0:778: Uppādikaṃ uṭṭhāpetvāti mahāvātamaṇḍalasamuṭṭhāpanena tasmiṃ padese mahāsamuddaṃ saṃkhobhento mahantaṃ uppādaṃ uṭṭhapetvā.
tika-s0203t0:779_0: Thero, “amhe āvajjeyyāthā”ti kaniṭṭhassa vacanaṃ saritvā antarantarā āvajjeti, tasmā
tika-s0203t0:779_1: tadāpi āvajjeti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “tasmiṃyeva khaṇe āvajjitvā”ti. Sammukheti
tika-s0203t0:779_2: sīsaṭṭhāne. Paṭivedesunti pavedesuṃ, upāsakā mayanti paṭijāniṃsu. Imināti iminā mayhaṃ
tika-s0203t0:779_3: pariccattakoṭṭhāsena. Maṇḍalamāḷanti muṇḍamaṇḍalamāḷasadisaṃ paṭissayaṃ. Paricārakāti avasesagāmino.
tika-s0203t0:780: Saccabandhassa okāsaṃ karonto “ekūnapañcasatāna”nti āha. Taṃ divasaṃ…pe… aggahesi, tena so thero paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ etadagge ṭhapito.
tika-s0203t0:781: Vāṇijagāmaṃ gantvāti vāṇijagāmasamīpaṃ gantvā. Buddhakolāhalanti buddhānaṃ upagamma sattānaṃ uppajjanakutūhalaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:786_0: 398. Saṅghassa bhāraṃ akāsi upāyena nandakattherassa ovādena vinetabbānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ
tika-s0203t0:786_1: vinayatthaṃ. Tenāha “imaṃ panā”tiādi. Pariyāyati pavattatīti pariyāyo, paṭipāṭīti
tika-s0203t0:786_2: āha – “pariyāyenāti vārenā”ti. Assāti nandakattherassa. Vadāpesi aññehi attano anokāsabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:786_3: Pariyāyena ovadantīti ovadituṃ samatthā bhikkhuniyo vārena ovadanti. Idaṃ pariyāyena
tika-s0203t0:786_4: ovadanaṃ. Cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti pasīdati pubbacariyasiddhena gāravabahumānena gehassitapemavasena.
tika-s0203t0:788_0: Teti paccekabuddhe. Kiṃ nu khoti pucchi ciratarakālaṃ puññakiriyāya paribhāvitasantānatāya,
tika-s0203t0:788_1: paccekabuddhesu ca gāravabahumānatāya. Duggatehipi sakkā kātunti duggatehipi yathāvibhavaṃ
tika-s0203t0:788_2: katā kuṭi tumhākaṃ vasituṃ sakkāti pucchi.
tika-s0203t0:789_0: Hatthakammaṃ dethāti hatthakammaṃ katvā dethāti attho. Ānisaṃsaṃ ācikkhitvāti “tādisānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:789_1: mahesīnaṃ kataṃ veyyāvaccaṃ amhākampi dīgharattaṃ hitāya hoti. Āvāsadānañca nāma
tika-s0203t0:789_2: mahapphalaṃ mahānisaṃsaṃ nibbattaṭṭhāne mahāsampattiāvahaṃ bhavissatī”tiādinā ānisaṃsaṃ
tika-s0203t0:789_3: ācikkhitvā. Gāḷhena ovādena tajjetvāti, “imesu nāma karontesu tvaṃ kasmā na karosi,
tika-s0203t0:789_4: mama jeṭṭhakadāsassa bhariyabhāvaṃ na jānāsi. Sabbehipi kariyamānassa hatthakammassa
tika-s0203t0:789_5: akaraṇe tuyhaṃ idañcidañca dukkhaṃ āgamissatī”ti bhayena tajjetvā. Sataṃ sataṃ hutvāti
tika-s0203t0:789_6: sataṃ sataṃ dāsaputtā ekajjhaṃ hutvā ekañca ekañca kuṭiṃ katvā adāsi. Caṅkamanādiparivāranti
tika-s0203t0:789_8: Vissajjāpesīti pariccajāpesi. Parivattāpetvāti cetāpetvā. Ticīvarānīti sahassagghanikāni
tika-s0203t0:789_9: ticīvarāni katvā adāsi. Kālena kālanti kāle kāle, kismiñci kāleti attho. Rajje ṭhitassāti
tika-s0203t0:790_0: Nandakattheropīti tadā jeṭṭhakadāso etarahi nandakatthero pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patto.
tika-s0203t0:790_1: Jeṭṭhakadāsidhītā …pe… aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhitāti mahāpajāpatigotamiṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-s0203t0:790_2: Ayamāyasmā nandakoti ayameva samudāgamato āyasmā nandakatthero. Etāva tā bhikkhuniyoti
tika-s0203t0:791: 399. Hetunāti ñāyena aviparītapaṭipattiyā. Pubbabhāgā hi purimā purimā paṭipadā pacchimāya kāraṇaṃ. Yāthāvasarasato diṭṭhanti yathābhūtasabhāvato paccakkhaṃ viya.
tika-s0203t0:792: 401. Taṃ sabhāvaṃ taṃsabhāvanti tassā vedanāya paccayabhāvena anurūpaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:793: 403. Paṭhamataraṃyeva aniccāti tassāpi chāyāya aniccabhāvo paṭhamataraṃyeva siddho. Na hi kadāci aniccaṃ nissāya pavattaṃ kiñci niccaṃ nāma atthīti.
tika-s0203t0:794_0: 404. Anupahanitvāti avināsetvā. Kathaṃ pana maṃsakāyaṃ cammakāyañca avināsetvā itaresaṃ
tika-s0203t0:794_1: kantanaṃ hotīti byatirekamukhena dassetuṃ, “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Cammaṃ alliyāpentoti
tika-s0203t0:794_2: camme laggāpento cammapaṭibaddhaṃ karonto. Cammaṃ baddhaṃ katvāti vivarakāle na phālento
tika-s0203t0:794_3: cammabaddhe katvā. Evaṃ akatvāti evaṃ maṃsacammakāyānaṃ vināsanaṃ akatvā, vilimaṃsādivikantanena
tika-s0203t0:794_4: aññamaññaṃ vivecetvā. Tattha vilimaṃsanti cammanissitamaṃsaṃ, paṭicchannakilomakanti
tika-s0203t0:794_5: ca vadanti. Nhārūti sukhumanhāru. Bandhananti cammamaṃsānaṃ sambandhaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t0:794_6: “sabbacamme laggavilipanamaṃsamevā”ti. Antarakilesamevāti antare citte jātattā sattasantānantogadhatāya
tika-s0203t0:795_0: 405. Tajjaṃ vāyāmanti nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tathā hi purisena kuṭhārinā chejjaṃ
tika-s0203t0:795_1: chindite chejjaṭṭhānassa sallakkhaṇaṃ icchitabbaṃ, tassa paṭighātabhāvo icchitabbo,
tika-s0203t0:795_2: kāyapariḷāhābhāvo icchitabbo, tassa avaṭṭhānaṃ icchitabbaṃ, kiccantare ajjhupekkhaṇaṃ
tika-s0203t0:795_3: icchitabbaṃ, evaṃ paññāya kilese chindantassa yogino vīriyabalena saddhiṃ sati-pīti-passaddhi-samādhi-upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ
tika-s0203t0:795_4: icchitabbanti āha – “evaṃ na vinā chahi…pe… sakkotī”ti.
tika-s0203t0:796_0: 407. Tena kāraṇenāti yena tāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ sā dhammadesanā sappāyā, āsevanamandatāya
tika-s0203t0:796_1: pana ajjhāsayena paripuṇṇasaṅkappā na jātāyeva; puna tathā desanāya sati āsevanabalavatāya
tika-s0203t0:796_2: paripuṇṇasaṅkappā bhavissanti; tena kāraṇena tvampi tā bhikkhuniyo teneva ovādena ovadeyyāsīti.
tika-s0203t0:797_0: 415. Sabbapacchimikāti sabbāsaṃ kaniṭṭhā sotāpannā, anariyā tattha kāci natthīti
tika-s0203t0:797_1: attho. Tenāha – “sesā pana…pe… khīṇāsavā cā”ti. Yadi evanti akhīṇāsavāpi tādisā bhikkhunī
tika-s0203t0:797_2: atthi. Evaṃ sati sukkhavipassakabhāvenapi sati khīṇāsavabhāve ariyassa vinaye aparipuṇṇasaṅkappāvāti
tika-s0203t0:797_3: adhippāyena codeti, “kathaṃ paripuṇṇasaṅkappā”ti? Itaro ajjhāsayapāripūriyāti kāraṇaṃ
tika-s0203t0:797_4: vatvā, “yassa hī”tiādinā tamatthaṃ vivarati. Ajjhāsayapāripūriyāti tattha adhippāyapāripūriyā,
tika-s0203t0:797_5: na sabbaso guṇapāripūriyāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “kadā nu kho”tiādi. Etena pādakajjhānasammasitajjhānānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:797_6: visadisatāya puggalassa vipassanākāle pavattaajjhāsayavasena ariyamagge bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgajhānaṅgānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:797_7: visesatāti ayamattho dīpitoti veditabbo. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0203t0:800_0: 416. Vimuttiṃ paripācentīti kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhivimuttibhūtaṃ arahattaṃ sabbaso
tika-s0203t0:800_1: pācenti sādhenti nibbāpentīti vimuttiparipācanīyā. Dhammāti kāraṇadhammā. Tenāha
tika-s0203t0:800_3: Saddhindriyādayo visujjhamānā maggapaṭipāṭiyāva sabbaso assaddhiyādīhi cittaṃ vimocentā
tika-s0203t0:800_4: aggaphalavimuttiṃ sampādenti. Tesaṃ pana visuddhi bālaparivajjanena paṇḍitapayirupāsanena
tika-s0203t0:800_5: pasādāvahadhammapaccavekkhaṇāya ca hoti. Tato idha pannarasa dhammā adhippetāti dassento,
tika-s0203t0:801_0: Tattha assaddhe puggaleti saddhārahite puggale. Te hi nissāya na kadāci saddhā sambhavati,
tika-s0203t0:801_1: tesaṃ pana diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanena aññadatthu asaddhiyameva vaḍḍhati, tasmā te paṭibhayamaggo
tika-s0203t0:801_2: viya dūrato vajjetabbā. Assaddhiyanti ca saddhāya paṭipakkhabhūtā asaddheyyavatthusmiṃ
tika-s0203t0:801_3: adhimuccanākārena pavattā saṃkilesadhammā veditabbā. Saddhe puggaleti saddhāsampanne
tika-s0203t0:801_4: puggale. Te hi nissāya saddheyyavatthusmiṃ anuppannā uppajjati, uppannā bhiyyobhāvaṃ
tika-s0203t0:801_5: vepullaṃ āpajjati. Saddheyyavatthūti ca buddhādīni ratanāni kammakammaphalāni ca.
tika-s0203t0:801_6: Sevatoti labbhamānaṃ saddhāsampadaṃ uppādetuṃ vaḍḍhetuñca nisevato. Sesapadāni tasseva
tika-s0203t0:801_7: vevacanāni. Atha vā sevato upasaṅkamato. Bhajato tesaṃ paṭipattiyaṃ bhattiṃ kubbato.
tika-s0203t0:801_8: Payirupāsatoti tesaṃ ovādānusāsanikaraṇavasena upaṭṭhahato. Pasādanīyasuttantā nāma
tika-s0203t0:801_9: buddhādiguṇapaṭisaṃyuttā pasādāvahā sampasādanīyasuttādayo. Te hi paccavekkhato buddhādīsu
tika-s0203t0:801_10: anuppannā pasannā upajjati, uppannā bhiyyobhāvaṃ vepullaṃ āpajjati. Imehi tīhākārehīti
tika-s0203t0:801_11: imehi yathāvuttehi tīhi kāraṇehi. Paṭipakkhadūrībhāvato paccekaṃ sūpahārato ca āsevanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:801_12: bhāvanaṃ labhanti. Saddhindriyaṃ visujjhati maggaphalāvahabhāvena acchati visuddhiṃ
tika-s0203t0:801_13: pāpuṇāti. Iminā nayena sesapadesupi attho veditabbo.
tika-s0203t0:802_0: Ayaṃ pana viseso – kusīteti alase sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ nikkhittadhure. Āraddhavīriyeti
tika-s0203t0:802_1: paggahitavīriye sammāpaṭipanne. Sammappadhāneti anuppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ anuppādanādivasena
tika-s0203t0:802_2: pavatte cattāro upāyappadhāne. Paccavekkhato paṭipattiṃ avekkhato. Te hi paccavekkhato
tika-s0203t0:802_3: līnaṃ abhibhavitvā sammadeva ārambhadhātuādi anuppannānaṃ vidhinā satisampadāya uppādāya
tika-s0203t0:802_5: Samāhite upacārasamādhinā appanāsamādhinā ca sammadeva samāhitacitte. Jhānavimokkheti
tika-s0203t0:802_6: savitakkasavicārādijhānāni paṭhamādivimokkhe ca. Tesañhi paccavekkhaṇā uparūpari
tika-s0203t0:802_7: accantameva samādhānāya saṃvattati. Duppaññeti nippaññe, ariyadhammassa uggahaparipucchāsavanasammasanābhāvena
tika-s0203t0:802_8: sabbaso paññārahite ca. Paññavanteti vipassanāpaññāya ceva maggapaññāya ca samannāgate.
tika-s0203t0:802_10: caritabbaṭṭhānaṃ, yattha vā gambhīrañāṇassa cariyaṃ pavattati. Tattha hi paccavekkhaṇā
tika-s0203t0:802_11: sammohaṃ vidhamati, anuppannāya paññāya uppādāya bhiyyobhāvāya saṃvattati. Suttantakkhandheti suttasamūhe.
tika-s0203t0:803_1: idha saddhādike aññe ca dhamme dassento, “aparepī”tiādimāha. Tattha saddhādīnaṃ vimuttiparipācanīyatā
tika-s0203t0:803_2: dassitā eva, aniccasaññādīnaṃ pana vimuttiparipācanīyatāya vattabbameva natthi vipassanābhāvato.
tika-s0203t0:803_3: Tenāha – “ime pañca nibbedhabhāgiyā saññā”ti. Kalyāṇamittatādayoti kalyāṇamittatā
tika-s0203t0:803_4: sīlasaṃvaro abhisallekhakathā vīriyārambho nibbedhikā paññā ime kalyāṇamittatādayo
tika-s0203t0:803_5: pañca dhammā. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana “meghiyasuttasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ” vuttanayena
tika-s0203t0:803_6: veditabbo. Lokaṃ volokentassāti buddhaveneyyasattalokaṃ buddhacakkhunā visesato olokentassa.
tika-s0203t0:804_0: 419. Āyasmato rāhulassa indriyānaṃ paripakkattā saddhiṃ paṭṭhapitapatthanā devatā
tika-s0203t0:804_1: udikkhamānā tiṭṭhanti, – “kadā nu kho uttari āsavānaṃ khaye vinessatī”ti. Yadā pana
tika-s0203t0:804_2: satthā evaṃ parivitakkesi, tāvadeva samānajjhāsayatāya sabbakālaṃ taṅkhaṇaṃ āgamentiyo
tika-s0203t0:804_3: tā devatāyo taṃ samavāyaṃ disvā ekasmiṃ andhavanasmiṃyeva sannipatitā. Upālissa gahapatino
tika-s0203t0:804_5: tesu suttesu paṭhamamaggo “dhammacakkhu”nti vutto, tassa dassanatthassa sātisayattā,
tika-s0203t0:804_6: brahmāyuno pana phalañāṇāni heṭṭhimāni tīṇi sātisayānīti brahmāyusutte tīṇi phalāni
tika-s0203t0:804_7: “dhammacakkhu”nti vuttāni. Idaṃ panettha āyasmato rāhulassa maggañāṇaṃ phalañāṇañca
tika-s0203t0:804_8: dassanattho sātisayo, tāhi ca devatāhi yaṃ ñāṇaṃ adhigataṃ, taṃ sātisayamevāti vuttaṃ
tika-s0203t0:804_9: – “imasmiṃ sutte cattāro maggā, cattāri ca phalāni dhammacakkhunti veditabbānī”ti.
tika-s0203t0:804_10: Kiṃ pana sāvakānaṃ saccābhisamayañāṇe atthi koci visesoti? Āma atthi. So ca kho pubbabhāge
tika-s0203t0:804_11: vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya pavattiyākāravisesena labheyya kāci visesamattā. Svāyamattho
tika-s0203t0:804_12: abhidhamme “no ca kho yathā diṭṭhippattassā”ti saddhāvimuttato diṭṭhippattassa kilesappahānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:804_13: pati visesakittanena dīpetabbo. Kiṃ pana āyasmā rāhulo viya tā devatā sabbā ekacittā
tika-s0203t0:804_14: pageva cattāri phalāni adhigaṇhiṃsūti? Noti dassento “tattha hī”tiādimāha. Kittakā
tika-s0203t0:807_0: 420. Ādimhi kalyāṇanti ādikoṭṭhāse kalyāṇaṃ etassāti vā ādikalyāṇo, taṃ ādikalyāṇaṃ,
tika-s0203t0:807_1: ādikalyāṇabhāvo ca dosavigamena icchitabbo. Yañhi sabbaso vigatadosaṃ, taṃ paripuṇṇaguṇameva
tika-s0203t0:807_2: hotīti “niddosa”nti vuttaṃ. Katvāti ca padaṃ, “kalyāṇaṃ katvā bhaddakaṃ katvā”ti
tika-s0203t0:807_3: purimapadadvayenapi yojetabbaṃ. Desanākāro hi idha kalyāṇasaddena gahito. Tenevāha
tika-s0203t0:807_4: – “desetabbadhammassa kalyāṇatā dassitā hotī”ti, dutiye pana atthavikappe desetabbadhammassa
tika-s0203t0:807_5: kalyāṇatā mukhyeneva kathitā itarassa atthāpattito. Majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇanti
tika-s0203t0:807_6: etthāpi eseva nayo. Ayañca desanāya thomanā buddhānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇāvāti dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t0:807_7: “iti bhagavā ariyavaṃsa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Dhammaggahaṇampi desanāya thomanā evāti “navahi padehī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:808_0: Vedanā yāthāvato jānanaṃ, tañca maggakiccaṃ, tassa upāyo vipassanātiāha – “sahavipassanena
tika-s0203t0:808_1: maggena jānitabbānī”ti. Pariññābhisamayādikiccena nibbattiyā asammohato ca paṭivijjhitabbo.
tika-s0203t0:808_2: Tebhūmakacittameva kathitaṃ sammasanaṭṭhānassa adhippetattā. Esa nayo dhammāyatanādīsupi.
tika-s0203t0:808_3: Dhammāyatanassa vā āyatanabhāvato bahiddhāgahaṇaṃ, na sabbaso anajjhattabhāvato.
tika-s0203t0:808_4: Vipākavedanāpaccayā javanakkhaṇe uppannataṇhāti chattiṃsavipākavedanaṃ nissāya evaṃ
tika-s0203t0:809_0: 422. Pāṭiyekko anusandhīti yathānusandhiādīnaṃ asambhavatoti adhippāyena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:809_2: rūpāyatanādīnañca paccayāyattavuttitā dīpitā apaccayuppannassa paccayābhāvato, yañca
tika-s0203t0:809_3: paccayāyattavuttikaṃ, taṃ aniccaṃ uppādasambhavato, yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ
tika-s0203t0:809_4: tadanattāti khandhapañcake ca channaṃ chakkānaṃ vasena ghanavinibbhogakaraṇena atthato
tika-s0203t0:809_5: anattalakkhaṇaṃ vibhāvitaṃ. Na sarūpatoti sarūpatopi taṃ vibhāvetukāmo teneva chachakkānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:809_6: vasena ghanavinibbhoganayena byatirekato ca anvayato ca dassento bhagavā – “cakkhu
tika-s0203t0:809_7: attāti yo vadeyyā”tiādimāhāti yathānusandhikāva desanā vibhāvitā. Tenāha “heṭṭhā
tika-s0203t0:809_8: kathitānaṃ hī”tiādi. Heṭṭhā pana channaṃ chakkānaṃ vasena vinibbhogadassanamattaṃ,
tika-s0203t0:809_9: na anattalakkhaṇaṃ vibhāvitaṃ, idha pana sarūpato anattalakkhaṇaṃ vibhāvitanti adhippāyena
tika-s0203t0:809_10: anusandhantarabhāvajotanā. Yadipi anattabhāvo nāma catūsupi saccesu labbhateva, sabbepi
tika-s0203t0:809_11: hi dhammā anattā, ime panettha dvepi nayā sammasanavasena pavattāti vuttaṃ – “dvinnaṃ
tika-s0203t0:809_12: saccānaṃ anattabhāvadassanattha”nti. Na upapajjatīti upapattisaṅkhātayuttiyā na sametīti
tika-s0203t0:809_13: ayamettha atthoti āha “na yujjatī”ti. Attavādinā – “nicco dhuvo sassato”ti abhimato,
tika-s0203t0:809_14: cakkhuñca uppādavantatāya aniccaṃ, yaṃ paccayāyatthavuttitā, tasmā “cakkhu attāti
tika-s0203t0:809_15: yo vadeyya, taṃ na upapajjatī”tiādi. Sakkāyavatthu cakkhu anattā aniccabhāvato seyyathāpi
tika-s0203t0:809_16: ghaṭo, cakkhuṃ aniccaṃ paccayāyattavuttibhāvato seyyathāpi ghaṭo, cakkhu paccayāyattavutti
tika-s0203t0:809_17: uppādādisambhavato seyyathāpi ghaṭo. Vigacchatīti bhaṅguppattiyā sabhāvāvigamena
tika-s0203t0:810_0: 424. Yasmā kilesavaṭṭamūlakaṃ kammavaṭṭaṃ, kammavaṭṭamūlakañca vipākavaṭṭaṃ. Kilesuppatti
tika-s0203t0:810_1: ca taṇhādiggāhapubbikā, tasmā “tiṇṇaṃ vā gāhānaṃ vasena vaṭṭaṃ dassetu”nti āha. Yasmā
tika-s0203t0:810_2: pana taṇhāpakkhikā dhammā samudayasaccaṃ, cakkhādayo dukkhasaccaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ –
tika-s0203t0:810_3: “dvinnaṃ saccānaṃ vasena vaṭṭaṃ dassetu”nti. Taṇhāmānadiṭṭhiggāhāva veditabbā sakkāyagāminipaṭipadāya
tika-s0203t0:810_4: adhippetattā. “Etaṃ mamā”tiādinā gahaṇamevettha anupassanāti āha – “gāhattayavasena passatī”ti.
tika-s0203t0:811_1: vasena, tāhi vā tiṇṇaṃ gāhānaṃ paṭipakkhavasena viniveṭhanavasena anuppādanavasenāti
tika-s0203t0:811_2: attho. Paṭipakkhavasena vivaṭṭaṃ dassetunti yojanā. Sakkāyanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti
tika-s0203t0:811_3: ettha nirodhadhammo sarūpeneva dassitoti āha – “nirodho…pe… dassetu”nti. Paṭisedhavacanānīti paṭikkhepavacanāni.
tika-s0203t0:812_2: appahīno hotī”ti ariyamaggena hi appahīno thāmagato rāgādikileso anusayo kāraṇalābhe
tika-s0203t0:812_3: sati uppajjanārahabhāvato. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Vaṭṭadukkhakilesadukkhassāti
tika-s0203t0:812_4: vaṭṭadukkhassa ceva kilesadukkhassa ca. Saupādisesanibbānañhi kilesadukkhassa antakaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0203t0:813_1: attho. Avijjaṃ pajahitvāti anavasesato avijjaṃ appavattidhammataṃ āpādetvā. Kāmaṃ
tika-s0203t0:813_2: heṭṭhimamaggañāṇampi avijjāpahāyinī vijjā eva, taṃ pana ñāṇaṃ avijjāya anavasesappahāyakaṃ
tika-s0203t0:813_3: na hoti, aggamaggañāṇe pana uppanne avijjāya lesopi nāvasissatīti tadeva avijjāya
tika-s0203t0:814_0: 427. Sayameva tathāgate attano buddhānubhāvena desente saṭṭhi bhikkhū arahattaṃ pattāti
tika-s0203t0:814_1: anacchariyametaṃ, atha kiṃ acchariyanti āha “ima”ntiādi. Kathentepīti ettha itisaddo
tika-s0203t0:814_2: pakārattho, imināva pakārenāti attho. Pattā evāti saṭṭhi bhikkhū arahattaṃ pattā
tika-s0203t0:814_3: evāti yojanā. Etampi anacchariyaṃ, satthu sammukhā sāvakā samudāgamā mahābhiññā pabhinnapaṭisambhidā
tika-s0203t0:814_4: tathā tathā sappāṭihāriyaṃ dhammaṃ desentīti. Tenāha – “mahābhiññappattā hi te sāvakā”ti.
tika-s0203t0:815_0: Mahāmaṇḍapeti lohapāsādassa purato eva mahābhikkhusannipāto jātoti tesaṃ pahonakavasena
tika-s0203t0:815_1: kate mahati sāṇimaṇḍapeti vadanti. Tesupi ṭhānesūti tesu yathāvuttamahāmaṇḍapādīsu
tika-s0203t0:815_2: ṭhānesu. Mahāthero atthīti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Devattherassa guṇe sutvā
tika-s0203t0:815_3: pasannamānaso mahāthero, tathāpi vatthasampattiyā pasīditvā “tvaṃ pana nhāpehī”ti āha.
tika-s0203t0:816_0: Heṭṭhāpāsādeti ca kalyāṇiyamahāvihāre uposathāgāre heṭṭhāpāsāde ekadā uparipāsāde
tika-s0203t0:816_1: ekadā, kathesīti. Cūḷanāgassa tathā mahatī parisā devatānubhāvena abhiññāpādanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:816_2: ahosīti keci. Thero pana mahiddhiko ahosi, tasmā tāva mahatiṃ parisaṃ abhiññāpesīti apare.
tika-s0203t0:817: Tato tatoti tassaṃ tassaṃ disāyaṃ. Ekovāti ekacco eva, na bahuso, katipayāva puthujjanā ahesunti attho. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0203t0:820_0: 428. Mahantāni saḷāyatanāni adhikicca pavattattā mahāsaḷāyatanikaṃ, mahantatā ca
tika-s0203t0:820_1: tesaṃ mahantaṃ lokasannivāsaṃ abhibyāpetvā ṭhitattā ayoniso gayhamānānaṃ mahato anatthāya
tika-s0203t0:820_2: saṃvattanato, yoniso gayhamānānaṃ mahato atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattanato ca daṭṭhabbā. Jotakanti bodhakaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:821_0: 429. Sikhāppattāya vipassanāya jānanampi yathābhūtajānanameva maggena jānanassa āsannakāraṇabhāvatoti
tika-s0203t0:821_1: āha – “sahavipassanena maggena ajānanto”ti. Vuḍḍhiṃ gacchantīti paccayasamodhānena
tika-s0203t0:821_2: bhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsapāḷiyā aparāparaṃ parivuddhiṃ gacchanti. Evaṃbhūtā paguṇabhāvamāpāditā
tika-s0203t0:821_3: samathavipassanādhammā viya suṭṭhutaraṃ vasībhāvaṃ pāpitā jhānābhiññā viya ca vasībhūtā
tika-s0203t0:821_4: hutvā uparūpari brūhentīti āha – “vasībhāvaṃ gacchantī”ti. Tathā hi te kadāci bhavapatthanāya
tika-s0203t0:821_5: anuppāditāyapi appahīnabhāvenevassā tiṭṭhanti. Akusalā dhammāva yebhuyyena dassanāyatanena
tika-s0203t0:821_6: vināsadassanato pavattanti parivaḍḍhanti ca. Pañcadvārikadarathāti pañcadvārikajavanasahagatā
tika-s0203t0:821_7: akusaladarathā. Evaṃ manodvārikadarathā veditabbā. Santāpāti darathehi balavanto
tika-s0203t0:821_8: sampayuttadhammānaṃ nissayassa ca santāpanakarā. Pariḷāhāti tatopi balavatarā tesaṃyeva paridahanakarā.
tika-s0203t0:822_1: na yaṃ kiñci cetasikasukhaṃ tassa kāyikasukhaggahaṇeneva gahitattā. Pañcadvārikajavanena
tika-s0203t0:822_2: samāpajjanaṃ vā vuṭṭhānaṃ vā natthīti idaṃ manodvārikajavanena tassa sambhavaṃ dassetuṃ,
tika-s0203t0:822_3: maggassa vasena vuttaṃ, na pana tappasaṅgasaṅkānivattanatthaṃ. Viññattimattampi janetuṃ
tika-s0203t0:822_4: asamatthaṃ samāpajjanassa kathaṃ paccayo hoti, buddhānaṃ pana bhagavantānaṃ hotīti
tika-s0203t0:822_5: ce? Tathāpi tassa āsannaṭṭhāne pañcadvārikacittappavattiyā asambhavo eva tādisassa
tika-s0203t0:822_6: pubbābhogassa tasmiṃ kāle asambhavato. Eteneva yā kesañci ariyadhamme akovidānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:822_7: ghaṭasabhāvādīsu buddhitulyakāritāpatticodanā; sā paṭikkhittāti daṭṭhabbā taṃtaṃpurimābhogavasena
tika-s0203t0:822_8: tena tena pañcadvārikābhiniyatamanoviññāṇassa parato pavattamānamanoviññāṇena tasmiṃ
tika-s0203t0:822_9: tasmiṃ atthe vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivisesassa vinicchinitabbato. Uppannamattakameva hotīti
tika-s0203t0:822_10: pañcadvārikajavanaṃ tādisaṃ kiñci atthanicchayakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, kevalaṃ uppannamattameva
tika-s0203t0:823_1: Pubbasuddhikāti magguppattito, vipassanārambhatopi vā pubbeva suddhā. Tenāha – “ādito
tika-s0203t0:823_2: paṭṭhāya parisuddhāva hontī”ti. Sabbatthakakārāpakaṅgānīti sīlavisodhanassa cittasamādhānassa
tika-s0203t0:823_4: kārāpakaṅgāni. Aṭṭhaṅgiko vāti paṭhamajjhāniko vā aṭṭhaṅgiko, dutiyajjhāniko vā sattaṅgiko hoti.
tika-s0203t0:824_0: Imameva suttapadesaṃ gahetvāti, “yā tathābhūtassa diṭṭhī”tiādinā sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ
tika-s0203t0:824_1: pañcannaṃyeva tasmiṃ ṭhāne gahitattā lokuttaramaggo pañcaṅgikoti vadati. Soti tathā
tika-s0203t0:824_4: maggo”ti hi idaṃ vacanaṃ ariyamaggassa pañcaṅgikabhāvaṃ ujukameva paṭikkhipati. Yadi
tika-s0203t0:824_5: evaṃ “yā tathābhūtassa diṭṭhī”tiādinā tattha pañcannaṃ eva aṅgānaṃ gahaṇaṃ kimatthiyanti
tika-s0203t0:824_6: āha “uttari cā”tiādi. Sammāvācaṃ bhāveti ariyamaggasamaṅgī. Tenāha “micchāvācaṃ pajahatī”ti.
tika-s0203t0:824_7: Yasmiñhi khaṇe sammāvācā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchati, tasmiṃyeva micchāvācā pajahīyatīti.
tika-s0203t0:824_8: Saheva viratiyā pūrenti samucchedaviratiyā vinā dukkhapariññādīnaṃ asambhavato. Ādito
tika-s0203t0:824_9: paṭṭhāya parisuddhāneva vaṭṭanti parisuddhe sīle patiṭṭhitasseva bhāvanāya ijjhanato.
tika-s0203t0:824_11: Anekesu suttasatesu aṭṭhaṅgikova maggo āgato, na pañcaṅgikoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0203t0:825_0: Sammāsati maggakkhaṇe kāyānupassanādicatukiccasādhikā hotīti taṃ catubbidhaṃ katvā
tika-s0203t0:825_1: dassento, “maggasampayuttāva cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti āha. Na catumaggasampayuttatāvasena.
tika-s0203t0:825_2: Esa nayo sammappadhānādīsupi. Aññamaññānativattamānā yuganaddhā yuttā viya ariyamaggayuganaddhā
tika-s0203t0:825_4: eva hi samathavipassanā ekakkhaṇikā hutvā samadhuraṃ vattanti. Tenevāha “ete hī”tiādi.
tika-s0203t0:825_5: Aññasmiṃ khaṇe samāpatti, aññasmiṃ vipassanāti idaṃ tesaṃ tattha tattha kiccato adhikabhāvaṃ
tika-s0203t0:825_6: sandhāya vuttaṃ, na aññathā. Na hi paññārahitā samāpatti, samādhirahitā ca vipassanā
tika-s0203t0:825_7: atthi. Ariyamagge pana ekakkhaṇikā samadhuratāya ekarasabhāvenāti attho. Phalavimuttīti
tika-s0203t0:828_0: 435. Samavisamaṃ carantīti kāyasamādiṃ samaññeva, kāyavisamādiṃ visamaññeva caranti
tika-s0203t0:828_1: karonti paṭipajjanti. Taṃ pana samavisamaṃ aññamaññaṃ viruddhattā visadisattā na
tika-s0203t0:828_2: ekasmiṃ kāle sambhavatīti āha – “kālena samaṃ kālena visama”nti. Samacariyampi hi
tika-s0203t0:829_0: 437. Ākaronti adhippetamatthaṃ ñāpenti pabodhentīti ākārā, ñāpakakāraṇanti āha –
tika-s0203t0:829_1: “ke ākārāti kāni kāraṇānī”ti. Anubuddhiyoti anumānañāṇāni. Tañhi yathādiṭṭhamatthaṃ
tika-s0203t0:829_5: veditabboti. Campakavaseneva pana phassagandhānampi atthibhāvo vuttoti. Tenāha –
tika-s0203t0:829_6: “rūpādayo pañca kāmaguṇā atthī”ti. “Itthirūpādīni sandhāyetaṃ kathita”nti vatvā indriyabaddhā
tika-s0203t0:829_7: vā hontu rūpādayo anindriyabaddhā vā, sabbepi cete kilesuppattinimittatāya kāmaguṇā
tika-s0203t0:829_8: evāti codanaṃ sandhāya visabhāgitthigatā rūpādayo savisesaṃ kilesuppattinimittanti
tika-s0203t0:830_0: Tattha tānīti rūpādīni. Hi-saddo hetuattho. Tena yathāvuttamatthaṃ samattheti, “yasmā
tika-s0203t0:830_1: purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti, tasmā itthirūpādīni sandhāya etaṃ kathita”nti.
tika-s0203t0:830_2: Purisassa cittanti purisassa catubhūmakaṃ kusalacittaṃ pariyādāya gahetvā antomuṭṭhigataṃ
tika-s0203t0:830_3: viya katvā. “Hatthikāyaṃ pariyādiyitvā”tiādīsu hi gahaṇaṃ pariyādānaṃ nāma, “aniccasaññā
tika-s0203t0:830_4: bhāvitā bahulīkatā sabbaṃ kāmarāgaṃ pariyādiyatī”tiādīsu khepanaṃ pariyādānaṃ, idha
tika-s0203t0:830_5: ubhayampi vaṭṭati. Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ sutteneva sādhetuṃ, “yathāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:830_6: Tattha “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave”tiādīsu na-kāro paṭisedhattho. Ahanti bhagavā attānaṃ niddisati.
tika-s0203t0:830_7: Bhikkhaveti bhikkhū ālapati. Aññanti idāni vattabbaṃ itthirūpato aññaṃ. Ekarūpampīti
tika-s0203t0:830_8: ekampi rūpaṃ. Samanupassāmīti ñāṇassa samanupassanā adhippetā, heṭṭhā na-kāraṃ ānetvā
tika-s0203t0:830_9: sambandhitabbaṃ. Ayañhettha attho – “ahaṃ, bhikkhave, sabbaññutaññāṇena sabbaso olokento
tika-s0203t0:830_10: aññaṃ ekarūpampi na samanupassāmī”ti. Yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatīti
tika-s0203t0:830_11: yaṃ rūpaṃ rūpagarukassa purisassa sabbampi kusalacittaṃ pavattituṃ appadānavasena
tika-s0203t0:830_12: pariyādiyitvā gahetvā khepetvā ca tiṭṭhati. Yathayidaṃ itthirūpanti itthiyā rūpakāyaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:830_13: Rūpasaddo khandhādianekatthavācako, idha pana itthiyā catusamuṭṭhāne rūpāyatane vaṇṇadhātuyaṃ
tika-s0203t0:830_14: daṭṭhabbo. “Itthirūpaṃ, bhikkhave, purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti idaṃ purimasseva
tika-s0203t0:830_15: daḷhīkaraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Purimaṃ “yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, itthirūpa”nti idaṃ opammavasena
tika-s0203t0:830_16: vuttaṃ, idaṃ pariyādānabhāve nidassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0203t0:833_0: 438. Dhammasenāpatino paṭisallīyanassa adhippetattā, upari ca pāḷiyaṃ, “suññatāvihārena
tika-s0203t0:833_1: kho ahaṃ, bhante, etarahi bahulaṃ viharāmī”ti vuttattā “paṭisallānāti phalasamāpattito”ti āha.
tika-s0203t0:834_0: Vippasannānīti visesato pasannāni. Okāsavasenāti indriyānaṃ patiṭṭhitokāsavasena.
tika-s0203t0:834_1: Nanu tāni indriyāni sabhāvato vippasannāni hontīti? Saccaṃ honti. Na hidaṃ tādisaṃ
tika-s0203t0:834_2: pasannataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, idaṃ pana santapaṇītasamāpattisamuṭṭhitānaṃ paccupaṭṭhitānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:834_3: cittajarūpānaṃ vasena sesatisantatirūpānaṃ seṭṭhataraṃ paṇītabhāvāpattiṃ sandhāya
tika-s0203t0:834_5: buddhādīnaṃ purisānaṃ vihāro mahāpurisavihāro. Tenāha – “buddha…pe… vihāro”ti. Vihārato
tika-s0203t0:834_6: paṭṭhāyāti parikkhitte ca vihāre parikkhepato paṭṭhāya, aparikkhitte ca parikkhepārahaṭṭhānato
tika-s0203t0:834_7: paṭṭhāya. Keci pana “vihārabbhantarato paṭṭhāyā”ti vadanti. Yāva gāmassa indakhīlāti
tika-s0203t0:834_8: gāmassa abbhantarindakhīlo. Gehapaṭipāṭiyācaritvāti piṇḍāya caritvā. Yāva nagaradvārena
tika-s0203t0:834_9: nikkhamanāti nagaradvārena yāva nikkhamanapadesā. Yāva vihārāti yāva vihārabbhantarā.
tika-s0203t0:834_10: Paṭikkantamaggoti nivattanamaggo. Ārammaṇe paṭihaññanākārena pavattamānampi paṭighasampayuttaṃ
tika-s0203t0:834_11: citte paṭihanantaṃ viya pavattatīti āha – “citte paṭihaññanakilesajāta”nti. Divasañca
tika-s0203t0:834_12: rattiñca anusikkhantenāti etaṃyeva rāgādippahāyiniṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ divā ca rattiñca
tika-s0203t0:835_0: 440. Pahīnā nu kho me pañca kāmaguṇāti ettha kāmaguṇappahānaṃ nāma tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:835_1: Tathā hi vuttaṃ – “tiṭṭhanti citrāni tatheva loke, athettha dhīrā vinayanti chanda”nti.
tika-s0203t0:835_2: Ekabhikkhussa paccavekkhaṇā nānāti ekasseva bhikkhuno, “pahīnā nu kho me pañca kāmaguṇā”tiādinā
tika-s0203t0:835_3: pāḷiyaṃ āgatā nānāpaccavekkhaṇā honti. Nānābhikkhūnanti visuṃ visuṃ anekesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:835_4: Paccavekkhaṇā nānāti vuttanānāpaccavekkhaṇā. Idāni tameva saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ
tika-s0203t0:835_5: vitthārato dassetuṃ, “katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha “paccavekkhatī”ti vuttaṃ, kathaṃ
tika-s0203t0:835_6: pana paccavekkhatīti āha “pahīnā nu kho”tiādi. Vīriyaṃ paggayhāti catubbidhasammappadhānavīriyaṃ
tika-s0203t0:835_7: ārabhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhitvā. Maggānantaraṃ anāgāmiphalaṃ patvāti vacanaseso. Phalānantaraṃ
tika-s0203t0:835_8: magganti tasmiṃ anāgāmimagge ṭhito phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya aggamaggatthāya vipassanaṃ
tika-s0203t0:835_9: ārabhitvā tasmiṃyeva āsane na cireneva vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahattamaggaṃ gaṇhanto
tika-s0203t0:835_10: nirodhadhammānuppattiyā vipassanāparivāsābhāvato phalānantaraṃ maggappatto nāma hotīti katvā.
tika-s0203t0:836_0: Tato vuṭṭhāyāti maggānantaraphalato vuṭṭhāya. Maggānantarato hi vuṭṭhito maggato
tika-s0203t0:836_1: vuṭṭhito viya hotīti tathā vuttaṃ. “Phalānantaraṃ magga”nti ettha phalaṃ anantaraṃ
tika-s0203t0:836_3: ceva vadatīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Nīvaraṇādīsupi eseva nayoti ettha, “pahīnā
tika-s0203t0:836_4: nu kho me pañca nīvaraṇā”tiādinā yojanā veditabbā. Etesanti ettha etesaṃ nīvaraṇapañcupādānakkhandhasatipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:836_5: Pahānādīnīti pahānapariññābhāvanāsacchikiriyā. Nānāpaccavekkhaṇā hotīti tā paccavekkhaṇā
tika-s0203t0:836_6: nānāti adhippāyo. Etāsu pana paccavekkhaṇāsūti etāsu kāmaguṇapaccavekkhaṇādīsu dvādasasu
tika-s0203t0:836_7: paccavekkhaṇāsu. Ekaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ paccavekkhati dvādasasu nayesu ekeneva kiccasiddhito.
tika-s0203t0:836_8: Añño bhikkhu. Ekanti aññaṃ paccavekkhati. Aññattho hi ayaṃ ekasaddo “ittheke”tiādīsu
tika-s0203t0:836_9: viyāti. Nānābhikkhūnaṃ pana ekā paccavekkhaṇā, nānābhikkhūnaṃ nānāpaccavekkhaṇāti
tika-s0203t0:836_10: evaṃ catukkapaccavekkhaṇampi ettha sambhavati. Imassa pana dvayassa vasena abhisamayo
tika-s0203t0:836_11: natthīti tadubhayaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ na uddhaṭaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0203t0:839_1: mariyādaṭṭhānabhūte nigame. Suveḷu nāma nicalarukkhoti vadanti. Tato aññaṃ evāti
tika-s0203t0:839_2: pana adhippāyena “ekā rukkhajātī”ti vuttaṃ. Cakkhusotānaṃ yathāsakavisayato nivāraṇaṃ
tika-s0203t0:839_3: damanaṃ indriyabhāvanā, tañca kho sabbaso adassanena asavanenāti āha – “cakkhunā
tika-s0203t0:839_4: rūpaṃ na passati, sotena saddaṃ na suṇātī”ti. Sati hi dassane savane ca tāni adantāni
tika-s0203t0:839_5: abhāvitānevāti adhippāyo. Cakkhusotāni ca asampattaggāhitāya durakkhitānīti brāhmaṇo
tika-s0203t0:839_6: tesaṃyeva visayaggahaṇaṃ paṭikkhipi. Asadisāyāti aññatitthiyasamayehi asādhāraṇāya.
tika-s0203t0:840_0: 454. Vipassanupekkhāti āraddhavipassakassa vipassanāñāṇena lakkhaṇattaye diṭṭhe saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-s0203t0:840_1: aniccabhāvādivicinane majjhattabhūtā vipassanāsaṅkhātā upekkhā. Sā pana yasmā bhāvanāvisesappattiyā
tika-s0203t0:840_2: heṭṭhimehi vipassanāvārehi santā ceva paṇītā ca, pageva cakkhuviññāṇādisahagatāhi
tika-s0203t0:840_3: upekkhāhi, tasmā āha – “esā santā esā paṇītā”ti. Atappikāti santapaṇītabhāvanārasavasena
tika-s0203t0:842: Amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato”ti. ;
tika-s0203t0:843_0: Itīti evaṃ vakkhamānākārenāti attho. Ayaṃ bhikkhūti ayaṃ āraddhavipassako bhikkhūti
tika-s0203t0:843_1: yojanā. Cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇamhīti cakkhudvāre āpāthagate rūpārammaṇe. Manāpanti
tika-s0203t0:843_2: manāpabhāvena pavattanakaṃ. Majjhatte manāpāmanāpanti iṭṭhamajjhatte manāpabhāvena
tika-s0203t0:843_3: amanāpabhāvena ca pavattanakaṃ manāpāmanāpaṃ nāmāti. Tenāha (“neva manāpaṃ na amanāpa”nti).
tika-s0203t0:843_4: Iminā manāpabhāvo gahito, “neva manāpa”nti iminā manāpabhāvo majjhatto ca ubhayaṃ
tika-s0203t0:843_5: ekadesato labbhatīti, “manāpāmanāpa”nti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ ārammaṇe labbhamānavisesavasena
tika-s0203t0:843_6: tadārammaṇassa cittassa pākatikaṃ pavattiākāraṃ dassetvā idāni tappaṭisedhena ariyassa
tika-s0203t0:843_7: vinaye anuttaraṃ indriyabhāvanaṃ dassetuṃ, “tassa rajjituṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ
tika-s0203t0:843_8: yojanā – tassa cittaṃ iṭṭhe ārammaṇe rajjituṃ vā aniṭṭhe ārammaṇe dussituṃ vā majjhatte
tika-s0203t0:843_9: ārammaṇe muyhituṃ vā. Adatvāti nisedhetvā. Pariggahetvāti parijānanavasena ñāṇena
tika-s0203t0:843_10: gahetvā ñātatīraṇapahānapariññāhi parijānitvā. Vipassanaṃ majjhatte ṭhapetīti anukkamena
tika-s0203t0:843_11: vipassanupekkhaṃ nibbattetvā taṃ saṅkhārupekkhaṃ pāpetvā ṭhapeti. Cakkhumāti na pasādacakkhuno
tika-s0203t0:843_12: atthitāmattajotanaṃ; atha kho tassa atisayena atthitājotanaṃ, “sīlavā”tiādīsu viyāti
tika-s0203t0:844: 456. Īsakaṃ poṇeti majjhe uccaṃ hutvā īsakaṃ poṇe, na antantena vaṅke. Tenāha – “rathīsā viya uṭṭhahitvā ṭhite”ti.
tika-s0203t0:845_0: 461. Paṭikūleti amanuññe ārammaṇe. Appaṭikūlasaññīti na paṭikūlasaññī. Taṃ pana appaṭikūlasaññitaṃ
tika-s0203t0:845_1: dassetuṃ, “mettāpharaṇena vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha paṭikūle aniṭṭhe vatthusmiṃ sattasaññite
tika-s0203t0:845_2: mettāpharaṇena vā dhātuso upasaṃhārena vā saṅkhārasaññite pana dhātuso upasaṃhārena
tika-s0203t0:845_3: vāti yojetabbaṃ. Appaṭikūlasaññī viharatīti hitesitāya dhammasabhāvacintanāya ca
tika-s0203t0:845_4: nappaṭikūlasaññī hutvā iriyāpathavihārena viharati. Appaṭikūle iṭṭhe vatthusmiṃ sattasaññite
tika-s0203t0:845_5: kesādiasucikoṭṭhāsamattamevāti asubhapharaṇena vāti asubhato manasikāravasena. Idaṃ
tika-s0203t0:845_6: rūpārūpamattaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhatanti aniccato upasaṃhārena vā. Tato eva, “dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhamma”nti
tika-s0203t0:845_7: manasi karonto paṭikūlasaññī viharati. Sesapadesūti, “paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle cā”tiādinā
tika-s0203t0:845_8: āgatesu sesesu dvīsu padesu. Tattha hi iṭṭhāniṭṭhavatthūni ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ
tika-s0203t0:845_9: yathā sattānaṃ paṭhamaṃ paṭikūlato upaṭṭhitameva pacchā gahaṇākāravasena avatthantarena
tika-s0203t0:845_10: vā appaṭikūlato upaṭṭhāti. Yañca appaṭikūlato upaṭṭhitameva pacchā paṭikūlato upaṭṭhāti,
tika-s0203t0:845_11: tadubhayepi khīṇāsavo sace ākaṅkhati, vuttanayena appaṭikūlasaññī vihareyya paṭikūlasaññī vāti.
tika-s0203t0:846_0: Tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvāti sabhāvato bhāvanānubhāvato ca upaṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ paṭikūlasabhāvaṃ
tika-s0203t0:846_1: appaṭikūlasabhāvaṃ vāti taṃ ubhayaṃ pahāya aggahetvā. Sabbasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ pana,
tika-s0203t0:846_2: “majjhatto hutvā viharitukāmo kiṃ karotī”ti, vatvā tattha paṭipajjanavidhiṃ dassento,
tika-s0203t0:846_3: “iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu…pe… domanassito hotī”ti āha. Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiyā
tika-s0203t0:846_4: vibhāvetuṃ, “vuttaṃ heta”ntiādimāha. Tassattho heṭṭhā vuttanayo eva. Satoti sativepullappattiyā
tika-s0203t0:846_5: satimā. Sampajānoti paññāvepullappattiyā sampajānakārī. Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti kāraṇavasena
tika-s0203t0:846_6: cakkhūti laddhavohārena rūpadassanasamatthena cakkhuviññāṇena, cakkhunā vā karaṇabhūtena
tika-s0203t0:846_7: rūpaṃ passitvā. Neva sumano hoti gehassitasomanassapaṭikkhepena nekkhammapakkhikāya
tika-s0203t0:847_0: Imesu cāti “aññathā ca panānanda, ariyassa vinaye anuttarā indriyabhāvanā hotī”tiādinā,
tika-s0203t0:847_1: – “kathañcānanda, sekho hoti paṭipado”tiādinā ; – “kathañcānanda, ariyo hoti bhāvitindriyo”tiādinā
tika-s0203t0:847_2: ca āgatesu tividhesu nayesu. Manāpaṃ amanāpaṃ manāpāmanāpanti ettha manāpaggahaṇena
tika-s0203t0:847_5: vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Paṭhamanaye hi puthujjanassa adhippetattā saṃkilesakilesavippayuttampi
tika-s0203t0:847_6: yujjati. Dutiyanaye pana “so…pe… aḍḍīyatī”tiādivacanato “paṭhamaṃ saṃkilesaṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-s0203t0:847_7: vuttaṃ. Sekkhassa adhippetattā cassa appahīnakilesavasena, “saṃkilesampi vaṭṭatī”ti
tika-s0203t0:847_8: vuttaṃ. Tatiyanaye arahato adhippetattā, “tatiyaṃ nikkilesameva vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0203t0:847_9: Sekkhavāre pana “cakkhumā puriso”tiādikā upamā ekameva atthaṃ ñāpetuṃ āha. Tasmā
tika-s0203t0:847_10: cakkhudvārassa uppanne rāgādike vikkhambhetvā vipassanupekkhāya patiṭṭhānaṃ ariyā
tika-s0203t0:847_11: indriyabhāvanāti. Paṭhamanayo vipassakavasena āgato, dutiyo sekkhassa vasena, paṭhamadutiyo
tika-s0203t0:847_12: ca sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ mūlakammaṭṭhānavasena, tatiyo khīṇāsavassa ariyavihāravasena
tika-s0203t0:847_13: āgato. Paṭhamanaye ca puthujjanassa vasena, dutiyanaye sekkhassa vasena kusalaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0203t0:847_14: tatiyanaye asekkhassa vasena kiriyābyākataṃ vuttanti ayaṃ viseso veditabbo.
